solid #000000; border-bottom: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-right: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">3 months</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When leaving Lendlease you need to follow the relevant steps outlined below to ensure correct payments are made to with your final salary.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How can I help with succession planning?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In order to maintain business continuity and enable succession planning, your people manager may require your assistance with the following tasks prior to you leaving or retiring:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;- Provide full written details of the status of any work projects and future steps.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;- Develop a job description, including key competencies and skills required for the role.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;- Assist in training any successor.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I get a reference?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Company will be happy to provide a reference to any potential/future employer. The reference will include confirmation of your employment and length of service. All such requests should be directed to People Connect on (0)20 8271 8444.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What about any other company property?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have any of the following, please ensure you return these to your manager prior to your departure:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Corporate credit card&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Laptop&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Mobile device(s)&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Security passes&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Any other assets or property belonging to Lendlease.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Group%20Guideline%20on%20Individual%20Data%20Handover.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Employee Data Handover Guideline</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Handover%20Document%20template.docx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Data Handover Template</a>&nbsp;for guidance on managing your data when you are leaving Lendlease.&nbsp; </span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To arrange remote collection of your Lendlease equipment please click&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=sc_cat_item&amp;sys_id=1ec0ba34db40d0d0ee773313e29619dd&amp;sysparm_category=109f0438c6112276003ae8ac13e7009d\">here</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What about my benefits?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All benefits provided under the Preference Scheme will end on your last day of employment. Payment for some of these benefits will be taken for the full calendar month.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease Employee Share Plan participants should refer to their Shareworks account or contact them directly for all information. Our Lendlease Employee Share Plan team is also available to assist and can be contacted by email at&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:lendleaseemployeeshareplans@lendlease.com\">lendleaseemployeeshareplans@lendlease.com</a>.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have bought or sold holiday entitlements and leave Lendlease employment during the benefit year, the number of days you have bought or sold will be considered within the calculations for the cash value of any balance of annual leave to be paid or deducted in your final salary.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What about my final payments?</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All final payments will be paid directly into your bank account within the first available payroll. Your P45 Income Tax Form and payslip will be forwarded to your home address at that time.&nbsp; Please ensure that your home address is updated in Workday system.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What about my pension?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our pensions provider will contact you within a month of leaving Lendlease. You may also contact them directly on&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:Tracey.Cain@lendlease.com\">lendleasepensions@willistowerswatson.com</a>&nbsp;or call them on 01737 273119.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What do I do with my expenses?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please ensure that all outstanding expenses are submitted in iExpenses prior to departure. Any advances or loans will be deducted from outstanding monies due. If you are aware of any additional amounts that you have outstanding, it is your responsibility to inform your manager or the relevant area of your business.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What if I am retiring?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease does not operate a compulsory retirement age and believes that you should, wherever possible, be allowed to continue working for as long as you wish.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the retirement policy.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the retirement planning resources available under the Your money page.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you decide to retire you should inform your manager and People Portal in writing as far in advance as possible, as a minimum in accordance with your notice period.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\">You will receive a confirmation in writing that your notice has been received.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your manager will arrange a meeting to discuss arrangements for retirement, including the intended retirement date, succession and handover plans.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What if I have a company car?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please contact the facilities department to arrange the collection or return of your company car prior to your last working day.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; Unless","kb_knowledge_base":{"display_value":"People Connect Knowledge Base","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_base/01125e5a1b9b685017eeebd22a4bcb44"},"meta":"Leaving Lendlease Europe","u_problem_type":null,"topic":"General","display_number":"KB0018965 v8.0","base_version":{"display_value":"KB0018965 v7.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge/8ce978021b874250d77c76e2cd4bcb7b"},"short_description":"Leaving Lendlease  - Europe","u_last_review_date":"2024-07-10","x_caukp_ebonding_provider_id":"","roles":"","direct":"false","description":"","disable_suggesting":"false","sn_grc_target_table":"","sys_class_name":"Knowledge","article_id":"5ebe3abc1b7fa4106d4e986cbc4bcba5","sys_id":"108dec751bd70e90d77c76e2cd4bcbb6","use_count":"0","flagged":"false","disable_commenting":"false","valid_to":"2025-07-10","retired":"","u_add_to_homepage":"false","u_video_url":"","display_attachments":"false","latest":"true","summary":{"display_value":"KB0018965","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_summary/df44155e1bbf6010ef4543b4bd4bcb6e"},"sys_view_count":"20","revised_by":{"display_value":"Norhaniza Binti Mohd Razali","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/b8d1a1cc47716510fa3d6da7a46d436d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"EUR","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/fac7b30f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb0e"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2025-05-12 23:46:17","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0019109","sys_updated_by":"hinw325","sys_created_on":"2025-05-12 23:42:36","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Vitality is a comprehensive, interactive and personalized wellness program that makes it easy for employees to make healthy choices. All employees are eligible, as well as any spouses or domestic partners covered on a Lendlease medical plan. Click&nbsp;<a href=\"https://nam05.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fattendee.gotowebinar.com%2Frecording%2F4724283011097325314&amp;data=02%7C01%7CJackie.Coan%40lendlease.com%7C2039a026465f486c685f08d7b17775e6%7Cbc0c325b6efc4ca89e4611b50fe2aab5%7C0%7C1%7C637172999085805343&amp;sdata=VEWic5kVQIhvM4TYtYuMi1MUG6OTGgoCefgHAyw%2F5Nw%3D&amp;reserved=0\">here&nbsp;</a>to listen to a short video about the program or for more details read below.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Whether you want to lose weight, stop smoking, become more physically active, or learn about better nutrition, Vitality can help!&nbsp; Not only will Vitality help you chose personal health goals, they&rsquo;ll reward you as you strive to achieve them.&nbsp; Log in and get started today to create goals and earn Vitality Points during the calendar year!&nbsp; All Vitality Points become Vitality bucks you&rsquo;re able to redeem for merchandise or gift cards. Each year-end 10% of your points rollover to the new year.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Vitality Health Review</strong></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Earn Vitality points by completing the Vitality Health Review (VHR), which is a confidential online questionnaire available on the Vitality website or the Vitality Today mobile App that can help you assess your current health. It only takes 10-15 minutes and your answers on your physical activity, diet, stress level and more will show you where you&rsquo;re doing well and where you may need to improve to become healthier. You will receive 500 Vitality Points for completing it.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Your Vitality Check</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Completing your Vitality Check (also known as your biometric screening) with your primary physician is not only an opportunity to check your overall health and make sure you don&rsquo;t have any medical problems you&rsquo;re unaware of, it also provides Vitality Points.&nbsp; A Vitality Check is a confidential health analysis that includes a blood screening and biometric assessment, which measures your body mass index (BMI), blood pressure, blood glucose, and cholesterol levels. You can schedule this exam anytime throughout the year. You will receive 125 Vitality Points for completing it. See resources for the Vitality Check physicians form.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Points Planner</strong><strong><br /></strong>The Pathway on the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://nam12.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.powerofvitality.com%2Fvitality%2Fpoints%23points%2Fplanner&amp;data=05%7C01%7CLeeAnne.Brown%40lendlease.com%7C69c144794cff40edc72e08da4d39cfe1%7Cbc0c325b6efc4ca89e4611b50fe2aab5%7C0%7C0%7C637907208261391213%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&amp;sdata=dxcGojq4w4eTmcU%2BmXUZj9BPLcyzFxxNDCCdc17hP4c%3D&amp;reserved=0\">Points Planner</a> page helps you understand how to earn Vitality Points and plan to achieve a higher Vitality Status: Silver (2,500 pts); Gold (6,000 pts); and Platinum (10,000 pts). You can add activities to your pathway one-by-one using the category cards, or you can add several at a time using the quick points planner.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How it works</strong><strong><br /></strong>1.&nbsp;By answering a few short questions, the quick points planner will populate your pathway with enough activities to reach your target status.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2.&nbsp;When you are ready to complete an activity, you can click on the activity name in your pathway list and be taken straight to the next steps to earn points for that activity.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">3.&nbsp;As you complete activities, they will automatically be removed from your pathway as soon as your earned points are awarded.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are not required to add activities to your pathway. The pathway is simply a tool to help you understand how to earn points and plan what you would like to do. You will earn points for completed activities regardless if they are on the pathway or not.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For more information, visit Access the Pathway in the Guide to Vitality located under the Resources tab once you&rsquo;re logged into Vitality.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Apple Watch</strong><strong><br /></strong>For Vitality Active Rewards with Apple Watch, you can order Apple Watch Series 3 or Series 5 and pay for it each month through the workout you do to stay active.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The more points you earn for completing your Standard or Advanced Workouts, the less you will pay each month for your Apple Watch. This is another way to keep you motivated and active in your journey toward living a healthier life.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1.&nbsp;Once your Apple Watch is ordered and has shipped, watch for information about the month in which Vitality will start counting your workouts toward your Watch payments. The easiest way to find this is on the homepage of the Vitality Today app.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2.&nbsp;Once that month begins, Vitality will be tracking all the points you earn through Standard and Advanced Workouts. These points can be earned through any approved device, although you probably want to start using your Apple Watch.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">3.&nbsp;Every month, you have an opportunity to reduce your payments. If you did not reach the level you wanted in one month, you have an opportunity the following month.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">4.&nbsp;In order to pay nothing in one month, you need to earn 250 Vitality Points for Standard and Advanced Workouts, e.g., 25 Standard Workouts or 17 Advanced Workouts.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">5.&nbsp;For your payment history, navigate to the Vitality Active Rewards with Apple Watch page.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">6.&nbsp;If your credit card expires, please update your payment information on the Apple Watch page so there is no problem processing payments.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The plan is available to:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active full time salaried and hourly employees</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees not on the company's medical plan who have coverage elsewhere</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Dependent spouses or domestic partners covered on the company's medical plan</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Dependent spouses or domestic partners not covered on the company's medical plan are not eligible</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Log in to&nbsp;<a href=\"http://www.powerofvitality.com/\">www.powerofvitality.com</a>&nbsp;and register to begin your pathway to a healthier you. You will need your E1 payroll employee ID# to register. Your employee ID# can be found on an Archived Paystub from the E1 Self-Service page.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"padding-left: 40px;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Learn about Vitality and its many elements, offerings, and Vitality points. By participating in health-related activities that can be tracked and measured you will earn Vitality Points. Vitality activities were designed to empower you with the tools necessary to reach your optimal health.</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For a detailed overview of the Vitality Wellness Program, once you&rsquo;re logged in, look for Resources &gt;&nbsp;<a href=\"http://americas.lendlease.com/HR/2020/Vitality_Quick_Guide_2020.pdf\" title=\"Guide to Vitality\">Guide to Vitality</a></span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Who can I contact about the benefit?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Vitality Customer Care (Tel:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">877 224 7117)</span></p>\r\n<p><span Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All &ldquo;salaried&rdquo; and &ldquo;hourly-office&rdquo; employees are paid biweekly with the option of having their salary credited into their specified bank account (direct deposit).</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&ldquo;Hourly, non-union craft&rdquo; employees are paid weekly with the option of having their hourly wages credited to their specified bank account (direct deposit).</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees have access to pay stub information online via Workday.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: build upon their skills.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Who is eligible to apply for internal roles?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All regular full-time salaried employees with one year of continuous service in their current position and who are not on an active performance improvement plan (PIP), are eligible to apply for posted job openings.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, If you find a good fit for your experience and expectations, go ahead and click on the link to apply to the posting. We are committed to supporting the ongoing development of our employees. Lendlease will provide education assistance to eligible employees who wish to pursue, at their own initiative, further academic qualifications. Educational assistance may include financial support for study, paid study leave or both.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent employees are eligible for education assistance, subject to policy conditions.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Individuals employed under the terms and conditions of an operative enterprise agreement with a Lendlease group company should refer to the relevant enterprise agreement to determine if this policy applies.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees participating in the Lendlease Graduate Program are not eligible for education assistance.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The following criteria must be satisfied to qualify for consideration for education assistance:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; The employee must have completed a minimum of 12 months service.&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Consideration will also be given to an employee&rsquo;s overall performance against key criteria including goals, values and behaviours, feedback and relative peer performance.&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; The proposed course/qualifications must be beneficial to the performance of the employee in their current role and considered a sound investment for the business as a development requirement for the individual.&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Attendance at the course and the required study commitment must not impact on the ability of the employee to fulfil their role requirements.&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; The course must be deemed by Lendlease to be accredited from a reputable institution and lead to a recognised credential/qualification (e.g. diploma, degree, masters etc).</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Note: Eligibility to receive financial education assistance may be forfeited if an employee is subject to performance warnings and/or disciplinary action.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The percentage of reimbursement granted will depend on the relevancy of the course/qualifications to your current role and will not exceed 75% of the total cost. Payment is made upon successful completion of each course (i.e. passing).</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility criteria and Education Assistance Policy and ensure you meet the relevant requirements.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PREPARE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss with your manager your intention to apply for education assistance.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ACT</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you have obtained your manager&rsquo;s approval in principle, download and complete the Education Assistance Application Form and apply using the benefits worklet in Workday.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If successful, you will receive an inbox task through Workday with your confirmation letter attached.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Should your education assistance exceed $5,000, a return of service agreement will be included with the letter.&nbsp; Please attached the signed letter to the task in Workday.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If your application is unsuccessful, you will receive a notification via Workday.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FINALISE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must pay for your course and any applicable related study expenses up front and retain the original invoice(s).</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you have successfully completed the subject/course and you can provide documentation to support this, you may apply for reimbursement up to the amount specified in your confirmation letter.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply for education assistance reimbursement?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read the Education Assistance Policy including the reimbursement conditions.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PREPARE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Source copies of your invoices and academic transcript (demonstrating that you have passed).&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ACT</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For entities that use eFinance,&nbsp;submit a claim through eFinance, attaching the relevant invoices and academic transcript to show that you have passed the subject/course.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Select study reimbursement as the expense type.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter \"Education Assistance\" in the justification field. Please note that a signed return of service agreement must be presented to eFinance upon request.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Contact eFinance if you require assistance.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For entities that do not use eFinance,&nbsp;submit a claim through the usual business reimbursement procedure.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Attach the relevant invoices and academic transcript to show that you have passed the subject/course.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FINALISE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once approved you will be reimbursed the relevant amount in the next pay run.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I approve Education Assistance? (People Managers only)</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To view the criteria and entitlement relating to education assistance, please access the relevant policy located in the resources section below.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<strong>PREPARE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is the responsibility of the employee, not the people manager, to initiate a discussion about education assistance.&nbsp;Once you have had this conversation with your employee, organise a follow up meeting to check if all eligibility criteria is met.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Have a discussion with your own manager to obtain their approval in principle before an application is made.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Confirm the decision with your employee and guide them to this page on the ServiceNow.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review and approve or decline the request via Workday.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; Ensure they have signed and returned the return of service agreement to People Connect.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease recognises the need for employees to grieve and support other members of their immediate family in the occurrence of a death, serious life-threatening illness or injury in the family.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent, fixed term and casual employees are eligible for compassionate leave, subject to policy conditions.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Compassionate leave may not apply to employees covered by an enterprise agreement. Where employees are employed under the terms and conditions of an operative enterprise agreement with a Lend Lease group company, employees should refer to their enterprise agreement for details on the policies and benefits.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">View the Compassionate Leave Policy to see your specific entitlements.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How to I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is Lendlease policy for expenses incurred by you during the course of your normal business to be reimbursed provided they meet set criteria. All expenses must be incurred wholly, exclusively and necessarily in the performance of the duties for the Company.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Expenses will be reimbursed provided they are:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- A legitimate business expense;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Submitted via the Lendlease eExpenses system;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Reasonable and appropriate for the activity concerned (see Lendlease&rsquo;s Code of Conduct);</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Supported by full and detailed VAT receipts;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Approved by an authorised signatory;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Described, justified, verifiable and coded to cost centre / project; and</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Submitted for payment on a timely basis.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is your responsibility to:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Submit your claims in full compliance with the Expenses, Entertainment and Gifts Policy; and</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Keep records of the expenses claimed and to deal with any tax issues relating to them.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is the responsibility of the Approver to check the accuracy and completeness of all expense claims, and compliance with this policy.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">With the exception of those expense types covered by the Home to Site Travel Expenses Policy, areas or items of expenditure that are not covered in this policy:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Will not normally be reimbursed unless a satisfactory explanation and appropriate authorisation is submitted;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Should have prior approval from the relevant level of authority; and</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Should be undertaken in the spirit of the policy and its direction.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You should direct any queries relating to this policy to the head of your business unit or function or the relevant finance manager.</span><br><br></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>CLAIMING GENERAL AND TRAVEL EXPENSES<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are UK-based you are required to submit their expenses via the Lendlease eExpenses system. All costs should be assigned under the appropriate headings with a full and accurate description of the reason for the expense. For example:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Journeys need to have details of the start and end destination;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Both employee and client entertainment need to include names of attendees and the purpose of the event; and&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- All expenses need to be accompanied with an explanation of their business purpose.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must submit expenses for authorisation in a timely manner. Expenses received that are over three months old will only be paid if authorised by a higher authority.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must ensure that expenses are charged to the correct project codes or cost centres. If unsure, you should ask your people manager or business unit finance manager.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Receipts<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All original receipts must be scanned and attached to claims when submitted. In the event that you have no access to a scanner you should contact ExpenseQueries@LendLease.com &nbsp;to make alternative arrangements. &nbsp;Receipts are required to:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Evidence that you have incurred the expense;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Enable the company to claim the expense as a legitimate business expense for Corporation Tax and VAT purposes; and</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Enable you to claim the expense as a deductible payment for income tax purposes, or allow the company to pay the income tax on the expense on your behalf (benefit in kind rules).</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Receipts should be numbered with the line number from the eExpenses system. If receipts have been sent to Finance Services they cannot be returned.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If receipts have been lost, a full explanation is required. Repeated failure to produce receipts could result in expenditure not being reimbursed.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must retain original receipts or electronic copies of all receipts as per HMRC Guidelines</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Credit card receipts alone are not acceptable and will be rejected.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Approval<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Authorised signatories should:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Review claims made and adjust them if necessary. &nbsp;They are responsible for the accuracy and completeness of all expense claims as well as ensuring this policy is enforced.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Upon approving the expense claim the approver is verifying the following:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The business justification is correct and aligned with the guidance provided in this document; and</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The cost centres and project codes are correct.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY</strong>&nbsp;</span><br><br><span Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To assist employees with their transport requirements, Lendlease provides parking options for eligible employees. Parking is available through three methods:&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Salary packaging:&nbsp;Where available, employees are provided with the option to park in a parking facility at or near their primary work location on a permanent basis. The cost of parking will be deducted from their salary at a tax effective rate.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Tool of trade:&nbsp;Parking is provided, where required, for business purposes.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Special circumstance:&nbsp;Parking may be provided to employees who have special needs (e.g. temporary mobility impairment). This method is by approval only and on a discretionary basis.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I apply for salary packaged parking?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent and fixed-term employees are eligible for salary packaged parking, subject to policy conditions. Individuals employed under the terms and conditions of an operative enterprise agreement with a Lendlease group company should refer to the relevant enterprise agreement to determine if this policy applies to you.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Contact your local office support team e.g. Chatswood Support, obtain information on availability and costs. If you don't have a local support team, please contact&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:BarangarooSupport@lendlease.com\" rel=\"nofollow\">Barangaroo support</a>.</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Confirm with the office support that you would like to salary sacrifice parking.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Payroll will deduct the relevant amount from your pay in the next available pay run. This will be viewable on your payslip.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br />How do I arrange parking for my tool of trade?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent and fixed-term employees may be eligible, if access to parking is deemed necessary for the employee to fulfill their current role responsibilities.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr believe you need tool of trade parking to fulfill your job responsibilities.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The relevant business unit manager with consultation from your Strategic Business Partner will make a decision if your role requires parking.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will be informed accordingly of the arrangement and associated conditions if you are eligible for tool of trade parking.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br />How do I obtain special circumstance parking?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees who have special needs may be eligible for special circumstance parking, subject to availability of parking and approval at their manager&rsquo;s discretion.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Parking Policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease support employees when they are requested to move across the country for extended periods of work, and operates a Domestic Mobility Framework to balance the impact of a move to an individual and their family, with the needs of the business.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Domestic Mobility Framework has been developed for use across the Australia region, in all locations where Lendlease operates. &nbsp;The framework provides direction and guidance for managers, employees and People &amp; Culture professionals for structuring domestic assignments and transfers appropriately and consistently.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The framework ensures mobility at Lendlease:&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Is fair, equitable and competitive in the marketplace;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Provides resourcing solutions for projects whilst enabling talent development;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Is seen as a positive career differentiator and not a career risk; and</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Is governed by policies and processes which are cost-effective, bench-marked and implemented consistently.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Depending on the situation, and whether the move is temporary or permanent, assistance under the framework may extend to:&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Relocation transport (typically airfares) to the new location;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Relocation leave&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Removalist costs&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Temporary (or in some cases ongoing) accommodation assistance in the new work location&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Benefit amounts and allowances are subject to approval and allowances will generally be paid in addition to an employee&rsquo;s Total Package Value (TPV).</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Any exceptions to the policies require sign off by authorised representatives as per the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/sites/people-portal/essentials/people-manager-approval-limits\">Limits of Authority.</a>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The following policies define the support provided to employees in different circumstances.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have further questions on the domestic mobility framework please contact People Connect or the relevant Stategic Business Partner.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease has a number of programs designed to help employees care for their children and deal with family emergencies.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Childcare leave grants eligible employees with paid time-off to spend time with their children.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent full-time, fixed term contract full-time and part-time employees who have completed at least three months of service and are employed in Singapore on local terms are eligible for childcare leave or extended childcare leave.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Childcare Leave Policy.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PREPARE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where possible, discuss your leave plans with your manager in advance.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If the leave is planned, the required notice is:</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Less than five working days requested &ndash; at least five working days in advance</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;More than five working days requested &ndash; at least one month in advance</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Collect the relevant documentation to support your application::</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;For employees with non-Singapore citizen children</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; -&nbsp;A copy of the birth certificate of the youngest child</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; -&nbsp;Other relevant documents, as required</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;For employees with Singapore citizen children</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; -&nbsp;Birth certificate of the youngest child</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; -&nbsp;Singapore citizenship certificate &ndash; for child not born a Singapore citizen</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; -&nbsp;Government paid childcare / extended childcare leave declaration form (GPCL1)</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; -&nbsp;Other relevant documents, as required&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Update your child's details in Workday via the Benefits worklet, with the relevant documents. Childcare Leave or Extended Childcare Leave will only be available after your child's details are updated.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Following the discussion with your manager, enter the application in Workday via the Absence worklet and attach the relevant documents.</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ESAP (referred to as the \"Plan\") offers eligible Lendlease employees the opportunity to become security holders in Lendlease by acquiring Lendlease Stapled Securities (LLSS) by way of an effective salary sacrifice from pre-tax salary.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Under the plan, employees may contribute a maximum of $5,000 per financial year from pre-tax salary (to be deducted each pay in equal amounts) to acquire LLSS.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is strongly recommended that you seek appropriate qualified financial and taxation advice and fully understand the terms and conditions that govern ESAP membership before deciding to become a member of ESAP.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For further information on ESAP, please read the ESAP Information Booklet or contact People Connect.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Privacy laws regulate the way organisations collect, use, disclose, keep secure and give people access to your personal information. Download the ESAP privacy notification in the ESAP Information Booklet for more details.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent full-time or part-time employees of Lendlease are eligible to participate in the Plan.&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can access tax concession if you are an Australian resident for tax purposes and elect to salary sacrifice up to $5,000.00 per financial year.&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have elected to salary sacrifice to ESAP from Annual bonus, you cannot participate in ESAP through your Total Package Value.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br><span style=\"color: #008080;\">How do I apply?</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the ESAP Information Booklet and ensure you understand the terms and conditions that govern ESAP membership.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Seek appropriate qualified financial and taxation advice before deciding to become a member of ESAP.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Determine your nominated salary sacrifice amount for the current financial year (up to $5,000). The amount included will be divided by the number of purchase months remaining in the current financial year and sacrificed from your salary in equal instalments each month.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For future financial years, the salary sacrifice amount will be divided across 12 purchase months or until such time as you update us.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Salaried employees - Please nominate your salary sacrifice via the Benefits worklet in Workday&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wages employees - Please complete the Wages salary sacrifice form below and send to payroll</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Payroll will deduct the amount stipulated in the first pay-run following receipt of your form.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The amount sacrificed will be used to acquire LLSS on your behalf the month following the salary sacrifice. Once LLSS have been acquired on your behalf, you will receive an email welcoming you to ESAP and informing you of the action required to set up your Shareworks account.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br><span style=\"color: #008080;\">How do I keep a track of my securities?</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease uses Shareworks to administer and manage ESAP on behalf of Lendlease.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Shareworks will keep track of your LLSS and provide you with annual statements and relevant information about your security holdings. Additionally, you will have access to your Shareworks account to keep up to date with your security holdings.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">How do I amend/ cancel my participation?</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees have the opportunity to elect their salary sacrifice amount when entering into the program. The amount included will be divided by the number of purchase months remaining in the current financial year and sacrificed from your salary each month.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For future financial years, the salary sacrifice amount will be divided across 12 purchase months or until such time as you change your election from Elect to Waive in Workday. For steps on how to cancel your election please see the&nbsp;<a href=\"http://workspace.lendlease.com/pulse/HR/Documents/Quick%20Facts%20-%20Salary%20Sacrifice.pdf\" rel=\"nofollow\">Quick Fact Guide</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br><span style=\"color: #008080;\">What happens to my LLSS acquired under the Plan if I leave Lendlease?</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">LLSS acquired on your behalf will be transferred into your name on the Lendlease Computershare Share Registry after the cessation of your employment with Lendlease. Once the LLSS are transferred into your name, you will be free to deal with the securities in any manner you see fit.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A taxing point may occur when the securities are transferred to you &ndash; for more information, please refer to the tax guide in the ESAP Information Booklet.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br><span style=\"color: #008080;\">Resources</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: Culture and payroll in sufficient time. The purpose of the survey is to explore your reasons for leaving and use your feedback to make improvements to the quality of our organisation.
