Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A sabbatical is a voluntary arrangement where an employee takes unpaid time off over and above their usual leave allowance. In general, sabbatical leave is used to undertake research, further education or travel for personal development outside the normal working environment.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Full-time or part-time employees with two or more years&rsquo; service are eligible.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility requirements.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the sabbatical leave policy.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sabbatical leave can be taken for a minimum period of three months up to a maximum period of one year.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ACT</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You should discuss your request for sabbatical leave with your manager.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once agreed with your manager, you should enter your leave request in Workday.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FINALISE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will be notified if your request has either been approved or declined.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I return to work after sabbatical leave?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must contact your manager and People Connect at least one month prior to your agreed return date to ensure the company has time to arrange your return or to seek suitable alternative employment.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>My application has been declined. How do I appeal the decision?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If your request has been turned down you have the right to appeal the decision.&nbsp;Your appeal must be made in writing to your manager and the employee relations manager within five days of the date of the letter confirming the decision. This letter needs to set out the grounds for your appeal.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will then be asked to attend a meeting with the appeal manager where you have the right to be accompanied by a nominated Lendlease employee or a trade union official. After the meeting, you will be notified in writing of the appeal manager&rsquo;s decision. There is no further right to appeal.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=f97560c11bc47410b03a9829bc4bcb78\" alt=\"Stationery_Paper_BLK_PNG png\" Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease has partnered with HealthEquity/ WageWorks to allow you to purchase mass transit passes and/or pay parking expenses using before-tax dollars, which will be deducted from your pay check.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There are two different types of transportation expenses you may elect under this benefit:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1. <strong>Transit expenses<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Transit includes your own expenses incurred for using commuter bus, train, subway, ferry, certified vanpools, etc.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2. <strong>Parking</strong> </span><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">expenses</span></strong><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Parking includes parking expenses you incur while at work.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All full-time employees may visit the Wageworks administration site (link below) to elect the work related monthly transit and/or parking benefit that best fits their needs.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br />How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility requirements.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All transit/parking deductions will be deducted on the last pay check of the month of your election. Lendlease passes eligible employee information to WageWorks via their website twice a month, on the 4th and 10th. If you miss enrolling by the 10th of the month your election will be put in place the following benefit month.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There are pre-tax limitations on these monthly deductions. You can receive pre-tax benefits up to the federal pre-tax limit of $300 for transit and/or for parking. If your transit/parking expenses are more than the allowable pre-tax limits any amount over those limits will be deducted from your pay check on an after-tax basis.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If your transit or parking provider does not participate with WageWorks, you are still eligible for the tax savings. You will simply need to report your expenses to Wageworks through their online expense reporter for a reimbursement.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For Transit Expenses, it is important to note that regulation requires employees to purchase transit in advance of the month the expense will occur. Employees must make their election by the 10th of the month prior to use. New York commuters should note that if a pass is purchased a for the Long Island Railroad and/or Metro North you must make your election by the 4th of the month prior to the month of use.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Visit the WageWorks website and click on the 'Sign Up Now' button.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter the required sign-up information.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Create a user name and password.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Select the 'Transit' or 'Parking' tab and choose your provider.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Confirm your selections and look for the pass/ticket/fare/etc. in your mailbox.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FINALIZE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For Transit Expenses, the pass will be mailed to you by the first of the benefit month.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The cost for the pass(es) will be deducted from your pay check once a month on the last pay check of the month of your election.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For Parking Expenses, WageWorks will pay your parking garage or facility directly. If your parking garage does not participate with WagesWorks, you can upload your eligible receipts and be reimbursed directly by WagesWorks either by check or direct deposit.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I manage my account?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You have the option with Wageworks to change your election each month or you can choose to make a one-time recurring election to receive the same benefit monthly. Sign-ups, changes and deletions for ordering passes/or making elections must always occur by the&nbsp;10th of the month prior to the month you are receiving benefits, depending on the pass you choose.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have questions regarding this new transit plan or have problems enrolling you may contact Wageworks directly at 1-877-924-3967 (1-877-WAGEWORKS).</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our People &amp; Culture processes are supported by a number of online systems and tools. You will find an overview and link to each below.</span><br /></div>\r\n<div><br /></div>\r\n<div id=\"textAccordion\">\r\n<div id=\"multiRow_row1_0_col1_0_inner1_0_col2_5_expandCollapseLinks\"><br /></div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ServiceNow for Enquiries</span></strong>\r\n<div><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ServiceNow is a workflow tool used in Lendlease to raise People &amp; Culture <a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">enquiries</a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\r\n<div><br /></div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Career and Job Framework Library</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019102\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The Career and Job Framework Library</a>&nbsp;(CJF Library) provides visibility of all the roles available within Lendlease according to our Career and Job Framework (CJF). Roles are classified in the framework based on the type of work performed, and not by organisational reporting lines.</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Careers</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019075\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Careers</a>&nbsp;section provides you with visibility of current vacancies and future project opportunities, alongside information on career development opportunities and career mobility.</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">iManage</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"http://lendlease.imanagework-asia.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">iManage</a>&nbsp;is a cloud-based document management solution that stores employee records.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Note: access to iManage uses Single Sign-On (SSO) and restricted to approved People Connect, Payroll, People &amp; Culture Business, Talent &amp; Reward Partners only.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Access to&nbsp;<a href=\"https://wscimanage.lendlease.com:8060/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Phoenix Workspace Control</a>&nbsp;is available to approved People Connect administrators only.</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Kedos (Italy only)</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://services.kedos-srl.it/LendLeaseTimesheet/index.jsp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Kedos&nbsp;</a>is the time and attendance solution for Italy. &nbsp;Use Kedos to complete timesheets, create expense reports and book leave.</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Shareworks<br /></span></strong></div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease uses&nbsp;<a href=\"http://shareworks.lendlease.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Shareworks</a>&nbsp;to administer and manage ESAP on behalf of Lendlease. Shareworks will keep track of your securities and provide you with annual statements and relevant information about your security holdings.</span><br /></div>\r\n<span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /><strong>SteLLar</strong></span>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://myapps.microsoft.com/signin/OC%20Tanner%20-%20AppreciateHub/17acbc6a-1cd3-496b-bfd2-35d7ad5bcf45?tenantId=bc0c325b-6efc-4ca8-9e46-11b50fe2aab5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">SteLLar</a>&nbsp;is our online employee recognition program where both employees and managers can recognise and reward individuals and teams who are doing something over and above what's expected of them, while living our core values.</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Workday Learning</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/login.htmld\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Workday Learning</a>&nbsp;is our is digital platform for all your learning needs. Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To help with balancing work and family life, the below programs are available to Lendlease employees who care for children.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Parents at Lendlease<br /></strong> Lendlease has partnered with return to work and career management experts Parents At Work to create the Parents at Lendlease program. Employees have access to the Parents At Work online portal which holds recent parenting content, courses, tools and checklists for employees and managers.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can sign up using this&nbsp;<a href=\"https://members.workfamilyhub.com.au/lendlease-signup\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">link</a>.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong> </strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Expecting a new child?<br /></strong> Employees who are eligible for paid parental leave as per the Lendlease Parental Leave Policy, can also access up to three coaching sessions to support their transition to and from parental leave.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The sessions provide:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Support during parental leave, returning to work, and managing your career as a working parent;</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A dedicated&nbsp;<a href=\"https://parentsandcarersatwork.com/coaching/\" rel=\"nofollow\">Parents At Work coach</a>&nbsp;for one to one support;</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The opportunity to discuss your career plans and parenting needs confidentially; and</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The ability to access support over a period of 12 months, providing you with the flexibility to seek advice when you really need it.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To apply for the sessions you can:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Complete the relevant information on your &lsquo;Parental Leave&rsquo; application form when taking leave.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"5","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"AUST","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/8f58f34f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb41"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-02-29 00:07:57","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0019106","sys_updated_by":"raiv416","sys_created_on":"2021-05-05 07:27:20","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Flexibility is important to Lendlease. It enables us to retain our people, which means continuity for our business and our clients.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For Lendlease, flexibility is about when and where people work. It is an essential part of creating an effective organization. There is significant evidence that flexibility helps people work smarter and optimize resources and productivity in a highly competitive business environment.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Flexible work arrangements are not an entitlement, so employees should not assume that if they ask for flexibility they will automatically get it. These work arrangements need to be mutually beneficial to the business and the employee. After due consideration, managers may turn down requests for a flexible work arrangement if business needs cannot be met.</span><br /></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All Lendlease active, salaried employees scheduled to work 30 or more hours per week are eligible to apply for flexible work arrangements.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I submit a request for flexible working?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibity criteria</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the documents available under the Resources section of this page&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PREPARE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Work through Step 1 of the Implementation Approach document and make an initial consideration of the type of flexible work arrangement you intend to propose to your manager.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Fill out the Flexible Work Arrangement Conversation Guide and submit it to your manager.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ACT</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss your interests and proposal for a flexible work arrangement with your manager; this stage of the process may take some time while you and your manager discuss and agree on the proposed flexible work arrangement.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At the end of the discussions, if you and your manager have agreed and are satisfied with the terms, your manager may approve the flexible work arrangement.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once the flexible work arrangement has been agreed, sign and retain a copy of the Flexible Work Arrangement Conversation Guide. This will serve as a helpful reference to key aspects of the agreed arrangement.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are some examples of flexible work?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There are a range of creative and practical ways to change when and where work is done. Some of the more traditional forms of flexible work arrangements include:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>When people work<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Flexible start/finish times. Flexible start finish times allow for employees and managers to negotiate start and finish times that work for all parties.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Reconfiguring workweek.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Part-time work. Generally speaking, working fewer than the standard weekly hours. Note: Benefits eligibility will be impacted if scheduled less than 30 hours weekly.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>When people work<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Working remotely. Also called teleworking, this means working away from the main office or site (i.e. at home) either full or part-time, and on a regular or intermittent basis.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; May be appropriate only during specific phases of a project.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Ensure you check the project contract for potential issues.</span><br /><br /><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Applicable examples include:</span></strong><br /><br /><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Project site:</span></span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Ida Crown Jewish Academy in Skokie, IL - Team coordinated flexible start and finish times to accommodate rush hour and travel distances, while still allowing full coverage on site</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; - Superintendent starts at 6:00am and is generally the first person to leave the site</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; - Senior Project Manager starts between 6:30am/7:00am and is generally the next person to leave the site after the Superintendent</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; - Project Manager starts at 7:00am and is generally the last person to leave the site</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Lumina in San Francisco, CA</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; - Mix of Project Managers, Control Staff and Field Superintendents take every fourth Friday afternoon off</span><br /><br /><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Office-based:</span></span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Office-based people manager in PM&amp;C works from home on regular basis, with schedule driven by calendar&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Development Manager leaves at 2:30pm on Mondays and makes up the time by working in the evenings&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Administrative Assistant starts at 6:30am and finishes at 3:30pm</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/AMER%20Implementation%20Approach.pdf?csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=OnDViz\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Implementation Approach\">Implementation Approach</a></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Americas People &amp; Culture</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">COBRA (the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985) makes it legally possible for employees and/or eligible dependents to continue their medical, dental and vision&nbsp;benefits in case of the following events:</span></p>\r\n<ol style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee's Resignation</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee's Layoff</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee's Disability</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee's reduction of hours</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee's involuntary termination</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee begins leave of absence</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Divorce/Legal Separation</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Ineligibility of Dependent child</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Death of covered Employee</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee entitled to Medicare</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Separated employees automatically have their&nbsp;medical, dental and vision benefits extended through the last day of the month in which they are terminated. After that, they are responsible to pay for COBRA continuance for medical, dental and vision benefits.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have experienced one of the events listed above, contact People Connect to see if COBRA would be the right option.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br /></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For more information, contact People Connect, or download the Salaried or Hourly&nbsp;Benefits Exit Summary to review how benefits are impacted by separation from Lendlease.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Access the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Benefits%20Exit%20Summary%20-%20Salaried.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" Eligible employees are granted community service leave to enable active members of an officially recognised community emergency service organisation to attend training or assist during an officially declared emergency.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br />What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent and fixed term employees of Lendlease are eligible for community service leave, subject to policy conditions.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees bound by an operative enterprise agreement to which Lendlease is the employer may have varying benefits. sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Americas People &amp; Culture</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE&nbsp;<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease recognizes and encourages the importance of bonding and nurturing, developing relationships and adapting to new environments. To create a workplace that is best for all, the company seeks to provide the support and flexibility that our employees may need as they balance their commitments both inside and outside work. Therefore, if eligible, Lendlease provides partner leave for the parent without primary care responsibility pursuant to the terms and conditions set forth in this policy. To the extent there is a conflict between this policy and any applicable law on the subject, the applicable law shall control.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Partner leave is an employee benefit that provides a two-week paid leave, for normal scheduled hours during the workweek, for the following life events:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Birth of your child;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Adoption placement (up to age 18); or</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Foster care placement (up to age 18).</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For the purpose of this policy, a \"partner\" is generally defined as a spouse or domestic partner who does not have primary or full-time responsibility for the care of the child immediately following the birth or the arrival date of his or her child into the partner's home.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This policy applies to all active full-time salaried, benefits eligible, employees scheduled to work 30 hours or more per week.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Eligible employees may take a two-week paid partner leave for the birth of the employee&rsquo;s child, the adoption or foster care placement of the child. The following requirements also apply to leave taken under this policy:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Paid partner leave must be taken within the first eight weeks from the life event, and in increments of no less than one business day, unless otherwise required under applicable law. (Eligible employees may still be entitled to FMLA leave taken within 12 months of the birth or placement of the child).</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Paid partner leave is only available to the employee when the employee is not the full-time primary care parent during the period of leave.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The partner leave benefit will be paid at 100% of the employee's base salary and must be approved by their manager. The partner leave must be taken in increments of no less than one business day, unless otherwise required by applicable law. When entering partner leave hours, use pay type 46 (Partner Lv) within Time Entry within E1 employee self-service.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">During a partner leave period the employee shall continue to receive all employee benefits previously provided.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">An employee may become the primary full-time caregiver parent of the new child after the primary caregiver (spouse or domestic partner) has returned to their own employment or is no longer able to continue as the primary caregiver. If that is the case, the employee may be eligible for benefits under the Parental Primary Leave program.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All leave taken under this policy will run concurrent with any FMLA leave, short-term disability leave, and any state or local leave to which you are entitled, where applicable and permissible under law.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The employee must provide the employer with at least 30 days&rsquo; notice when the need for this leave is foreseeable.&nbsp; When an employee becomes aware less than 30 days in advance the employee must provide notice to their supervisor as soon as reasonable.</span></p>","sys_created_by":"wonl340","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Temporary &amp; Contingent Workforce AU</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Temporary and contingent labour (often referred to as Labour Hire)&nbsp;is important for our business to continue to run efficiently during extended periods of absence or for project specific resources. Managing this process centrally provides our business with visibility of our temporary workforce, mitigated risk through supplier agency panel, savings to projects through pre-negotiated competitive rates, and provides a fair and consistent hiring experience for temporary and contingent employees.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; a place for growth. We are committed to supporting the ongoing development of our employees. Lendlease will provide education assistance to eligible employees who wish to pursue, at their own initiative, further academic qualifications. Educational assistance may include financial support for study, paid study leave or both.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Click the link below to find out more information about Education Assistance in your region</span></p>\r\n<p><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019097\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Australia\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; - Global","u_last_review_date":"2025-01-22","x_caukp_ebonding_provider_id":"","roles":"","direct":"false","description":"","disable_suggesting":"false","sn_grc_target_table":"","sys_class_name":"Knowledge","article_id":"b4ef9a1c1bc341106d4e986cbc4bcbfa","sys_id":"48eda1f097939610ac3ad2b00153af7e","use_count":"0","flagged":"false","disable_commenting":"false","valid_to":"2026-01-22","retired":"","u_add_to_homepage":"false","u_video_url":"","display_attachments":"false","latest":"true","summary":{"display_value":"KB0019968","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_summary/9fa0aa5c1bc341106d4e986cbc4bcb17"},"sys_view_count":"0","revised_by":{"display_value":"Norhaniza Binti Mohd Razali","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/b8d1a1cc47716510fa3d6da7a46d436d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"Global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/b3c8b38f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcbb6"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-02-29 00:30:53","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"color: #008080;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Group People &amp; Culture</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1.5pt solid #DDDDDD;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 175px; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Function</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Group People &amp; Culture&nbsp; </span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 107px; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Effective Date</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">August 2013</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 175px; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approved By</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Michael Vavakis</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 107px; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Revision Date</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">July 2013</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 175px; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\"><br /></td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 107px; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approved Date</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">August 2013</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At Lendlease, we are committed to providing and maintaining a safe, consistent, healthy and productive working environment for all our employees across the globe.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For the safety, well-being and productivity of our employees, it is essential that our judgement is clear and unimpaired by drugs or alcohol at all times.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All Lendlease Employees</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Basic Principles</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees must not possess or consume illegal drugs while on Lendlease premises, or undertake work when their performance is impaired by alcohol or other drugs, legal or illegal, prescribed or otherwise.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees must not possess or consume alcohol while on Lendlease premises without prior approval from the Regional Chief Executive Officer. Please refer to your local policy for further information.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees are not to operate any motorised vehicle or equipment after consuming alcoholic beverages.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">While attending business meetings and or conferences on behalf of Lendlease, employees are to conduct themselves in a professional manner at all times.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This policy is to be implemented across all locations in which we operate including but not restricted to construction sites, site accommodation, project sites, company offices, communities and corporate offices.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Standards<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Alcohol<br /></strong> You will be in breach of this Policy where you:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Report for or undertake work, make yourself available for or return to work on or at any premises in circumstances where, if tested, you test positive for Alcohol; and/or&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter or are present on or at any premises when you are Unfit for Work; and/or&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Consume Alcohol on or at any premises (except for a pre-arranged event as authorised in advance by a Lend Lease Regional Chief Executive Officer).&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please refer to your local policy for further information and guidelines.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Drugs<br /></strong> You will be in breach of this Policy where you:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Report for or undertake work, make yourself available for or return to work on or at any premises in circumstances where, if tested, you test positive for the use of Drugs; and/or&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter or are present on or at any Premises where you are Unfit for Work; and/or&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Use (or attempt to use), possess, manufacture, sell, distribute or supply Drugs on or at any premises.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please note:&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The use, possession, manufacture, sale or supply of Drugs is a criminal offence.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Any person found committing or suspected of committing a criminal offence may be reported to the police and all Drugs and/or Drugs paraphernalia will be handed to the police.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is the policy of Lendlease to assist and to co-operate fully with the police in the investigation of any criminal offence.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Medication</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will be in breach of this Policy where you:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Report for or undertake work, make yourself available for or return to work on or at any premises in circumstances where you are Unfit for Work; and/or&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unlawfully possess, manufacture, sell, distribute or supply Medication on any premises.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please note:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Work performance and safety may be impaired by the taking of Medication.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The unlawful possession, manufacturing, use, supply, sale or distribution of Medication is a criminal offence.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Any person found committing or suspected of committing a criminal offence may be reported to the police.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is the policy of Lendlease Corporation to assist and to co-operate fully with the police in the investigation of any criminal offence.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Other Substances</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will be in breach of this Policy where you:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Use Substances provided for use at work, such as solvents or aerosols, in such a way as to render you Unfit for Work; and/or&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Report for or undertake work, make yourself available for or return to work on or at any premises in circumstances where you are Unfit for Work.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Requirements<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At no time are drugs to be permitted on any Lendlease worksite or office.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At no time is alcohol permitted in our office or worksite locations without the prior approval from the Regional Chief Executive Officer. Please refer to your local policy for further information and guidelines.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Some everyday supplements and medicines contain alcohol in a very small measure. To accommodate this anomaly, we have a small tolerance limit.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If an employee takes prescription drugs it is their responsibility to ensure that those drugs do not interfere with their ability to perform their role. It is also their responsibility to ensure their manager is aware of any special needs that they may have, or any impairment that the drugs may cause.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For off-site events where alcohol will be available please refer to your local policy for further detail.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Functions organised by the company off-site should be held where travel may be kept to a minimum for employees travelling home. Priority consideration should be given to venues where public transportation is available. Non-alcoholic beverages must be made available. For further information please refer to your regional and/or business unit policy.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approved on-site events where alcohol is served, should incorporate a means to restrict the amount of alcohol consumed. Non-alcoholic beverages must be made available.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The site orientation process is to include a section on the requirements for our projects to be alcohol free. Anyone consuming, in the possession of or under the influence of alcohol will be immediately removed from the jobsite and refused future access.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease employees who consume alcohol on a project or office site may be subject to termination&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">More detailed Regional and/ or Business Unit specific policies and procedures may supplement this Policy. &nbsp;Where there are additional or more stringent requirements imposed by the regional policy these will apply in addition to this Group Policy</span><br /><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Support, Assistance and Confidentiality<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We will encourage anyone who misuses substances to come forward and seek help. Early identification and treatment is essential. If you feel you have a problem, you are encouraged to seek help and advice from the Employee Assistance Program, through their confidential telephone helpline should you wish to discuss the matter with an independent organisation. Alternatively, you can approach your local People &amp; Culture Manager who will be able to discuss with you support and counselling options that are available to you.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Any such matter will be treated by Lendlease sensitively and in confidence. Any information or personal data obtained by Lend Lease as a result of a person seeking voluntary support and assistance will be kept in strict confidence (subject to provisions of the law).</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our policy is clear - being in possession of, or under the influence of illegal drugs in the workplace will not be tolerated. You are responsible for ensuring that you behave appropriately and safely, showing respect for your colleagues.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Download&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/POL_Substance%20Misuse.pdf?csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=Eboz9c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Substance Misuse Policy</a></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">See also the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/-/media/intranet/pulse/documents/aboutus/policies/regional/americas/amer--substance-misuse-policy-finalclean-august-2020-1-pdf.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Americas Substance Misuse Policy</a></span></p>","sys_created_by":"hinw325","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"x_caukp_ebonding_integration_mode":null,"can_read_user_criteria":"","active":"true","cannot_read_user_criteria":"","published":"2021-05-07","helpful_count":"0","sys_domain_path":"/","u_view_count_all":"68","version":{"display_value":"2.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_version/7e012e1c1b48b010ef4543b4bd4bcb65"},"x_caukp_ebonding_requester_id":"","meta_description":"Group People & Culture Function Group People & Culture Effective Date August 2013 Approved By Michael","kb_knowledge_base":{"display_value":"People Connect Knowledge This leave is provided to eligible employees in addition to other leave benefits.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 8pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Make sure you have helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease currently runs several key talent programs. While many of them require the business to directly nominate individuals to the programs, Aspire allows individuals to apply for the program.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong> About Aspire<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Aspire is a 12-month accelerated talent program, aimed to build future leaders who will grow with our organisation. The first stage of the program involves individual assessment to build a &lsquo;leader&rsquo; focused development plan. Participants are then given formal learning, development and mentoring opportunities.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approximately 60 individuals are accepted into the program globally.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Application Criteria<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Below are the criteria an employee must meet in order to apply for the program.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; You are a permanent employee with Lendlease;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; You are an Individual Contributor Level 5 and 6 (IC5, IC6) in our career job framework;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; You have worked at Lendlease for a minimum of two years;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; You have consistently achieved high performance ratings;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; You are regionally, and ideally globally mobile; and,</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; You have career aspirations to be a senior leader in one of our revenue generating businesses e.g. PM&amp;C/Construction, Investment Management, Property etc.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; We are committed to supporting the ongoing development of our employees.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will provide education assistance to eligible employees who wish to pursue, at their own initiative, further academic qualifications.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent full-time and fixed-term employees who meet the criteria below are eligible:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The employee must have completed a minimum of 12 months service.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The employee must have received a performance rating of On Track or Ahead of Track in their most recent performance review.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The proposed course/qualifications must be beneficial to the performance of the employee in their current role and be considered a sound investment for the business as a development requirement for the individual.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Attendance at the course and the required study commitment must not impact on the ability of the employee to fulfil the requirements of their role.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The course must be deemed by Lendlease to be accredited from a reputable institution and lead to a recognised credential/qualification (e.g. diploma, degree, masters etc).</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees must complete the Education Assistance Application Form to obtain the approval from their relevant managers and/or by the relevant Business Unit Head before enrolling and/or attending the course.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Note</strong>: Eligibility to receive financial education assistance may be forfeited if an employee is subject to performance warnings and/or disciplinary action.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The percentage of reimbursement granted will depend on the relevancy of the course/ qualifications to your current role and will not exceed 75% of the total cost. Payment is made upon successful completion of each course (i.e. passing).</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply for education assistance?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Education Assistance Policy and confirm that your proposed course meets the relevant requirements.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss with your manager about your intention to apply for education assistance.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you have obtained your manager&rsquo;s approval in principle, enter the request in Workday and attach the Education Assistance Form at least one month before the course commencement.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will receive a notification detailing the outcome of your application. If your application is approved, please register for your desired course.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Should your education assistance exceed S$5,000/ MYR10,000 you will be provided with a return of service agreement by People Connect. Sign the agreement and email this to People Connect.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\">Singapore employees</span>:&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">if you are eligible for funding grants from the Singapore government, you are required to indicate the information under the 'Comments' section. For instance, you may write 'please apply for WDA Training Grant'.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858;
