Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">At Lendlease we offer a number of employee benefits to support you in discovering your potential and building a future with us. If you are looking to finance a motor vehicle to support your transport requirements, Lendlease provides the option of salary packaging a novated lease.&nbsp;</span> </span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong>Novated Lease</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">A novated lease is a three-way agreement between an employee, Lendlease and a fleet provider whereby:</span> </span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">- An employee leases a vehicle (held in the individual&rsquo;s name) directly from the fleet provider, lease expenses are deducted directly from employee's salary;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">- The lease repayments costs are paid by Lendlease to the fleet provider whilst the employee is working at Lendlease; and,</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">- Any associated Fringe Benefits Tax (FBT) liability will also be deducted from the employee's salary.</span></span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: teal;\">What are the eligibility requirements for a novated lease?</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">Permanent full-time, permanent part-time and fixed-term* employees may be eligible to salary package a motor vehicle of their choice through a novated lease agreement.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br /><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">*A fixed-term employee&rsquo;s remaining contract duration must be equal to or greater than the lease contract period.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><br /><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">Individuals employed under the terms and conditions of an operative enterprise agreement with a Lendlease group company, should refer to the relevant enterprise agreement to determine if this policy applies to you.</span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br /><span style=\"color: #008080;\">How do I apply for a novated lease?</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; height: 403px;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 44.4px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 44.4px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 44.4px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Novated Lease Policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 44.4px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 269.8px;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 269.8px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Contact SG Fleet (as below) and obtain the relevant paperwork&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">SG Fleet Australia</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Phone: 1800 743 262</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease is committed to supporting the ongoing education of our employees. Education support is provided to eligible employees who wish to pursue further academic qualifications at their own initiative in the form of financial and/or time off work for study leave.&nbsp;</span><br /></p>\r\n<p><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Investment in education ensures we can attract, retain and develop employees; continually build employee capability to deliver on our business strategy; and ensure the future leadership of the business.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All permanent employees who have been employed continuously for at least 26 weeks are eligible to submit a request.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The following will be taken into consideration when approving the employee&rsquo;s request:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The external study&rsquo;s ability to develop skills and knowledge which can be used in the employee&rsquo;s current role.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Whether the external study has been identified in the employee&rsquo;s individual development plan or leadership development plan.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Whether the selected course leads to a recognised qualification.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The cost of the course. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where a new employee commenced their study with a previous employer, consideration may be given to supporting continuous study in the financial year following commencing of employment based on the criteria above. There may be a tax implication for the employee and they should refer to the HMRC. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There may also be exemptions for Association of Charted Certified Accountants (ACCA), Charted Institute of Management Accountants (CIMA), Association of Accounting Technicians (AAT) or equivalent finance courses where support may be given to employees who have worked for Lendlease for less than two years. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Postgraduate education</strong> &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For new study, the employee must have worked for Lendlease for at least two years at the commencement of the course. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees who have already received support from Lendlease to study for a first degree will not be considered for further support on a course leading to a postgraduate qualification until two years after graduating with their first degree. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There must be a period of at least two years between completion of one postgraduate qualification and the commencement of another, unless the course is a natural progression e.g.: Graduate Certificate in Management and Postgraduate Diploma in Management.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The percentage of reimbursement granted will depend on the relevancy of the course or qualifications relating to the employee&rsquo;s current role.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Eligibility to receive financial education assistance may be forfeited if any employee is subject to performance warnings and/or disciplinary action.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Check if your current or proposed course meets the eligibility requirements Read our external study and study leave policy &amp; procedure&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Speak to your manager about your intention to study or studies you are undertaking</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you have obtained your manager&rsquo;s approval in principle, download and complete the Education Assistance Application Form and apply using the benefits worklet in Workday.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If successful, you will receive an inbox task through Workday with your confirmation letter attached.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If your application is unsuccessful, you will receive a notification via Workday.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will receive a notification confirming if your application has been approved or denied.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Can I seek reimbursement?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Refer to the external study and study leave policy &amp; procedure on the reimbursement and pay back clause.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Who can I contact regarding the benefit?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have any questions on this benefit please call People Connect on 020 8271 8444&nbsp;and select option two or ask People Connect online using the button on the top right hand corner of this page. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please email eFinance if you need assistance with submitting your reimbursement claim.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">How do I approve Education Assistance? (People Managers only)</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To view the criteria and entitlement relating to education assistance, please access the relevant policy located in the resources section below.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<strong>PREPARE &nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is the responsibility of the employee, not the people manager, to initiate a discussion about education assistance.&nbsp;Once you have had this conversation with your employee, organise a follow up meeting to check if all eligibility criteria is met.&nbsp;</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Education Assistance requires two levels of approval. Have a discussion with your own manager to obtain their approval in principle before an application is made.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss the request with the Business Unit/ Function Head to agree if the request should be approved.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Confirm the decision with your employee and guide them to this section on the ServiceNow.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review and approve or reject the request via Workday.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; Binti Mohd Razali","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/b8d1a1cc47716510fa3d6da7a46d436d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"5","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"ASIA","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/6768bb4f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcbd1"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-02-29 00:08:02","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0018735","sys_updated_by":"raiv416","sys_created_on":"2021-05-07 02:16:02","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Out of Town Living (OTL) Allowance is available if you are requested by our business to be on an out-of-town job assignment temporarily relocating you away from your permanent tax home for a period of 90 days or more while on business.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All allowances must be approved in advance through Workday for either a short-term or long-term assignment. Any changes to the authorization form, after approval has been obtained, will require additional approvals. No commitment should be made to an employee or new hire until approvals have been obtained. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Short-term assignment<br /></strong> If an employee&rsquo;s assignment is expected to last 12 months or less, living expenses are not considered taxable income and therefore they would be eligible to receive a &rsquo;non-taxable&rsquo; OTL allowance. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Long-term assignment<br /></strong> If an employee&rsquo;s assignment is expected to last longer than 12 months, living expenses are considered taxable income and the employee would receive a &ldquo;taxable&rdquo; OTL allowance.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Assignments too short for OTL allowances<br /></strong> Typically an assignment of 90 days or less would not allow for an apartment lease to be established, so the assignment must instead be handled by expenses through accounts payable. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A new&nbsp;Out-of-Town Living Allowance Authorization Form&nbsp;must be completed by the receiving manager each time an employee moves to a new OTL location or begins a new OTL assignment.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility requirements.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the out of town living allowance policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">MetLife&rsquo;s Guaranteed Issue Critical Illness Insurance is a voluntary benefit designed to complement, but not replace your current medical coverage.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Critical illness coverage provides you with a lump-sum benefit payment in the event you or your covered dependent experiences, provided the condition is covered, falls within the three distinct categories and meets the policy and certificate requirements. You can use the lump-sum payment as you see fit, which may include costs not covered by your existing medical coverage, such as experimental treatments, travel expenses or childcare fees.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active full-time salaried employees are eligible to elect the voluntary policies.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Newly hired employees are eligible to elect these voluntary benefits when electing their healthcare benefits. Elections must be completed within 31 days from the employee&rsquo;s start date. Current employees may elect this benefit during our annual open enrolment or if they experience a qualifying life event during the year.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At Lendlease we are committed to outstanding performance and actively subscribe to a set of&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/Pulse/SitePages/Our-Purpose-and-Values.aspx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">core values</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We adopt and promote these values across all of our businesses around the world as they underpin the way in which we conduct our business, interact with our stakeholders and operate as individuals or teams. Our&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/EGP/Shared%20Documents/Code%20of%20Conduct.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Employee Code of Conduct\">Employee Code of Conduct</a>&nbsp;sets out the standards of conduct expected of our business and people, regardless of location. It applies to all Directors and employee of Lendlease and its subsidiaries (employees) and operates in conjunction with our&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/Pulse/SitePages/Our-Purpose-and-Values.aspx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">core values</a>, the employee conduct guide and our policies and procedures.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Employee Conduct Hotline</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees can report any potential breaches of the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/EGP/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FEGP%2FShared%20Documents%2FEmployee%20Conduct%20Guide%2Epdf&amp;parent=%2Fsites%2FEGP%2FShared%20Documents\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Employee Conduct Guide</a>&nbsp;to their manager or People &amp; Culture representative.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a people manager, if an employee makes a report to you regarding a breach of conduct please discuss first with your Strategic Business Partner.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You and/or your employee can also contact the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://secure.ethicspoint.com/domain/media/en/gui/28300/index.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Employee Conduct Hotline</a>. This is a secure, confidential and independent channel to raise concerns, seek further assistance and report potential conduct breaches. The employee conduct hotline is hosted by an external organisation EthicsPoint.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Policies</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our global and regional P&amp;C polices further support the standards expected of Lendlease employees. Click on your region to view the P&amp;C policies for your region.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Where can I 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For all Lendlease employees based in the AMER Region. Employment status at the company falls into one of three categories, full time, part time and casual/hourly.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All Lendlease&nbsp;AMER Employees</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Full time</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Salaried, exempt or non-exempt,&nbsp;employees regularly scheduled to work 40 hours&nbsp;per week are considered full-time employees. All full-time employees are eligible for company-provided benefits.</span></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Part time</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Salaried, exempt or non-exempt, employees regularly scheduled to work 30-39 hours per week are considered part time employees. All part time employees are eligible for company-provided benefits. (Paid Time Off accruals will be prorated based on the hours scheduled to work).</span></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Casual/Hourly</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees working a varying number of hours per week for a limited time frame, any temporary position, or laborers/craft workers are considered casual/hourly employees. This also includes employees that are scheduled to work less than 30 hours a week. Casual/Hourly employees are eligible to participate in hourly Paid Time Off and may be eligible to participate in the hourly benefit offerings.</span></p>","sys_created_by":"wonl340","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"x_caukp_ebonding_integration_mode":null,"can_read_user_criteria":"","active":"true","cannot_read_user_criteria":"","published":"2025-03-19","helpful_count":"1","sys_domain_path":"/","u_view_count_all":"489","version":{"display_value":"5.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_version/977229729798ae1472b954800153af46"},"x_caukp_ebonding_requester_id":"","meta_description":"Americas People & Culture PURPOSE For all Lendlease employees based in the AMER Region. sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Service awards are presented to employees to recognise milestones in their careers and to express Lendlease&rsquo;s appreciation for continued contribution and dedication to the business. Service awards globally are distributed for eligible employees through Stellar.</span></p>\r\n<p><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Stellar is our online global employee recognition program where employees can recognise each other and be recognised for going above and beyond and for living our core values. Stellar is also used to celebrate service milestones. Points for service awards are allocated on the Stellar online platform.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Eligibility varies slightly between regions.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Americas<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Full-time, salaried employees with uninterrupted service with any Lendlease company are eligible. For employees who have a break in service with the company of 12 months or less, prior years of service will be recognized, adjusting the hire date to reflect the break in service, if the following criteria are met:&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Prior years of service were as a full-time, salaried employee; and&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; The employee has at least one year of uninterrupted prior service.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Asia<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All permanent and fixed-term employees are eligible to receive recognition for service. An employee&rsquo;s service date is usually based on the employee&rsquo;s start date with Lendlease. Periods of previous employment within the Lendlease Group are also recognised in most cases for the purposes of service awards.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Australia<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All permanent and fixed-term employees are eligible for service awards. Wages employees in the Retirement Living business will have their service awards managed outside of Stellar.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Europe<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All permanent employees are eligible for the service recognition award.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br>What happens when I reach a service milestone?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can find out more about service milestones in your regional Service Recognition Policy in the Resources section below. Service milestones will be posted to the Stellar feed and you will receive an email from Stellar congratulating you and giving you the details of any Stellar points you have been awarded. If your service award is managed outside of Stellar you will receive a gift card instead of Stellar points.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You do not have to redeem Stellar points as soon as you receive them. You can save your points from both service recognition and the Stellar recognition program to redeem them at your convenience.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; Global","u_last_review_date":"2025-04-28","x_caukp_ebonding_provider_id":"","roles":"","direct":"false","description":"","disable_suggesting":"false","sn_grc_target_table":"","sys_class_name":"Knowledge","article_id":"b3b3f1e91babe090ef4543b4bd4bcb39","sys_id":"6a3abea38701e210bbe855b73cbb3553","use_count":"0","flagged":"false","disable_commenting":"false","valid_to":"2026-04-28","retired":"","u_add_to_homepage":"false","u_video_url":"","display_attachments":"false","latest":"true","summary":{"display_value":"KB0018778","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_summary/da54195e1bbf6010ef4543b4bd4bcb79"},"sys_view_count":"24","revised_by":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"5","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"Global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/6878fb4f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcbae"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-12-04 01:17:35","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0019010","sys_updated_by":"kohj323","sys_created_on":"2024-12-04 00:43:23","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease recognises the importance of spending time with new family members. We offer parental care leave over and above the current statutory entitlements to mothers, fathers and partners where feasible.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our parental care leave is an employee benefit that provides paid and unpaid leave benefits to parents upon the birth or adoption of their new-born.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent full-time, fixed-term contract full-time and part-time employees employed on local terms, who have completed three months service (for Singapore) or 90 calendar days (for Malaysia) before the birth/adoption are eligible for parental care leave.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What types of parental care leave are available for Malaysia employees?</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All legislated provisions for Maternity Leave and Paternity Leave have been subsumed under Parental Care Leave.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The parental care leave provision depends on whether the employee is the primary carer of the child - i.e. primarily responsible for meeting the child's needs in the child's first 12 months of birth.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For an employee who is the&nbsp;primary carer&nbsp;of the new-born&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For an employee who is&nbsp;not&nbsp;the primary carer of the new-born&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To allow employees* with primary responsibility for the care of the child to meet their needs and bond with the new-born in the period preceding and following the birth/ adoption, as appropriate.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To allow employees* whose spouses/ partners have primary responsibility for the care of the child to take time off work shortly after the birth/ adoption of a child to support their spouses/ partners and bond with the new-born.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">*Applicable to the mother or father/ partner, as appropriate.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img title=\"Parental care diagram MY.png\" src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=ae8491451b5a16d03569b91f034bcb7e\" alt=\"\" width=\"765\" height=\"447\" />&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">*The child's mother is deemed to have utilised at least 14 weeks of maternity leave as a statutory minimum. The paternity/partner leave is sub-sumed under primary carer leave. Refer to the policy for more information.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=aa8451451b5a16d03569b91f034bcb37\" alt=\"Policy\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018904\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Primary Carer Leave Policy\">Primary Carer Leave Policy</a><a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/sites/people-portal/our-policies/asia/malaysia/leave/primary-carer-leave\"><br /></a></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=aa8451451b5a16d03569b91f034bcb37\" alt=\"Policy\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018897\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Maternity Leave Policy\">Maternity Leave Policy</a><a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/sites/people-portal/our-policies/asia/malaysia/leave/maternity-leave\"><br /></a></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=aa8451451b5a16d03569b91f034bcb37\" alt=\"Policy\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018903\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Paternity/Partner Leave Policy\">Paternity/Partner Leave Policy</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What types of parental care leave are available for Singapore employees?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All legislated provisions for Adoption Leave, Maternity Leave, Paternity Leave and Shared Parental Leave have been subsumed under Parental Care Leave.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The parental care leave provision depends on whether the employee is the primary carer of the child - i.e. primarily responsible for meeting the child's needs in the child's first 12 months of birth.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For an employee who is the&nbsp;primary carer&nbsp;of the new-born&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For an employee who is&nbsp;not&nbsp;the primary carer of the new-born&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To allow employees* with primary responsibility for the care of the child to meet their needs and bond with the new-born in the period preceding and following the birth/ adoption, as appropriate.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 1.5pt solid #000000; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To allow employees* whose spouses/ partners have primary responsibility for the care of the child to take time off work shortly after the birth/ adoption of a child to support their spouses/ partners and bond with the new-born.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">*Applicable to the mother or father/ partner, as appropriate.</span></p>\r\n<p><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=23d4d9451b5a16d03569b91f034bcb62\" width=\"716\" height=\"675\" /><br /><br /></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=aa8451451b5a16d03569b91f034bcb37\" alt=\"Policy\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; For these periods, Lendlease provides leave without pay to eligible employees.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div id=\"textAccordion\">\r\n<div id=\"multiRow_row1_0_col1_0_inner1_0_col2_5_expandCollapseLinks\"></div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What are the eligibility requirements?</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent employees are eligible, subject to policy conditions.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where employees are employed under the terms and conditions of an operative enterprise agreement with a Lendlease group company, please refer to the relevant enterprise agreement as to whether or not this policy applies to you.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Each application will be assessed on its own merits and will only be granted at the discretion of your manager and/or business unit head.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">How do I apply?</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<table>\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN</strong></span></td>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Extended Leave Without Pay Policy&nbsp;</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PREPARE</strong>&nbsp;</span></td>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Complete the Application for Leave of Absence form and discuss your intention to take leave without pay with your manager.&nbsp;</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ACT&nbsp;</strong></span></td>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Following the discussion with your manager, submit your leave in Workday using the Absence Worklet. Ensure you attach your completed Leave of Absence form to your Workday leave request.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When applying for leave, ensure your annual leave balance is exhausted first, then select AUS Sabbatical Leave.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FINALISE</strong>&nbsp;</span></td>\r\n<td style=\"border-style: solid; border-color: #5c5858;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your manager will approve your leave through Workday.&nbsp;</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br>How do I apply to extend my leave?</span></strong>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss with your manager and submit the additional leave in Workday. Your manager will approve through Workday.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can only extend your leave of absence period to a maximum of one year (total unpaid leave).</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: or keeping your skills contemporary.&nbsp; Having a Development Plan helps you focus your learning activities to help you deliver on goals set.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Development Planning for People Managers</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a people leader, you are responsible for working with your team to ensure they have a relevant development that aligns with their goals.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Ideally, you would discuss development plans at Goal Setting time or when a new starter arrives.&nbsp; You would also revisit the development plan at your regular 1:1 meetings.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Think about the learning opportunities that might support your whole team, or if individuals have their own unique development needs that you can work on together.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Career Profile</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At Lendlease we want to support you and your career development at Lendlease. To be able to support you in having conversations with your manager about how you can reach your full potential, we need to better understand your background &ndash; your current skills, your job history and experience, your interests and preferences.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">One important way to do that is to take just a few minutes to complete your Career Profile in Workday.&nbsp; The system is easy to navigate and will guide you through several tabs to fill in your information. Helptext is included in the tabs and you can save time by simply uploading your resume. You do not have to complete your career profile in one sitting, Workday will automatically save your progress.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; The programme is designed to encourage employees to attract and refer quality talent to Lendlease. It exists to recognise and reward our employees who play an active role in strengthening our human capital and in doing so, help to contribute to the long-term success of Lendlease.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All current vacancies will be posted on Workday.</span><br /></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I make a referral?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Step 1<br /></strong> View open vacancies via Find Internal Roles in Workday.&nbsp; Open the role and click the refer button</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Step 2<br /></strong> Complete and submit the referral form.&nbsp; If the Referring employee chooses to attach the candidate's CV to the referral they must have prior permission from the candidate.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Step 3<br /></strong> The referring employee will be notified if their referred candidate is placed, and the payment fee will be confirmed.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; PREPARE<br></strong>As Compensation Review approaches, it's your opportunity as a People Manager to reflect on your team's performance and prepare for making decisions about Pay. There are 3 steps to the process and plenty of resources to guide you through the Review:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Year%20End%20Compensation%20Review%20Process%20Map%20FINAL.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Compensation Review Process Map</a></span><br><a href=\"https://p2.aprimocdn.net/lendlease/ed3cfc75-2e8b-4f8d-988c-aec200228ced/Merit_%26_Bonus_0001.mp4_WebVideo.mp4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"How are Bonus &amp; Merit Budgets determined\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">How are Bonus &amp; Merit Budgets determined</span></a></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>02. DECIDE &amp; ENTER&nbsp;<br></strong>When the annual process is launched, a task will be delivered to People Manager's Workday inbox. Depending on your notification&nbsp;preferences you may also receive a notification to your Outlook inbox. When deciding on Pay&nbsp;recommendations, there are a few things to consider as you enter these into&nbsp;<a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/login.htmld\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Workday</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Year%20End%20Compensation%20Review%20at%20a%20Glance%20ENG%20FINAL.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Compensation Review at a Glance</a></span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Year%20End%20Comp%20Resources%20Quick%20Facts%20Guide%20and%20Glossary%20ENGLISH.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" title=\"Year End Comp Quick Facts Guide and Glossary - English\">Year End Comp Quick Facts Guide and Glossary - English</a></span><br><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Year%20End%20Comp%20Resources%20Quick%20Facts%20Guide%20and%20Glossary%20ITALIAN.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Year End Comp Quick Facts Guide and Glossary - Italian\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Year End Comp Quick Facts Guide and Glossary - Italian</span></a></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>03. CONVERSATION<br></strong>As a People Manager, one of your responsibilities is to make sure your employees have a positive experience at work. The Year End Pay Conversation, is an opportunity to deliver a positive experience. Here are some resources to help you have the conversation.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Year%20End%20Pay%20Conversation%20Guide_FY25.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Year End Pay Conversations Guide</a></span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/FAQs%20for%20Review%20Managers.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" title=\"Review Manager FAQs\">Review Manager FAQs</a></span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To Develop People Management Skills visit <a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/learning\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Workday Learning</a></span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/5%20UAT%20HBR%20How%20to%20Discuss%20Pay%20Article%20Advice%20for%20Managers%20POA.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Harvard Business Review: How to Discuss Pay with Your employees</a></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Note</strong>: To be eligible for a bonus or salary increase you must not be under notice of termination prior to or on the payment date in your region (e.g. you have given notice of resignation or the Company has given you notice that your employment will terminate**).</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: 82.6158%; font-size: 12pt;\">Through this program we encourage eligible employees to refer individuals whom they believe align with our culture and values, and who would be a positive addition to our business. &nbsp;There is no limit to the number of candidate referrals you can submit, just make sure you have obtained the referred candidate's permission.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease recognises that from time to time issues may arise involving employees, service providers or other workers about matters at work, including:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discrimination;&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Bullying or harassment;&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Work relationships;&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Whistleblower contacts;&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Staff entitlements or conditions of employment; and&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Decisions made by other staff members which impact their work</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Should an employee raise an issue with you, please review the below options to determine the most appropriate course of action.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Option 1 - Self Help</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where an employee, service provider or other worker has an issue, they should, if it is appropriate, in the first instance try to address the issue directly with the person involved.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Option 2 - Immediate Manager</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where an employee, service provider or other worker has an issue that cannot be resolved directly with the person involved they should raise it with their immediate manager. &nbsp;All issues raised to the immediate manager will be managed confidentially. &nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If the issue relates to the employee&rsquo;s immediate manager, then the employee should raise the issue to that person&rsquo;s manager. &nbsp;The manager may seek guidance from People &amp; Culture on the most appropriate way of dealing with the issue. &nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The manager will agree the course of action with the employee; advise the employee of the outcome of their investigation into the issue; and advise the employee of any action to occur based on the findings of the manager&rsquo;s investigation into the issue. &nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Option 3 - People &amp; Culture</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees can discuss their grievance directly with their Strategic Business Partner/People &amp; Culture&nbsp;Manager. &nbsp;The Strategic Business Partner will discuss options with them on how to address their grievance, which may include the involvement of the line manager. &nbsp;It could also include: &nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a.&nbsp;&nbsp;Requesting further information from the employee, service provider or other worker;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b.&nbsp;&nbsp;Requesting information from other employees, service providers, other workers or third parties;&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c.&nbsp;&nbsp;Meeting with the employee, service provider, other worker or others involved in the issue; or</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">d.&nbsp;&nbsp;Reviewing and responding to the issue or arranging for an appropriate person to review and respond to the issue.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Option 4 - Employee Conduct Hotline</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Lendlease&nbsp;<a href=\"https://secure.ethicspoint.com/domain/media/en/gui/28300/index.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Employee Conduct Hotline</a>, is a secure, confidential and independent channel for you to raise concerns, seek further assistance and report potential conduct breaches, particularly when you have not felt comfortable in reporting these through other channels. The employee conduct hotline is hosted by an external organisation EthicsPoint.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: loan refinancing.&nbsp; Checking your rate takes two minutes and has zero impact on your credit score since SoFi only does a soft credit inquiry.&nbsp; Additionally, you may qualify to receive a $100 Welcome Bonus upon refinancing your student or Parent PLUS loans through <a href=\"https://www.sofi.com/lendlease\" rel=\"nofollow\">www.sofi.com/lendlease</a></span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span requirements?</strong></span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active employees and their families are eligible for this Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease provides a competitive Paid Time Off (PTO) program that combines sick, vacation and personal days to be taken as needs arise.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PTO is accrued on a bi-weekly basis and will be paid as part of your normal pay-check. Employees should plan their time off based on the accrued available balance. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Employees with up to 10 years of service accrue 20 PTO days annually.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull; Employees with 10 years of service or more accrue 25 PTO days annually.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PTO cannot be used as last day worked when leaving Lendlease.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active, salaried employees scheduled to work 30 or more hours per week are eligible.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility requirements</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the PTO policy</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Verify your available balance then discuss your requirements for taking time off with your manager and obtain their approval. Employees should only go into a negative balance with their manager&rsquo;s prior approval and it should be managed closely to ensure a positive balance can be achieved in a reasonable amount of time.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once approved, enter the Request for Absence in the Workday &gt; Absence worklet.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Record the PTO hours taken on your E1 timesheet.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are a site-based employee, your supervisor may require you to submit a PTO request form, as well, prior to taking scheduled time off.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease offers employees Accident and Hospital Insurance through MetLife.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>MetLife Accident Insurance<br></strong> This employee-paid policy helps take care of expenses incurred due to certain losses above those covered by your medical plan.&nbsp; It helps pay for additional costs incurred as a result of various injuries, medical services, treatments and hospital stays caused by accidents only.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>MetLife Hospital Indemnity Insurance<br></strong> This employee-paid policy helps take care of expenses incurred during hospitalization above those covered by your medical plan. It helps pay for additional costs incurred during covered hospital stays, in-patient rehab, and more due to sickness or accidents.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active full-time salaried employees are eligible to elect any of the voluntary policies.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Newly hired employees are eligible to elect these voluntary benefits when electing their healthcare benefits. Elections must be completed within 31 days from the employee&rsquo;s start date. Current employees may elect this benefit during our annual open enrollment or if they experience a qualifying life event during the year.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br><span style=\"color: #008080;\">How can I manage my account?</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you wish to make changes to your coverage please call the Benefits Center at 844 549 6210</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\">Can be used to help cover your medical deductibles</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Competitive group rates</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;
