2018</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review Date</span></strong><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">April 2018</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Next Review Date</span></strong><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">24 May 2020</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Purpose<br /></strong> Lendlease is committed to constantly challenging our performance and pushing the boundaries so that our approach to Health and Safety (H&amp;S) is aligned to the evolution of the Lendlease strategy, remains effective and fit for purpose for the sectors and markets in which we operate and positively influences H&amp;S outcomes in everything we do.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Scope<br /></strong> This Group Policy applies to all Lendlease businesses. This policy applies to employees, consultants and contractors; permanent, fixed-term and casual (Aust only) contracts; full and part-time; salaried, wages (Aust only) or union (US only). This policy applies in all geographies in which Lendlease operates.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Policy<br /></strong> In recent times, our aspiration has been to shift our people&rsquo;s relationship with health, safety and wellbeing from one which is transactional and compliance based towards a more empowering relationship where people are encouraged and supported to use informed judgement and sound risk management techniques.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Underlying this focus is the H&amp;S Strategic Direction. This defines the actions and focus of leadership and management in providing effective oversight and management of H&amp;S at all levels across the business in the following areas:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Disciplined delivery</strong>&nbsp;&ndash; supporting the embedment of the Global Minimum Requirements (GMRs) in achieving a more disciplined and consistent delivery model.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Strong risk management</strong>&nbsp;&ndash; transforming people&rsquo;s relationship with H&amp;S by empowering them to care and manage risk through informed judgement.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Driving innovation</strong>&nbsp;&ndash; utilising the innovation pathway to provide focus and direction to solutions that can positively affect safety outcomes.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We also remain committed to ensuring our operations remain focused and engaged and to reviewing the composition of the function to ensure we remain as effective as possible in executing this strategy. Although we operate in a dynamic environment and changes will be made to enhance our strategy, the H&amp;S Strategic Direction is resolute and focused in these areas.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Achieving this aspiration relies on the implementation of a simple and effective framework that assists our day-to-day decision making and helps our business function safely. Our 2015 GMRs drive this approach across five stages of the operational lifecycle. These include governance, investment, design and planning, establishing work environments and delivery, setting parameters on the control and elimination of key risk events faced by our business. There is a deliberate focus on front-end planning and strong risk management meaning that safety begins for Lendlease well before a project commences and irrespective of the working environment.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The H&amp;S Strategic Direction and GMR Framework are essential components in ensuring the safety, health and wellbeing of our people remains our priority. This approach also empowers people to identify and manage H&amp;S risks that are applicable to them, promotes moving beyond minimum statutory and organisational requirements, and leads to innovation and continual improvement. They are all key attributes in our aspiration to create places that care and which are free from incident and injury.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Definitions<br /></strong> GMRs&nbsp;Global Minimum Requirements &ndash; our safety framework.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Further information and related materials<br /></strong> Download a copy of this&nbsp;<a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/-/media/intranet/pulse/documents/aboutus/policies/1-people/final-internal-hs-policy-2018-pdf.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=249FD5DCE9B3B4ED1E70A5E81F5D6E00C2934ADE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" style=\"color: #000000;\">Health &amp; Safety Policy<br /></a> <a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/Microsite-Health-Wellbeing\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" style=\"color: #000000;\" title=\"H&amp;S Microsite\">H&amp;S Microsite</a>&nbsp;- this part of our intranet will provide you with further information on our approach to Health and Safety, including our GMRs.</span></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Study leave is provided for eligible employees to engage in formal study programs. Lendlease encourages employees to develop skills and acquire new skills and recognised qualifications relevant to their current role or future career within the organisation.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent employees of Lendlease are eligible.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees bound by an operative enterprise agreement to which Lendlease is the employer may have varying benefits. Please refer to the relevant agreement for specific terms and conditions that apply to you.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In addition, employees must meet the following criteria to qualify for consideration:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"margin-left: 10px; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"> - Completed their probation period;</span><br /><span style=\"margin-left: 20px; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"> - The proposed course/qualifications must be beneficial to the performance of the employee in their current or future roles with Lendlease; and</span><br /><span style=\"margin-left: 30px; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"> - The course must be deemed by Lendlease to be accredited&nbsp;by a reputable institution and lead to a recognised credential/qualification (e.g. diploma, degree, etc).</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: #ffffff; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Screen </span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Go to the Recruiting Worklet</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. On the Workday homepage, go to the recruiting Worklet and select <strong>Create Job Requisition</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p style=\"position: relative; min-height: 190px;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=08d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb0b\" alt=\"\" width=\"225px\" height=\"193px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"position: relative; min-height: 106px;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=44d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb2f\" alt=\"\" width=\"141px\" height=\"155px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 226.55pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Create New Position</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Select <strong>Create New Position</strong> from the options available</span></p>\r\n<p align=\"center\"><br /></p>\r\n<p align=\"center\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c4d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb31\" alt=\"\" width=\"53px\" height=\"17px\" />to continue</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p align=\"center\"><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=48d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb33\" alt=\"\" width=\"325px\" height=\"179px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">3.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 226.55pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Recruiting Information</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Click the pencil to edit<strong> <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb35\" alt=\"\" width=\"30px\" height=\"26px\" /></strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Confirm the number of openings</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. Select the reason &ndash; <span style=\"color: #0070c0;\">IMPORTANT</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; For External hires select <strong>New Position </strong>or<strong> Replacement</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; For Internal move select <strong>Employee Position Change</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Then select the applicable labour type of the new position based on the following options:</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Origination</strong>: Costs associated with business development, tendering and estimating activities in order to originate additional order pipeline for the business unit.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"> &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"> <strong>Overhead</strong>: Roles that support the businesses in the above activities and are not recovered.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Recoverable (Delivery or Project)</strong>: Roles associated with overseeing and executing the projects or services. Includes tendering and estimating activity.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Graduate</strong> &ndash; On the graduate program</span><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Recruiting Instruction</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The instruction for the recruiter to post this job internally, externally, both or neither. The recruiters are not authorised to recruit externally for any of these roles that are tagged for Internal Only. Lendlease has many talented people who may be interested and available to meet your resourcing needs.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If roles can&rsquo;t be filled within our existing workforce, your relevant GLT member will need to approve any external recruitment prior to any recruiting commencing.&nbsp; Where your manager approves your external recruitment request, the job requisition will be routed to the relevant GLT member for approval.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">d. Enter today&rsquo;s date for the Recruiting start date and the Target hire date</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><em> (Or if backdated enter actual date of hire)</em></span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">e. If the New position is fixed term please enter a target end date</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"position: relative; min-height: 30px;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img style=\"position: absolute; top: 11px; left: 77px;\" src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=04d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb44\" alt=\"\" width=\"54px\" height=\"19px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">f. Click to continue</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=84d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb46\" alt=\"\" width=\"183px\" height=\"112px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=08d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb48\" alt=\"\" width=\"156px\" height=\"188px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=4cd312201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb22\" alt=\"\" width=\"207px\" height=\"205px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=ccd312201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb24\" alt=\"\" width=\"131px\" height=\"184px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">4.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 226.55pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Job </strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><em>Add the job profile first as this will pre-populate the descriptions</em></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Click the pencil to edit <strong><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb35\" alt=\"\" width=\"30px\" height=\"26px\" /></strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Enter the job title</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. Justification is a mandatory field. Provide information for your manager and/or GLT member to approve e.g. project ramp up, replacement for resignation; parental leave cover etc.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"> Enter the reason why you are recruiting for this role </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">d. Select the CJF code for this role &ndash; note this will auto-populate the description fields</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">e. For <strong>AMER</strong>, please reference the <a href=\"http://workspace.lendlease.com/pulse/HR/Documents/AMER%20Regional%20Job%20Title%20List.xlsx\">Master Titles list</a> to ensure you have the correct Job Posting Title and CJF for Workday</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">f. Enter Casual, Fixed Term or Permanent in the Worker Sub-Type</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">g. Enter Full-time or Part-time in the Time-Type </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">h. Enter the primary location where this role will be based &ndash; enter a key word in the search to find the required location. </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">i. If role is part time amend Scheduled Weekly Hours</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">j. Select the position&rsquo;s normal work shift from the list</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">k. Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=08d312201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcbfa\" alt=\"\" width=\"55px\" height=\"19px\" /> to continue</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=88d312201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcbfc\" alt=\"\" width=\"272px\" height=\"263px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=0cd312201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcbfe\" alt=\"\" width=\"160px\" height=\"413px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">5. </span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 226.55pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Organizations</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Click the pencil to edit <strong><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb35\" alt=\"\" width=\"30px\" height=\"26px\" /></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Note: </strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><em>The majority of these fields are auto-populated based on your own organisational data. Please check that the organisational details are correct.</em></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; position: relative; min-height: 16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. For Australia only &ndash; you must indicate whether the role is salaried or wages. Leaving this blank will cause problems later in the process.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=8cd352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb00\" alt=\"\" width=\"192px\" height=\"415px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Attachments</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Add additional documentation (e.g. additional approvals) if necessary</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For UK only &ndash; please ensure you attach the Job Description </span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have nothing to attach click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=08d312201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcbfa\" alt=\"\" width=\"55px\" height=\"19px\" />to continue</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">7.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 226.55pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Compensation</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Australian TPV only &ndash; Primary Compensation Basis</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Click the pencil to edit <strong><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb35\" alt=\"\" width=\"30px\" height=\"26px\" /></strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Enter the proposed TPV (Base + Super) for the role here. </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><em>(Note: If you have left the Salaried/Wages field blank on the Organizations screen you will not be able to enter anything in this section).</em></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>All other regions - Salary</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. Click the pencil to edit <strong><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb35\" alt=\"\" width=\"30px\" height=\"26px\" /></strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">d. Enter the proposed annual salary in the Amount field.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Australian Wages only - hourly</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">e. Click the pencil to edit <strong><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb35\" alt=\"\" width=\"30px\" height=\"26px\" /></strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">f. Enter the proposed hourly rate (without super)</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">g. The TPV or salary that you enter should fit within the Pay Range for the CJF code you have selected. If the amount is above the range the Job Requisition will require a higher level of approval.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">h. If the position will be receiving an Allowance in addition to what is displayed, click <strong>Add</strong> and select from the dropdown list.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">i. If the position will be receiving a Bonus, click <strong>Add</strong> and select the appropriate Compensation Plan from the dropdown list.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Notes: </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; Most (Salaried) employees are on a Variable Payment Plan (VPP). </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; For Australian Salaried positions you must enter either a bonus plan or a commission plan in order to proceed</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">j. If the position has a commission associated with it then please enter this here, otherwise leave blank.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">k. Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=08d312201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcbfa\" alt=\"\" width=\"55px\" height=\"19px\" /> to continue</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=80d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb05\" alt=\"\" width=\"201px\" height=\"121px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=04d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb07\" alt=\"\" width=\"243px\" height=\"230px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"position: relative; min-height: 160px;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=84d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb09\" alt=\"\" width=\"174px\" height=\"160px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=88d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb0d\" alt=\"\" width=\"202px\" height=\"298px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=44d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb1e\" alt=\"\" width=\"170px\" height=\"112px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c4d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb20\" alt=\"\" width=\"105px\" height=\"80px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">8.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 226.55pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Summary</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Review the information entered is correct for the position and click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=48d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb22\" alt=\"\" width=\"55px\" height=\"21px\" /><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb24\" alt=\"\" width=\"55px\" height=\"21px\" />to progress.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. If anything is incorrect please click the pencil <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=4cd352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb26\" alt=\"\" width=\"30px\" height=\"26px\" />to edit any of the sections.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. If you receive an error message when you click submit, please review and amend the sections as advised.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=ccd352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb28\" alt=\"\" width=\"325px\" height=\"54px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">9.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 226.55pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Up Next &ndash; Project Number</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Click the Edit Additional Data button</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Enter your Project Number for the role to be costed to. </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c8d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb24\" alt=\"\" width=\"55px\" height=\"21px\" />to finalise the Job Requisition and send for approvals.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p><a name=\"_Hlk521568883\"></a><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Project Number tips:</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; The project number is 6 digits long and in all cases except for Services, will be numeric.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; For Services it can be a combination of numbers and letters and split with a hyphen (e.g. 123-abc).</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; If you are not sure of the Project Number then please check with your Line Manager. </span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; If your Line Manager is unsure then they can contact their payroll team or their Project Accounting and Reporting (PAR) team for assistance.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; The project number is <strong>not</strong> the same Cost Center or Profit Centre.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; Grads should not be assigned the project number for the first team they are assigned to, these cases should be assigned to an overall code for the entity &ndash; these might be split by region for some entities</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=40d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb2b\" alt=\"\" width=\"133px\" height=\"92px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=c0d352201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcb2d\" alt=\"\" width=\"228px\" height=\"58px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p class=\"footer\" Hinks","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/6a5918de13801a00d774fc04e144b08d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"Global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/aba8ff4f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb4d"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-02-29 Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will provide leave of absence for employees who are required for jury service. The employee will continue to be paid at their normal rate of pay during the period they are required for jury service, subject to the deduction of any monies received from the court.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The same approach applies to employees who are summoned as a witness.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This policy applies to all UK Lendlease employees regardless of length of service. It does not apply to agency workers or self-employed contractors.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The current legislative requirements for individuals undertaking jury service are:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - They are at least 18 years old and not over the age of 70;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - They are registered on a parliamentary or local government electoral roll; and&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- They have lived in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for at least five consecutive years since they were 13 years old.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility requirements.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read the jury service policy.</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Notify your manager as soon as you receive a jury summons notice.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You may apply to the court to either be excused from or defer your jury service if your absence will have a serious impact on business. You should discuss this with your manager prior to submitting the request and follow the notice laid down in the jury summons notice. Attendance can only be deferred once in a 12 month period.</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Following the discussion with your manager, if you will be attending jury service you should notify People Connect of the intended time off work, and provide a copy of the court summons and estimated loss of earnings.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are required to the keep your manager and People Connect informed of the likely length of time you are expected to be absent from work on jury service. If on any particular day or half day you are not required by the court, you are required to return to work if practical to do so. The same approach should be followed if you are summoned as a witness.</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">People Connect will complete the loss of earnings form and return it to you with a covering letter confirming the process.&nbsp; You should then sign and return the provided employee copy authorising a deduction from your salary equaling any payment from the court.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When you have completed your jury service, provide a copy of the cheque or BACS payment received and a summary sheet provided by the court to People Connect. On receipt, People Connect will arrange to deduct the loss of earnings amount from your next available salary.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Who can I contact for further information?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have questions or clarifications regarding jury service, contact People Connect online by clicking the button on the top right hand corner of this page.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=0d356c811bc47410b03a9829bc4bcb81\" alt=\"NextPlaceTechnologyBLKPNG 1 png\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\" /></span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 525.0pt; margin-right: 13.5pt; margin-top: 2.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">A new position is required when you are changing </span><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">the major</span><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\"> details of an employee&rsquo;s role. </span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"body_Text\" style=\"margin-left: 7.1pt; margin-right: 13.5pt; margin-top: 2.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">Details that </span><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">require </span><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">a new position include </span><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">Promotions, CJF change, change of Grade under an Enterprise Agreement, chan</span><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">ge in Employing Entity.</span><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\"> In most cases an employee moving into your team will also require a new position.</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"body_Text\" style=\"margin-right: 13.5pt; margin-top: 2.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"body_Text\" style=\"margin-right: 13.5pt; margin-top: 2.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\">Note:</span></strong><span style=\"color: #3e3f2c;\"> Change in hours, Fixed-term contract extension and change in location do not require a new position</span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"position: relative; min-height: 10px;\"><br /></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: 510.1pt; top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">1.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Starting a Job Change request for someone in your team</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a manager you are able to &lsquo;push&rsquo; an employee from your team into another team. Ensure that there is a vacant role in the receiving team to move the employee into and that you have had discussions with the current manager to confirm the move.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Search for the employee you wish to Job Change in the search bar</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Or</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Find the employee in My Team Management</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Click the related action button to Access Job Change</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. Select Start Job Change</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b47356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcba3\" alt=\"\" width=\"245px\" height=\"72px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b07356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcbb0\" alt=\"\" width=\"56px\" height=\"78px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=347356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcbb2\" alt=\"\" width=\"157px\" height=\"50px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b47356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcbb4\" alt=\"\" width=\"181px\" height=\"71px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">2.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Start screen</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. The Worker name and Job should default to the employee you are entering the Job Change for.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Select <strong>Full Job Change or Secondment</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. For Location and Hours Change and Move to a new manager</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Note</strong>: Please ensure you select the correct reason at this stage as this cannot be amended later.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=387356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcbb6\" alt=\"\" width=\"75px\" height=\"25px\" /> to begin</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b87356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcbb8\" alt=\"\" width=\"269px\" height=\"156px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">3.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Start</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. If the manager is changing, then indicate this here.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Note</strong>: you will not be able to change the manager once you move past this screen</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. The team and location will default based on the manager. Please amend these if necessary.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. Scroll through the following screen and complete the various sections:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Note</strong>: If you have selected Full Job Change on the previous screen, the &ldquo;Why are you making this change&rdquo; field will default to Job Data Change on this screen.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Move</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Confirm what you would like to do with position in your team</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; <u>Move this headcount to the new manager</u><strong>&nbsp;&ndash;</strong>&nbsp;you will lose the position the employee currently sits in&nbsp;from your team. The Receiving manager should be in the&nbsp;<em>same Legal Entity (Company).</em>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"> TIP:&nbsp;If the receiving manager is in a different company&nbsp;please select either Backfill or Close.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; <u>I plan to backfill this headcount</u><strong>&nbsp;</strong>&ndash;&nbsp;you will be able to recruit another employee or external hire into this position.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&middot; <u>Close this headcount</u>&nbsp;&ndash; you no longer require this headcount in your team and&nbsp;will not be backfilling the position.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. If you plan to backfill the headcount then you must check the Position available for overlap must be checked. Otherwise leave this unchecked</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"> <strong>Attachments</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. If you have any documents relating to this job change please upload them here </span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Compensation</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are a manager pushing the employee from your team you do not need to enter anything in the Compensation section.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"paragraph\" style=\"margin-top: 0.0pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=bc7356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcbbc\" alt=\"\" width=\"148px\" height=\"188px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a manager you are able to &lsquo;pull&rsquo; an employee from another team into your team. Ensure you have a vacant role in your team to move the employee into and that you have had discussions with the current manager to confirm the move.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt; margin-top: 5.9pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Select Request Transfer</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b47356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcba3\" alt=\"\" width=\"245px\" height=\"72px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=387356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb94\" alt=\"\" width=\"325px\" height=\"46px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b87356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb96\" alt=\"\" width=\"277px\" height=\"90px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">5.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Start screen</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Enter the effective date of the job change</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. For all changes other than Secondment, select <strong>Job Data Change</strong> as the reason why you are making this change. If the employee is being Seconded to another team then select Secondment.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=3c7356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb98\" alt=\"\" width=\"68px\" height=\"22px\" />to begin</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=bc7356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb9a\" alt=\"\" width=\"209px\" height=\"283px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">6.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Move</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If the person you are moving is a manager, you will be asked to confirm if their team will be moving with them &ndash; select Yes or No</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=307356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb9d\" alt=\"\" width=\"269px\" height=\"73px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">7.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Submit screen</strong></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Review the details on the start and move sections and click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b07356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb9f\" alt=\"\" width=\"90px\" height=\"32px\" /> to finalise and send for approvals</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\"><br /></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">8.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Releasing an employee from your team</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">If the new manager has raised a job change to pull an employee from your team into their team you will need to approve this move.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Navigate to your inbox and review the data change email</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Update the move date if this is not correct</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. You can also confirm here whether you plan to backfill, move the headcount to the new manager or close the headcount. See point 3 of this guide for more information on these options.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">d. Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=347356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcba1\" alt=\"\" width=\"96px\" height=\"33px\" />to send to the new manager for further approval</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=387356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcba5\" alt=\"\" width=\"287px\" height=\"98px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=b87356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcba7\" alt=\"\" width=\"247px\" height=\"173px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">9.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 269.1pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Receiving manager</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will receive an email to approve the Job Change once the releasing manager has approved.</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a. Check the start date is correct</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. In the Position section confirm the position in your team that the employee will be moving into</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c. When you select the Position the Job title will auto populate with the CJF Job title. You will need to manually amend this to the actual title of the role</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">d. Adjust the Primary Compensation Basis to fit the role</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">e. Check all other details are correct and click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=347356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcba1\" alt=\"\" width=\"96px\" height=\"33px\" />to finalise</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Note</strong>: You need to create the position to move the employee into before you do the Job Change.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 212.6pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=3c7356ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcba9\" alt=\"\" width=\"213px\" height=\"237px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Authorized Time Off (ATO) is paid time off work provided to manage circumstances outside of your control or to engage in select community-related activities during normal business hours (e.g. jury duty, bereavement or office closings due to inclement weather, etc.).</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active, salaried US employees scheduled to work 30 or more hours per week are eligible.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees are unable to take ATO time during days they are not scheduled to be at work. For example, you are not eligible for ATO if you take a Paid Time Off (PTO) day, or half day, on the same day the company has offered two hours of ATO for early office hours closing.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review eligibility requirements.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Identify if your reason for leave meets the authorized time off (ATO) policy requirements.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss plans with your manager prior to taking ATO. If you cannot let your manager know prior to the leave, please advise your manager as soon as possible</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once approval from your manager is received, record ATO time taken on your timesheet via E1 employee self service (E1 ESS).</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">NOTE: Exempt employees (salaried employees unable to code overtime hours) exceeding 40 hours per week or non-exempt employees exceeding eight hours per day should not record ATO time on their timesheets</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table
