Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The People's Pension is a workplace pension scheme operated by B&amp;CE. The Scheme has been chosen by Lendlease to support the Government initiative 'Automatic Enrolment' (AE), aimed at helping workers to save more for their retirement.&nbsp;</span><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The initiative requires Lendlease to automatically enroll you into a qualifying pension scheme if you are not already in one, provided you meet the eligibility criteria:</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Members of the People's Pension have been automatically enrolled by the Company because they have not opted in to the Lendlease UK Pension Scheme and meet the criteria for AE or have chosen to join.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The criteria are below:&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Earn over &pound;10,000 a year;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Work in the United Kingdom;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Are aged 22 or over; and&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Are under State Pension age.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are automatically enrolled by Lendlease after joining, you will make your first contribution to the People's Pension in the third month after your start date at Lendlease.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the entitlements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The People&rsquo;s Pension Scheme operates on an employee and employer contribution as a percentage of your base salary as per the below table.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Company Contribution</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2% of your base salary</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee Contribution</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1% of your base salary&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\" colspan=\"2\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Total = 3% of your base salary paid directly into your pension account</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The deductions will be taken monthly from your salary by salary sacrifice meaning that you will receive tax and national insurance relief on your contribution at the highest rate you pay.</span></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Charges</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Investment charges apply to your pension account and, the current rate is 0.5% of the value of your account which equates to 50 pence per year for every &pound;100 invested.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your pension at retirement is based on the contributions paid in and investment return. You can visit the People's Pension website for further information on how the scheme works.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the benefits of the People's Pension?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a member of the People's Pension Scheme you can benefit from:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Tax relief at your highest marginal rate and pay no National Insurance on contributions.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;The option to increase your own personal contributions by making regular monthly Additional Voluntary Contributions (AVC&rsquo;s)&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Take up to 25% of your pension as a tax free lump sum&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Your own pension account, where you can view and manage your account online&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Annual online benefit statements on the performance of your account and potential income at retirement&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Access to tools to help you plan for your future&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Opt to transfer your pension to another registered pension arrangement when you leave Lendlease&nbsp;or continue to participate in the People's Pension</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I join the People&rsquo;s Pension?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility criteria.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through The People&rsquo;s Pension FAQs document available under the Resources section of this page.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please note that if you do not opt in to the Lendlease UK Pension Scheme and you meet the government criteria you will be automatically enrolled in The People&rsquo;s Pension three months after you join Lendlease.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can complete and return either:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The application form included with your new hire offer pack; or&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The People's Pension Joiner Application form available under the Resources section.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\">If you decide to join The People&rsquo;s Pension or are automatically enrolled by the Company, a joiner pack will be sent to your home address providing you with further details about the Scheme and where your money is invested.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have any questions about The People&rsquo;s Pension Scheme please contact their helpdesk on 0300 2000 444. You can access your personal account using The People&rsquo;s Pension secure website. &nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Who can I contact regarding the benefit?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are new to Lendlease and unsure of your entitlement, please ask People Connect using the button on the top right hand corner of this page. &nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Existing scheme members can contact The People&rsquo;s Pension in relation to their pension benefits by email on&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:thepeoplespension@bandce.co.uk\" rel=\"nofollow\">thepeoplespension@bandce.co.uk</a>&nbsp;or by phone on 0300 2000 555.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is Lendlease policy to support employees during the adoption process.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees are eligible to take up to 52 weeks' statutory adoption leave regardless of the number of hours worked and length of service.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees may receive payments during this period, providing they meet further eligibility criteria outlined in the policy.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Family Leave Policy.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss with your manager your intention to adopt.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If adopting from within the UK:</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Inform your manager of the intention to take adoption leave no later than seven days after the date of which notification of the match with the child was provided by the adoption agency. This should state:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The fact that you are requesting adoption leave;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date the child is expected to be placed with you; and</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date you intend to commence adoption leave.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must also provide evidence of entitlement to adoption leave and pay by producing a 'matching certificate' from the adoption agency.</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 8pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 8pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Submit your leave request in Workday.</span><br></span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 8pt;\"><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If adopting from overseas:</span><br></span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Inform your manager&nbsp; in writing of the intention to take adoption leave no later than 28 days after the date of which you receive the official notification. This should state:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The fact that you are requesting adoption leave;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date the official notification was received;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date the child is expected to enter the UK; and</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date you intend to commence adoption leave.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must also provide evidence of entitlement to adoption leave and pay by producing a 'matching certificate' from the adoption agency.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Submit your leave request in Workday.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is a legal requirement that within 28 days of the child's entry into the UK you must inform Lendlease of the date of entry and provide evidence of this date in the form of a plane ticket or copies of entry clearance documents.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will respond in writing within 28 days of receiving your notice of the date in which you intend to begin your adoption leave, confirming the latest date on which you are expected to return to work.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Can I change my adoption leave start date?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are permitted to change your adoption leave start date, provided that you advise your manager in writing at least 28 days before the new start date or, if that is not possible, as soon as reasonably practicable.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Amend your leave request in Workday.</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where you have provided notice of a revised start date, the company will respond in writing to confirm the latest date on which you can return to work.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=4244f9fc97939610ac3ad2b00153afbe\" alt=\"Policy\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\"></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=9e7bfa181b325a90727c0e12604bcba4\" alt=\"\" width=\"601px\" height=\"180px\"></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What is mentoring at Lendlease?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Mentoring is a developmental relationship that allows people to share their professional and personal wisdom, skills and experience.&nbsp;A mentoring relationship is commonly&nbsp;between a more experienced and less experienced employee. However it can also&nbsp;be between a more junior employee who has strong skills in a new technology or emerging field mentoring a senior leader.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Mentoring allows people to grow and develop and provides the opportunity to build the potential of the people in the organisation.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Everyone has different levels of experience when it comes to mentoring. Some may have been mentored by others before and&nbsp;are undertaking their first time as a mentor. Some may be embarking on their first journey as a mentee and others may be seasoned veterans.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How to find a mentor</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There is a mentor relationship for every stage of your development. Each mentoring relationship is unique to the individual so finding a mentor is an individual journey.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Some people may want to find a mentor organically, whether it is at Lendlease or externally. Others may be looking to find a mentor within Lendlease with a specific focus or experience but are not sure how to start. You can begin your search for a mentor in Workday by considering which of the following mentoring relationships is right for you:</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1.5pt solid #DDDDDD;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"text-align: center; Parental leave is available for both primary and non-primary care givers.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We offer paid parental leave over and above the current statutory entitlements for those eligible in addition to the Australian Government&rsquo;s paid parental scheme.<br><br></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements for Parental leave?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent and fixed-term employees are eligible for parental leave from the first day they commence employment with Lendlease.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees bound by an operative enterprise agreement where Lendlease is the employer may have varying benefits. Wages employees and those working in Sales roles may not be covered by this policy. Please review the full policy for further information or refer to your relevant agreement for specific terms and conditions that apply to you.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply for Parental Leave?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Parental Leave Policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss your intention to take parental leave with your manager at least ten (10) weeks prior to leave commencement.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you have had the discussion with your manager, complete a Parental Leave Application Form no less than four (4) weeks prior to going on leave.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will also need to obtain a copy of your medical certificate or notice of adoption to include with your application.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Submit a parental leave request in Workday and attach your Parental Leave form and Medical Certificate.&nbsp; Your Parental Leave period commences on your first day of leave and ends on your last day of leave before returning to work.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FINALISE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">An acknowledgement letter will be emailed to you confirming both the paid and unpaid leave dates for your parental leave.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What additional support does Lendlease provide for employees on parental leave?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To help with balancing work and family life, the below programs are available to Lendlease employees who care for children.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Parental Leavers Guide<br></strong> Our comprehensive&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/LL%20AUS%20Parental%20Leave%20Brochure.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Parental Leavers Guide\">Parental Leavers Guide</a>&nbsp;for employees and managers provides you with all the information you need before you go on parental leave, while you are on parental leave and once you are ready to return to work.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Parents at Lendlease<br></strong> Lendlease has partnered with return to work and career management experts Parents At Work to create the Parents at Lendlease program. Employees have access to the Parents At Work online portal which holds recent parenting content, courses, tools and checklists for employees and managers.</span></p>\r\n<p><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Keeping in touch days<br></strong> Keeping in touch (KIT) days are designed to help employees transition back into the workforce by allowing employees on parental leave to work for a period of up to ten (10) days. Work on a keeping in touch day may include:</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Participating in a planning day</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Attending training</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Attending a conference</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Setting up IT access</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you wish to work a keeping in touch day while you are on parental leave, you should discuss the option with your manager. This is only available if suitable for both the business and you. Following the keeping in touch day, you or your manager will need to notify People Connect of the dates and hours worked in order to credit you accordingly.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Refer to the Parental Leave Policy for full terms and conditions.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60pt; border-right: 1.5pt solid #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; background-color: #ffffff;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=810b3ad14705a210fa3d6da7a46d43ae\" alt=\"Stationery_Paper_BLK_PNG png\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\"></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-right: target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Parental Leave Policy\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Parental Leave Policy</span></a></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60pt; border-right: 1.5pt solid #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; background-color: #ffffff;\">\r\n<p><span Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is Lendlease policy to support employees through pregnancy, maternity leave and a smooth transition back to work.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees are eligible to take maternity leave regardless of the number of hours worked and length of service. This right also applies in the event of a still birth after 24 weeks of pregnancy.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees may receive payments during this period, providing they meet further eligibility criteria outlined in the policy.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Family Leave Policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">On becoming pregnant, you should notify your manager as soon as possible.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Inform your manager in writing by the end of the 15th week before the Expected Week of Childbirth (EWC), which is the Qualifying Week, or as soon as reasonably practicable of:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The fact that you are pregnant;</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The EWC; and</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date on which you intend to start your maternity leave.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter your leave request in Workday.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A completed risk assessment form must also be provided to People Connect.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must also provide the original copy of your MAT B1 form to your manager who will take a verified copy and submit to People Connect prior to leave commencement.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The company will respond in writing within 28 days of receiving your notice of the date in which you intend to begin your maternity leave, confirming the latest date on which you are expected to return to work.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Can I change my maternity leave start date?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are permitted to change your maternity leave start date, provided that you advise your manager and People Connect in writing at least 28 days before the new start date or, if that is not possible, as soon as reasonably practicable.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Amend your leave request in Workday.<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where you have provided notice of a revised start date, the company will respond in writing within 28 days, confirming the latest date on which you can return to work if you take the full 52-week entitlement.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Am I entitled to time off for antenatal appointments?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Pregnant employees are entitled to reasonable time off work with pay for antenatal care which has been arranged or recommended by a doctor, midwife or health visitor.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees should provide as much notice as possible for any appointments.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=468ee93497939610ac3ad2b00153af8c\" alt=\"Policy\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\"></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0020008\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Family Leave Policy\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Family Leave Policy&nbsp;</span></a></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=468ee93497939610ac3ad2b00153af8f\" alt=\"Form\" width=\"47px\" height=\"48px\"></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/FORM%20-%20New%20or%20Expectant%20Mother%27s%20Self%20Assessment.doc?d=w1f37269fbdfd4108bc36ee61d746cdaf&amp;csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=dqGAFo\" Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"x_caukp_ebonding_integration_mode":null,"can_read_user_criteria":"","active":"true","cannot_read_user_criteria":"","published":"2025-01-22","helpful_count":"0","sys_domain_path":"/","u_view_count_all":"681","version":{"display_value":"6.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_version/5e6fe9b497939610ac3ad2b00153af1a"},"x_caukp_ebonding_requester_id":"","meta_description":"It is Lendlease policy to support employees through pregnancy, maternity leave and a smooth transition","kb_knowledge_base":{"display_value":"People Connect Knowledge Base","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_base/01125e5a1b9b685017eeebd22a4bcb44"},"meta":"Maternity Leave","u_problem_type":null,"topic":"General","display_number":"KB0019034 v6.0","base_version":{"display_value":"KB0019034 v5.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge/6f6e5d001be40654d77c76e2cd4bcb0b"},"short_description":"Maternity Leave - UK","u_last_review_date":"2025-01-22","x_caukp_ebonding_provider_id":"","roles":"","direct":"false","description":"","disable_suggesting":"false","sn_grc_target_table":"","sys_class_name":"Knowledge","article_id":"046a1caddb7b2850ee773313e296194f","sys_id":"868ee93497939610ac3ad2b00153af65","use_count":"0","flagged":"false","disable_commenting":"false","valid_to":"2026-01-22","retired":"","u_add_to_homepage":"false","u_video_url":"","display_attachments":"false","latest":"true","summary":{"display_value":"KB0019034","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_summary/f044115e1bbf6010ef4543b4bd4bcba6"},"sys_view_count":"13","revised_by":{"display_value":"Norhaniza Binti Mohd Razali","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/b8d1a1cc47716510fa3d6da7a46d436d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"EUR","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/71c8ff4f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb51"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-02-29 00:08:09","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0018795","sys_updated_by":"raiv416","sys_created_on":"2021-05-07 01:41:31","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"color: #008080;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Group People &amp; Culture</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1.5pt solid #DDDDDD;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approver's name and title:</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Alex Christie,</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Global Head of People &amp; Culture&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Effective date:</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">January 2016</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approval date:</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">January 2020</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Next review date:</strong> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">January 2022</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease is committed to creating the best places and to create the best places, we need to ensure we have the best people who can honour our goals and values. The objective of the employment screening process is to ensure the integrity, identity and credentials of employees. Employment screening helps to address a range of employee related risks, such as internal fraud and money laundering and a candidate&rsquo;s suitability for a role.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Effective employment screening helps to enable Lendlease to make prudent decisions on hiring, promotions and changes of duties that are based on an informed understanding of an individual&rsquo;s background and credentials. Screening also helps to ensure compliance with legislative and regulatory requirements.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This Group Policy applies to all employees in all locations and in particular applies to:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Executives - all new hires and internal transfers or promotions into Executive roles;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Specified Roles - all new hires and internal transfers into Specified Roles;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Retirement Living &nbsp;- all new hires and transfers within the business; and Prospective and current employees may be subject to Medical Screening where appropriate</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">all new hires and transfers into a role which is subject to the Anti-Money Laundering and Counter Terrorism Financing (AML/CTF) legislation.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Dependent on the nature of the work being completed with Lendlease, it may be appropriate for contractors and/or sub-contractors in some regions to be subject to screening under this policy.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When to conduct screening</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Screening must be completed prior to employment/engagement starting (&ldquo;commencement&rdquo;). The Regional Head of People &amp; Culture can provide an exception to commence prior to completion of screening. If an adverse employment screening check is returned post the hiring of an employee, Lendlease reserves the right to terminate employment.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">An internal transfer or appointment into a Specified Role from a non-specified role or a promotion to an Executive position will require additional screening and must be completed before the employee transfers into the Specified Role or is promoted into the Executive position.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The requirement to complete any employment assessment must be clearly stated within the position advertisement, job description form and/or application form as a pre-requisite for employment consideration. The consent of the prospective employee must be obtained before conducting pre-employment screening by signing the applicant&rsquo;s declaration (part 2) of the Pre-Employment Medical Assessment paperwork.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Medical Screening</strong></span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employment medicals may be used to screen prospective and existing employees for any medical, mental health conditions or physical capabilities to assess their ability to perform the inherent requirements of the role.</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Screening of employees may be warranted based on the nature of the work, or area within which the work is to be performed e.g. manual handling duties.</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Screening should be conducted in a manner that is fair and consistent, ensuring compliance with employment legislation, and State and Federal equal opportunity and anti-discrimination legislation.</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Prospective employees may be assessed as unsuitable on medical grounds where a pre-existing medical condition, or effects of ongoing medication, will prevent the prospective employee from being able to carry out the inherent requirements of the position.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Re-screening</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All employees of the Retirement Living business are required to be screened as per the relevant Aged Care legislation including pre-employment and during employment.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Base level screening</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease&rsquo;s base level screening includes a range of checks designed to verify the applicant's identity, their technical capabilities, work history, &nbsp;probity and active criminal history. It covers the personal and technical elements which collectively represent a person's integrity.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Impacted applicants are required to undergo Base Level Screening which includes:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">identity and work eligibility checks</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">confirmation of background and qualifications</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">criminal history screening</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Base Level Screening will aim to:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">confirm the accuracy of the applicant's background and qualifications</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">confirm the probity of the applicant</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Additional screening, above Base Level Screening (i.e. additional components), is required for applicants being considered for a Specified Role or an Executive position. Additional screening may consist of but not be limited to financial regulatory checks, shareholder and directorship checks.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Responsibilities</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">People Connect, Resourcing and/or Strategic Business Partners - People &amp; Culture (in countries that are not supported by People Connect) coordinate the screening:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">booking appropriate screening services from the vendor,</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ensuring all documentation has been forwarded to the appropriate vendor,</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ensuring that private and confidential information is satisfactorily managed.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">People Connect are responsible for monitoring adherence to this policy, in particular to manage the relationships with external vendors of screening services, reporting to businesses and advising&nbsp; Strategic Business Partners - People &amp; Culture and the Hiring Manager on screening issues.</span></p>\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Screening Issues and allowable exceptions</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employment screening cannot be waived for in-scope employees; however, there is an allowable exception to policy namely:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As part of an acquisition whereby negotiated terms may exclude the screening of acquired employees for those who have already satisfied Lendlease's screening components</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">With respect to a business acquisition, the relevant General Manager, People &amp; Culture and other stakeholders involved in the acquisition/tender process must ensure that the acquired business employees who will become Lendlease employees have satisfied Lendlease&rsquo;s screening requirement. If not, acquired employees who fall within the scope of this policy are required to be screened. Addressing screening during an acquisition should be considered as part of the acquisition/tender process and managed comprehensively as part of the business integration process (on a case-by-case basis).</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Discrepancies</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Any discrepancies identified by the screening process must be considered by the Hiring Manager in conjunction with the relevant General Manager, People &amp; Culture for the business in accordance with the Employment Screening Review Guidelines and Actions document that is available to the General Manager, People &amp; Culture for each business. Any discrepancies between the results of screening and information disclosed by an applicant should be considered on a case by case basis, taking into account:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">all of the circumstances including the context, relevance and seriousness of the inconsistency;</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">whether Lendlease was misled in relation to the discrepancy; and</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">whether the discrepancy impacts the applicant's capacity to perform the inherent requirements of the role (e.g. undisclosed criminal record would be considered far more material than a minor error in employment dates).</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If a criminal history screening returns a disclosable court outcome, the General Manager, People &amp; Culture in conjunction with the Business CEO&nbsp;will decide whether further action is required. This may include the withdrawal of an offer of employment/engagement or the termination of the employment/engagement.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Criminal Checks (UK)<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In the United Kingdom, regulations have been established by the Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) with a view to better safeguarding the environments in which children or vulnerable persons are located. They are intended to provide information to help inform recruitment and employee project placement decisions.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Mandatory checks are undertaken for employees, contractors, agency workers and subcontractors who have been identified by the business as satisfying the Lendlease criminal checks criteria.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">An appropriate record of results of discrepancy inquiries is to be maintained by People Connect.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Consequences of breaching this policy</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Disciplinary action may be taken at Lendlease&rsquo;s sole discretion if this policy is breached. This may include action up to and including dismissal in appropriate circumstances.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>DEFINITIONS</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Applicant</strong> -&nbsp;An existing Lendlease employee or external candidate applying for a position of employment&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Specified Role</strong> -&nbsp;Specified Roles are defined as positions which are at a greater risk of being exposed to fraudulent activity or in a position of control i.e. certain Finance roles including Treasury &amp; Payroll; Investment Management. These roles will be reviewed and approved annually by the Group Head of People &amp; Culture, Group Head of Risk and&nbsp;and Group Head of Compliance.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Executive</strong> -&nbsp;An Executive is defined as those employees who occupy a &nbsp;CJF Level of Executive I, Executive II, Executive III or Executive IV.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FURTHER INFORMATION AND RELATED MATERIALS</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">People Connect is responsible for ensuring that the applicant has supplied all documentation to the relevant vendor prior to them commencing with Lendlease.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For any questions regarding this policy, please contact&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=home_esc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"People Connect\">People Connect</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Download&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Employment%20Screening%20Policy.pdf?csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=08dOnb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Employment Screening Policy</a></span></p>","sys_created_by":"hinw325","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"x_caukp_ebonding_integration_mode":null,"can_read_user_criteria":"","active":"true","cannot_read_user_criteria":"","published":"2021-05-07","helpful_count":"0","sys_domain_path":"/","u_view_count_all":"145","version":{"display_value":"2.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_version/0901aa1c1b48b010ef4543b4bd4bcb72"},"x_caukp_ebonding_requester_id":"","meta_description":"Group sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease supports employees in meeting their work and family needs including when they have a sick dependent, resulting in a break down in normal care arrangements.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will assist eligible employees by reimbursing part of the cost involved in organising an approved or registered carer to care for their sick dependent in the home.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent and fixed-term employees of Lendlease are eligible for the rebate, subject to policy conditions.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Individuals employed under the terms and conditions of an operative enterprise agreement with a Lendlease group company, should refer to the relevant enterprise agreement to determine if this policy applies to you.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Ensure you meet the eligibility requirements listed above.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Organise a registered carer for your sick dependent and pay for the service. Obtain a receipt for the service provided. Additionally, you will need to obtain a medical certificate for your dependant.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Complete the Sick Dependant Rebate Form and email the form, the receipt and medical certificate to the relevant payroll team.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease Services:&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:Payroll.Admin@lendlease.com\" rel=\"nofollow\">Payroll.Admin@lendlease.com<br></a> Lendlease Engineering:&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:Payroll.Admin@lendlease.com\" rel=\"nofollow\">Payroll.Admin@lendlease.com</a></span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will be reimbursed the relevant amount in the next available pay run. Reimbursement will result in a reportable fringe benefit being included on your annual payment summary. &nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What does the rebate entitle me to?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will reimburse costs involved for five days of emergency care per calendar year per child.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The employee will pay a maximum of $25 per day. Claims will be paid only within the current fringe benefit tax year (1 April - 31 March).</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Reimbursement will result in a reportable fringe benefit being included on the employee&rsquo;s annual payment summary.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease provides medical coverage for Hawaii employees through UHA Health Insurance.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080; text-decoration: underline;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Salaried employees and hourly employees working a minimum of 20 hours per week will be eligible for medical insurance as per the Hawaii Prepaid Health Care Act.<br><br></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080; text-decoration: underline;\"><strong>How do I enrol?</strong></span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a new hire, you have 31 days from your start date to elect healthcare benefits. New employees should go to the Benefits Center (<a href=\"http://www.lendlease.hrintouch.com/\">www.Lendlease.hrintouch.com</a>) to complete all benefit enrolments with the exception of the 401(k) plan.&nbsp; Per the Plan provisions, if you do not make an affirmative election to enrol in, or decline healthcare coverage (i.e., fail to enrol) within 31 days from your start date, you will be deemed to have elected to waive coverage under all Plans, except the Plan&rsquo;s default benefits.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When enrolling an eligible dependent, such as a spouse/domestic partner or child(ren), certain documentation will be required for verification, such as a birth certificate, marriage certificate.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you miss the 31-day election window, you will be able to enrol during the Open Enrolment period in November for benefits to be effective January 1 of the following year.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have a qualifying event, such as a marriage, divorce, birth of a child, loss of other coverage, etc. you will be able to change your benefit elections mid-year by going to the Benefits Center within 31 days following the life event.<br><br></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080; text-decoration: underline;\"><strong>How do I use the UHA medical benefit?</strong></span> </span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you receive your member ID card. Log on to the <a href=\"https://portal.uhahealth.com/Member/Account/LogOn\">UHA website</a> and register. You will then have 24/7 access to:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Locate participating providers</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">View medical and drug claim information</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">View plan benefits</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Print your medical and drug identification cards</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\">Who can I contact about my UHA medical benefit?</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can contact UHA customer service on 1 800-458-4600. When requested, quote the Lendlease UHA Group number # 9861-0001. You can also contact Health Advocate at 866-695-8622.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\">Resources</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=dbebc9534724ae50fa3d6da7a46d4325\" alt=\"NextPlaceTechnologyBLKPNG 1 png\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\"></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 525.0pt;
