Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is Lendlease policy to support new parents by granting partner leave to eligible employees.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees who are the partner of the child's primary carer and will have some responsibility for the child's upbringing are eligible. The employee must have twenty six (26) weeks' continuous service by the Qualifying Week (15th week before the week in which the baby is due).</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Family Leave Policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss with your manager your intention to take Ordinary Partner Leave (OPL).</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Birth child:</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Inform your manager in writing, of your intention to take OPL providing notice by the end of the Expected Week of Childbirth (EWC). This should state:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date on which your partner's baby is due or placement date of the child;</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The length of partner leave that you wish to take (up to four weeks); and</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date on which you wish the period(s) of leave to commence.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter your leave request in Workday.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must also provide written notice of the actual date of the baby's birth as soon as practicable after the birth.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Adopted child:</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Inform your manager in writing, of your intention to take OPL providing notice no later than seven (7) days after the date on which notification of the match with the child was given by the adoption agency. This should state:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date the child is expected to be placed for adoption;</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date you intend to start your period(s) of OPL;</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The length of intended partner leave; and</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The date on which the adopter was notified of having been matched with the child.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter your leave request in Workday</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will respond in writing within twenty eight (28) days of receiving your notice of the date in which you intend to begin your OPL.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Can I change my partner leave start date?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are permitted to change your partner leave start date, provided that you advise your manager and People Connect in writing at least twenty eight (28) days before the new start date or, if that is not possible, as soon as reasonably practicable.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Am I entitled to time off for antenatal appointments?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees have the right to take time off to accompany their pregnant partner to up to two (2) antenatal appointments made on the advice of a doctor, midwife or health visitor. This time off will be unpaid.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees should provide as much notice as possible for any appointments.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To establish equity and consistency across the Lendlease Americas Region and provide a unified, market driven approach to automobile and commuting allowances across all businesses, the Auto and Commuting Allowance Policy has been instituted.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"color: #008080; text-decoration: underline;\">Auto Allowance</span></span><br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Auto allowance is paid to employees who regularly use their personal vehicle on company business.&nbsp; Regularly is defined as three (3) or more days per week for a period of more than 90 days.&nbsp; All allowances are gross, taxable income and will be paid bi-weekly on the normal pay check cycle, effective the first full pay-period on the project. If an employee transfers to a project in the middle of a pay-period, it will not be paid until the next full pay-period.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ELIGIBILITY<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The below eligibility requirements must be met and approved by the Managing Director in order to receive an Auto Allowance.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1. Required to regularly drive personal vehicle more than 20 miles per day between jobsite locations or on other regular business activities.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2. Required to regularly drive personal vehicle on broad acre development projects (i.e. MHPI).</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #e03e2d;\">* </span>Lendlease prohibits billing to clients, and reimbursements by clients, of costs greater than this policy provides to employees.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ENTITLEMENT<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Gross Auto Allowance Rates. Based upon amount of travel and level of role:</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"border-collapse: collapse; width: 29.2814%;\" border=\"1\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"width: 48.6762%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff;\">&nbsp;Annual Gross Allowance &nbsp;</span></td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 51.2839%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff;\">Bi-Weekly Gross Allowance</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"width: 48.6762%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">$12,000</span></td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 51.2839%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;$461.54</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"width: 48.6762%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">$9,800</span></td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 51.2839%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">$376.92</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"width: 48.6762%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">$7,500</span></td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 51.2839%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">$288.46</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"width: 48.6762%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">$5,000</span></td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 51.2839%;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">$192.31</span></td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"color: #008080; text-decoration: underline;\">Commuting Allowance</span></span><br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A commuting allowance may be paid to an employee based upon the below eligibility requirements and must be approved by the Managing Director.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All allowances are gross, taxable income and will be paid bi-weekly on the normal pay check cycle, effective the first full pay-period on the project. If an employee transfers to a project in the middle of a pay-period, it will not be paid until the next full pay-period.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The commuting allowance is not be used to pay mileage for home leave travel when on an out-of-town living assignment. In this situation regular mileage expense forms should be submitted to Accounts Payable for approved reimbursements.</span><br><br></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ELIGIBILITY<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Commuting allowances are determined on an individual, case by case basis, and will be subject to periodic review. Employees located in an office will not be eligible for a commuting allowance.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1. Employees travelling more than 50 miles one way from home to their project site, or incurring additional, significant tolls or mass transit expense (outside of their normal commuting expense) as a result of a change in project location.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2. Allowance based upon &ldquo;additional&rdquo; mileage incurred as a result of new project location. 'Additional mileage' is defined as the calculated number of miles driven in excess of 50 miles one way from home to the project site. Allowance amount will be based upon the current IRS rate per mile or transit expense incurred. For example, if an employee travels 80 miles one way from home to his or her project site, only the incremental 30 miles would be reimbursable each way.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees receiving a Commuting Allowance will not generally be eligible to receive an Auto Allowance.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #e03e2d;\">* </span>Lendlease prohibits billing to clients, and reimbursements by clients, of costs greater than this policy provides to employees.</span><br><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span style=\"color: #008080;\">SUPPORTING INFORMATION</span><br></strong> &nbsp; href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018827\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Auto and Commuting Allowance Policy\">Auto and Commuting Allowance Policy</a><a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/ErrorPages/NotFound.html?item=web%3a%7b16C4140A-9B6F-42A5-A381-C286981CF85B%7d%40en\" rel=\"nofollow\">&nbsp;<br></a> sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees who are not eligible for Preference may still access the following benefits.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Charitable donations</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Charity donations are a tax efficient way to donate straight from your pay each month to your choice of charity.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Donations are made via the Charities Aid Foundation (CAF). You can choose to either make donations to the charities of your choice, or hold the funds so you have money set aside to donate whenever you choose.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your monthly contribution is deducted from your salary before tax is calculated meaning that you pay less tax, enabling you to give more to your chosen charity if you wish. You do pay National Insurance contributions on your monthly contribution.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can make monthly contributions of between &pound;10 a month and &pound;2000 a month.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Charity contributions are recognised by HRMC as qualifying for tax relief.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The amount of tax you save depends on what tax band your earnings put you in.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The table below shows tax savings and NI costs based on a &pound;20 monthly contribution for a higher rate tax payer.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Tax Band</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can set up regular monthly donations and change your monthly contribution at any time during the year. Changes must be made by the end of the current month to take effect from the 1st of the following month.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Nominate your charity or charities and the amount you would like to donate on the Charity Nomination Form.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Return your completed form to Charities Aid Foundation (CAF) at enquiries@cafonline.org</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Charities Aid Foundation (CAF) administers the monthly contributions and makes payment to the relevant charities on your behalf each month. They will contact you directly to confirm your contribution.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are leaving Lendlease, a full month contribution will be deducted from your final salary and any future payments will cease. If you wish to continue contributing to your chosen charity or charities you should contact CAF at enquiries@cafonline.org directly, or your new employer may allow you to make charitable donations through their payroll.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br />Eye care vouchers</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a Lendlease employee you are entitled to one eye care voucher every two years. This important ocular health check can detect eye conditions, in some cases, long before you notice any change in your vision. This check can even give early warnings of more serious health conditions, such as high blood pressure, diabetes or glaucoma, which can lead to blindness. &nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are a DSE user, you can request an eye examination at any time. If you requesting a further voucher outside of the employee two-year eligibility criteria, this will only be permitted if it has been recommended by your optician and is clearly visible on your DSE form.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Each voucher includes:</strong>&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- A full eye examination at any of Specsavers&rsquo; 700 stores nationwide&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- A pair of glasses from Specsavers&rsquo; &pound;45 range of frames&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Single vision and Pentax lenses fitted as standard&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Scratch resistant treatment as standard</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You also have the choice to upgrade to a more expensive pair of frames in which case a &pound;45 contribution will be made.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>The Ultimate value for money option<br /></strong> If you upgrade to the &pound;99 designer range of frames or above, you will receive an additional &pound;20 discount, making the total contribution towards the cost of your frames &pound;65. The Specsavers 2-4-1 offer is also applicable; therefore, if you chose a &pound;99 pair of frames you would receive 2 pairs of designer glasses for a personal contribution of &pound;34.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This voucher does not entitle you to safety glasses. If you require safety glasses for use on a Lendlease site, please talk to your People Manager who can advise you of how to make this purchase.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your voucher will be valid for one year only. If you do not use your voucher within this timeframe and it expires, you will not be eligible to receive a further Company paid voucher until you become eligible again.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Before requesting your eyecare voucher please consider the following options:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are eligible for Preference this voucher should be requested via your Preference account.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are a DSE user please refer to the DSE information below.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Contact People Connect&nbsp;on 0208 271 8444 to request your voucher</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\">You voucher will be sent to your email address, you should expect to receive your voucher by the 1st of the month following your request.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease have chosen Specsavers as the provider as they deliver a high standard of service and health care for our employees.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will be able to secure an appointment typically within a week, but often sooner. As a reminder, Specsavers will make a courtesy call and/or text you 24 hours before the appointment.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If glasses are not required, you can claim a pair of non-prescriptive sunglasses from a set range equivalent to the value of the voucher.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The voucher is no longer valid after your last day of employment.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; The plan covers the reimbursement of medical expenses as specified in the benefit schedule.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; Defence leave is offered to eligible employees to enable the attendance of compulsory training or deployment associated with defence service.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent and fixed-term employees of Lendlease are eligible.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees bound by an operative enterprise agreement where Lendlease is the employer may have varying benefits. Please refer to the relevant agreement for specific terms and conditions that apply to you.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Defence Leave Policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Notify your manager as soon as you have a request from your Commanding Officer to attend defence services training or active duty. Discuss the approximate number of leave days you require.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you have obtained your manager&rsquo;s agreement, submit a Defence Leave Application in Workday.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your manager will approve the leave request in Workday.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">On completion of defence leave, ensure you collect your certificate of attendance from your Commanding Officer.</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At Lendlease, we are committed to taking care of the people that keep our company thriving. Our goal is to create a workplace that supports people to seek happy, healthy and productive lives. &nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To encourage a healthy lifestyle we are pleased to offer annual health assessments through our partnership with Executive Health Solutions (EHS).</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Executive level employees based in Australia who have passed their probationary period are eligible for a Classic Health Assessment on an annual basis.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What does the Classic Health Assessment involve?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The assessment takes approximately two hours and is undertaken at an authorised EHS clinic.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Full details on what is covered during the session can be found in the Executive Health Brochure.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">On completion, a report including pathology and ECG results will be available for you via a secure online portal. This information is strictly confidential and no personal data will be released to Lendlease.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I make or reschedule an appointment?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A member of the Executive Health Solutions (EHS) team will contact you to arrange an appointment following the successful completion of your probationary period or 12 months following your previous assessment. If you do not hear from EHS then please contact People Connect.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are required to cancel or reschedule your appointment then please contact the Health Assessment Centre, confirmed in your pre-assessment correspondence, as soon as you are aware that you are unable to attend. Please note, cancellations or postponements made within seven business days of the appointment may incur a fee.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The company recognizes the need for employees to take extended leave of absence for personal reasons up to 6 months.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All Lendlease Employees in US.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The maximum amount of time for an Unpaid Personal Leave of Absence (UPLOA) is six (6) months.&nbsp; This leave of absence must be approved by your manager. The duration of UPLOA is longer than one (1) month and maximum six (6) months. Employee must exhaust all available PTO prior to the commencement of the UPLOA.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The leave is treated like a termination but not eligible for a 401(k) distribution.&nbsp; If you have a 401(k) loan, you must contact the Benefits team in Charlotte, North Carolina to arrange payments.&nbsp; Otherwise, if the loan is not paid within 90 days of the first day of the Leave of Absence, your loan will be defaulted.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Health Insurance benefits end as of the end of the month of the last day worked*.</span><br /><br /><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Example of an UPLOA:</span></strong><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">From 4/18/16 through 7/8/16</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">*Last Day Worked is 4/15/16</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Effective first day of Leave is 4/18/16</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Health Insurance Benefits end 4/30/16</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Then COBRA will be offered for up to 18 months. COBRA information will be mailed to your home address from Flores &amp; Associates.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All other benefits end on the last day worked.&nbsp; This includes Employee Life, Dependent Life, AD&amp;D, Short-Term Disability, and Long Term Disability.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Upon returning from an Unpaid Personal LOA, an employee will be paid their old salary or negotiated new salary.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">* Last day of PTO in the event you are exhausting your PTO in order to take an Unpaid Personal Leave.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Holidays are not paid during an Unpaid Personal Leave of Absence.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>REFERENCE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Refer to the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018998\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"Unpaid Personal Leave of Absence process\">Unpaid Personal Leave of Absence process</a>&nbsp;for more detailed process steps regarding applying for Unpaid Personal Leave of Absence (UPLOA).&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Course sponsorship provides employees with the opportunity to acquire new knowledge and skills through short courses, seminars and workshops provided by external learning institutions and organisations.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent full-time and fixed-term employees who meet the criteria below are eligible:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The course of study must fulfil the employee&rsquo;s development plan&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Attendance at the course must not impact on the ability for the employee to fulfil the requirements of their role.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees must complete the Education Assistance Form to obtain approval from their relevant managers and/or by the relevant Business Unit Head before enrolling and/or attending the course.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; height: 438.234px;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 53.7812px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: #5c5858; height: 53.7812px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 53.7812px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Course Sponsorship Policy and confirm that the proposed course, seminar or workshop meets the relevant requirements.&nbsp;Refer to Upcoming Courses - Make sure there are no courses available similar to what you plan to attend.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 44.3906px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: workshop.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 220.109px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 220.109px;\">\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Once you have obtained your manager&rsquo;s approval in principle, complete the Study Sponsorship Form at least one (1) month in advance and submit the application to your 1 - up manager for an email approval.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">You will be required to raise a ServiceNow request <a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=sc_cat_item&amp;sys_id=76d7d3761be32c102cbba8a8b04bcbb0&amp;sysparm_category=ba49df761be32c102cbba8a8b04bcba4\" style=\"color: #0563c1; text-decoration: underline;\">here</a> and attach the supporting documents which includes the application forms and email approval in the ticket.</span><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #313231;\"><br /><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Should your course sponsorship exceed S$5,000/ MYR10,000, the Education Assistance policy will apply.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #313231;\"><br /><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\">Singapore employees</span>: </span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">If you are eligible for funding grants from the Singapore government, the subsidy will be applied automatically by default from the training vendor and processed after the course completion.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: #313231;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\">Malaysia employees</span>: </span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">If you are eligible to apply for the HRD Corp Claimable course, please ensure that you attach the required supporting documents (Course Invoice/Quotation, Course Content, Trainer's Profile and Training Schedule) in your submission.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 119.953px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; completion of your course, please notify your line manager in writing.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply for course sponsorship payment?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Raise a Purchase Order/ submit a claim through Finance, attaching the relevant invoices and study sponsorship request form.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Select study reimbursement as the expense type.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter the study sponsorship application reference number in the justification field. Please note that a signed return of service agreement must be presented to Finance upon request for courses above S$5,000/ MYR10,000.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Contact Finance if you require assistance.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"AMER","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/89c8b38f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb85"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-12-19 Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This step in the recruitment process will be led by your Talent Acquisition Partner. They will need your input at several stages.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In the spirit of ongoing learning and career development, Lendlease encourages hiring managers to give full consideration to all internal applicants. All internal applicants will be long<del cite=\"mailto:Barisic,%20Josh\" datetime=\"2023-01-18T10:54\">-</del>listed &amp; reviewed by the Talent Acquisition Partner.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Internal applicants follow the same process as external applicants. However, hiring managers will lead the feedback process post interviews and offer management for internal candidates. If an employee does not meet the required skills for the role and is not shortlisted for an interview, they will receive a feedback call from the Talent Acquisition Partner. All roles will be simultaneously advertised internally and externally for a minimum of 5 days.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There is a Quick Reference Guide on <a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:i:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/GIVING%20FEEDBACK%20to%20unsuccessful%20candidates.png\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Giving Feedback</a> on the Recruitment Portal.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Interviews will be conducted for all positions and candidates will be assessed against the capabilities identified through the Job design process. Generally, a candidate should participate in two rounds of interview for the role, excluding an initial phone discussion with the recruiter and any pre-offer assessments. The interviews should be panel based and focus on technical fit, cultural fit and/or leadership fit. &nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Offers will be made in-line with the CJF salary band and/ or budget allocated for the position. Managers should consult with their People &amp; Culture Representative should they have any questions regarding the salary budgets or packaging options.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To ensure there is no unnecessary cost to Lendlease or misrepresentation of our organisation, you should speak with your Talent Acquisition Partner before engaging recruitment agencies.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Interview Techniques</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The initial screening of the candidates will be primarily led by the Talent Acquisition Partner.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">During the recruitment process People Leaders are coached by Talent Acquisition Partner on best practice interview techniques which are aligned to Lendlease Strategy, Key Principles and Core Values. Jointly, the hiring managers and the Talent Acquisition Partner will develop a Recruitment Action Plan which will detail the planned recruitment approach and design for the interview process.<br><br>There is a Quick Reference Guide on <a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:i:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Interview%20Tips.png\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Interview Tips</a> available on the Recruitment Portal.</span><br><br></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I select a successful candidate?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 0.3pt; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<strong>PLAN &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Prepare your candidate requirements such as experience and competencies.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Develop the Recruitment Action Plan with your Talent Acquisition Partner.</span><br><br></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Recruitment Action Plan will identify:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Recruitment Strategy for this role</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What an ideal candidate looks like</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Panel members for both interviews plus defining the purpose of each interview &amp; panel member.</span><ins cite=\"mailto:Smith-Ng,%20Fiona\" datetime=\"2023-01-16T10:28\"><del cite=\"mailto:Barisic,%20Josh\" datetime=\"2023-01-18T20:36\"> </del></ins></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 0.3pt; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<strong>PREPARE&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Talent Acquisition Partner will source and pre-screen potential candidates based on the agreed requirements.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All roles will be advertised internally and externally for a minimum of 5 business days.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Talent Acquisition Partner will end you through potential candidates (internal and external) as they are short-listed. Your feedback helps to continue to direct the search.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review your availability for interviews and finalise your interview plan and questions. The Talent Acquisition team will work with you and other panel members to book in the interviews with candidates.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the Quick Reference Guide on <a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:i:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Interview%20Tips.png\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Interview Tips</a>.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 0.3pt; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<strong>ACT</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Allocate time to interview your shortlisted candidates.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Conduct the interview with each candidate with respect and be present in the conversation.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Provide feedback to your Talent Acquisition Partner after interviews.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 0.3pt; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<strong>FINALISE</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once a successful candidate has been identified the recruiter will confirm the candidate for the role in Workday</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review and approve the offer in Workday.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If the terms are outside of the original Job Requisition, further approvals may be required based on the <a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018982\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Limits of Authority</a></span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Depending on the role and the region the candidates may be taken through additional pre-employment screening.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If the successful candidate is an internal candidate you will agree the process for transitioning to the new role, including notice period, with their existing manager.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As the hiring manager, you will notify successful internal candidates and offer the role. All internal applicants who were interviewed must receive timely and constructive feedback from the hiring manager.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Talent Acquisition Partner will notify and offer the role to external candidates, and provide feedback to unsuccessful external candidates.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">People Connect will manage the offer letter process including the generation, issuing and collection of the new starter paperwork in order to setup the new employee record.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once the written offer is received, the hiring manager will be the lead contact for the new starter (both internal &amp; external). The key to creating a great candidate experience is to maintain consistent contact through the notice period and ensure the new starter knows the details for Day 1.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Prior to the employee&rsquo;s first day you will receive a notification to begin the process of onboarding the new employee.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Onboarding information can be found on the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/sites/people-portal/essentials/recruitment/onboarding-and-induction\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Onboarding and Induction page</a>.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FAQs</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Q -&nbsp;Where can I get interviewing tips?</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A - Chat with your Talent Acquisition Partner who can coach you and provide interviewing tips and techniques. There is a Quick Reference Guide on <a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:i:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Interview%20Tips.png\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">interview tips</a> available on the recruitment portal</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Q -&nbsp;How long does the recruitment process take?</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A - This depends on a number of factors, so it can be hard to estimate. Discuss your expectations with your Talent Acquisition Partner and work with them to agree a recruitment timeline and action plan.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Q -&nbsp;What if I want to make an offer to a current Lendlease employee?</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A - Lendlease encourages offers of roles to employees. However, for transparency of all opportunities at Lendlease, all roles must be advertised internally for a minimum of 5 business days. You can actively encourage your preferred candidate to apply for the role in Workday.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Q -&nbsp;What do I do if an internal candidate is not the preferred candidate?</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A -&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Internal Candidates</strong>: Your Talent Acquisition Partner will provide feedback to internal candidates who do not reach interview stage. If you have interviewed the employee as part of the recruitment process, you will provide the feedback to the employee. This is a key component to creating a great candidate experience and supporting the development of all Lendlease people. There is a Quick Reference Guide on Providing Feedback and your Talent Acquisition Partner can provide support for this conversation.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>External Candidates</strong>: Your Talent Acquisition Partner will work with you to provide feedback to unsuccessful candidates.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Q -&nbsp;How do I prepare for my new starter?</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A - The <a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_category&amp;kb_category=276496521bdb685017eeebd22a4bcbb6&amp;esm_base=pnc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Recruitment and Onboarding\">Recruitment and Onboarding</a> section on ServiceNow has a wealth of information to help prepare for your new starter.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once the written offer is signed, the hiring manager becomes the lead contact for both internal and external new starters.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Q -&nbsp;Where can I go for more information or help?</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A - Click the Contact Us button in the top right hand corner of the screen to find your Talent Acquisition Team and People Connect contact details.</span></p>","sys_created_by":"mohn407","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"x_caukp_ebonding_integration_mode":null,"can_read_user_criteria":"","active":"true","cannot_read_user_criteria":"","published":"2024-12-19","helpful_count":"0","sys_domain_path":"/","u_view_count_all":"269","version":{"display_value":"6.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_version/3274cc8e1b22da50727c0e12604bcb23"},"x_caukp_ebonding_requester_id":"","meta_description":"This step in the recruitment process will be led by your Talent Acquisition Partner. Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a people manager at Lendlease it is important you understand your authority and accountability in relation to people management processes and take responsibility for your decisions.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our&nbsp;People&nbsp;&amp; Culture&nbsp;people manager approvals guidelines ensure that approvals are made at the right level and provides governance and controls around people management processes.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">They address commercially based decisions in relation to:-</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Recruitment (request to hire and offer management)</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Compensation related requests (including education assistance)</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee leave</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employee job changes</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees separation (employees leaving Lendlease)</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Performance reviews</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Training approval</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What can I approve?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your Career and Job Framework (CJF) job level will determine your span of authority and accountability for decision making in relation to all people management decisions including the extent to which you have the authority to approve people related requests/impacts.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are unsure of your CJF job level you can find this information in your profile on Workday.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approvals for people management processes include two categories:</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;- Approvals with a compensation or significant cost component.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;- Approvals that do not have a direct or a significant cost component.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approvals are typically &lsquo;one-up&rsquo; (your manager approves), or &lsquo;two-up&rsquo; (both your manager and their manager approves) and follow the manager&rsquo;s reporting line. However, when a process has a compensation or significant cost component, the process may also have a 'Limit of Authority' associated with it.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the P&amp;C Limits of Authority?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease Limits of Authority (LOA) define financial parameters associated with a process or request. When a request exceeds the financial parameters defined for the process LOA approval will be sought in addition to the &lsquo;one-up&rsquo; or &lsquo;two-up&rsquo; manager.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For example, recruitment will typically require approval by the requestor&rsquo;s &lsquo;one-up&rsquo; and &lsquo;two-up&rsquo; manager. However, when the salary requested is outside of the CJF salary range for the role further approval is required by the Regional Head of P&amp;C.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Where do I go to approve requests?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In most cases requests are approved within&nbsp;<a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/login.htmld\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Workday</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are considering an international career move, you need to investigate your right to work in the country or countries you are interested in and your eligibility for relocation assistance.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the right to work and visa requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Some countries have very specific requirements that dictate whether or not you will be able to work there. Your ability to secure a right to work will depend on a number of things including the type of work, citizenship and qualifications.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">These regulations are strictly governed by national departments with responsibility for immigration and border protection and we take these very seriously as they could impact our ability to run operations in a country.&nbsp; We recommend you refer to the relevant national government&rsquo;s visa information pages.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Do I receive relocation assistance?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Relocation assistance does not apply to all roles and is dependent on individual circumstances and affordability to the business.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Details of a relocation package will be discussed at the time of offer. To provide an understanding of what that assistance could look like, refer to the Global Mobility Framework.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a minimum we will support you with advice about the visa application process; the costs associated with your visa application; advice about the tax implications of moving to the new location; and, settling into the new location for the first few weeks.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align:
