Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Professional development starts with understanding the key capabilities essential to your role. These frameworks provide a roadmap for career growth by identifying specific skills and competencies. Collaborate with your manager to talk through the capabilities you want to develop, then create a targeted development plan.&nbsp; As you progress, look for the experiences, exposure to new situations and formal education that will continue to improve your capabilities over time.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There are three sets of capabilities that help us be successful in our roles:</span></p>\r\n<ol style=\"margin-top: 0cm; margin-bottom: 0cm; list-style-position: inside;\" start=\"1\" type=\"1\">\r\n<li style=\"margin-top: 0cm; margin-right: 0cm; margin-bottom: 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/LL_capabilities_full_v1.10.pdf?csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=4ed7WQ\"><span style=\"color: rgb(22, 145, 121);\">Lendlease capabilities</span></a></strong>&nbsp;&ndash; these eight capabilities apply to all roles at all levels at Lendlease. &nbsp;No matter what you do, or where you work in Lendlease these are the capabilities that are critical to our success. &nbsp;You should be proficient in all these capabilities at a level appropriate to your role.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-weight: normal; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019103\"><span style=\"color: rgb(22, 145, 121);\">Job family/category capabilities&nbsp;</span></a></strong>&ndash; these capabilities apply to certain job families in Lendlease and are designed to give you comprehensive, in-depth knowledge of the behaviours required for success, in particular roles, throughout our business. &nbsp;Select the Job Family Framework appropriate for your role to learn more.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-weight: normal; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/Microsite-People-Culture/SitePages/Mission-Critical-Capabilities.aspx\"><span style=\"color: rgb(22, 145, 121);\">Mission critical capabilities&nbsp;</span></a></strong>- these 12 capabilities are specifically for Development, Construction, Investment Management and Digital. As this is an evolving and living document - these capabilities will change with time as we continue to grow within our strategy.</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong>How do I use the Lendlease Capabilities Framework?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Firstly, spend time understanding the Lendlease Capabilities and other relevant frameworks, and consider what proficiency level you are today.&nbsp; Have a conversation with your manager about their expectation of proficiency level in your role.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Once you understand the expectations in your role use the frameworks to map your development plan and participate in development opportunities.&nbsp; You should aim to develop your capabilities using a mixture of experience, exposure and education. Use these resources to learn more:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Experience%2070%20Exposure%2020%20Education%2010.pdf?csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=uw4p30\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Development Planning Through Experience, Exposure and Education</a></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/learning\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Build your capability with Workday Learning</a></span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How can I teach my team more about Lendlease Capabilities?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As a leader it is important that you spend time talking to your team about the capabilities required to do your jobs well.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 8pt; line-height: 107%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can use the provided resources below to conduct a short meeting with your team on the capabilities. Spend some time as a team considering how you can apply the capabilities. Consider which are your team&rsquo;s strengths and which capabilities you may want to develop as a team. Then decide, as a team, which capabilities you will focus on improving in the future and consider adding these to individual development plans.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr>\r\n<td style=\"width: 80px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-right: 1.5pt solid rgb(255, 255, 255); sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Maven is the leading global platform transforming women&rsquo;s and family health by providing high-quality, comprehensive support for employees and their partners as they pursue parenthood and beyond. Use Maven to book on-demand video appointments with best-in-class professionals and virtual specialists across more than 30 specialties and receive personalized educational and coaching resources. All care through Maven is free &mdash; there are no copays, deductibles, or other fees.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What is the Lendlease</strong> <strong>benefit through Maven?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br>There are two parts to the benefit:&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<ol style=\"margin-top: 0cm; margin-bottom: 0cm; list-style-position: inside;\" start=\"1\" type=\"1\">\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">24/7 access to the Maven platform, virtual care, and support services</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Financial reimbursement for expenses incurred as part of your family building journey through Maven Wallet.</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Through Maven&rsquo;s virtual network of Care Advocates and virtual specialists, Maven can guide each member through their family building and fertility journey. Additionally, for eligible out-of-pocket expenses incurred related to Fertility (for those without an infertility diagnosis), Adoption, Surrogacy and Fertility Preservation Lendlease will reimburse each family unit up to $30,000 USD lifetime maximum.<span style=\"color: black; background: #FFF2CC;\"><span style=\"background-color: #ffffff;\"> </span></span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What type of support do I receive through Maven?<br><br></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; line-height: 115%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease is offering the following programs for medically enrolled employees and partner/spouses through Maven:</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; promotes overall health literacy for individuals of reproductive age, particularly around fertility and pregnancy.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<ul style=\"margin-bottom: 0cm; margin-top: 0px; list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Egg and Sperm Freezing: </strong>12-month program; guides members through the considerations and process of egg or sperm freezing, helps them choose a clinic, and provides emotional support along the way.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<ul style=\"margin-bottom: 0cm; margin-top: 0px; list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>IVF &amp; IUI: </strong>12-month program; guides members through the difficult journey of undergoing fertility treatment including education of the fertility treatment process, help with choosing a high-quality fertility clinic, emotional support and more.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Adoption:</strong> 24-month program; fills gaps in support for individuals navigating the adoption process.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Surrogacy:</strong> 24-month program; our surrogacy program fills gaps in support for individuals navigating the surrogacy process.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Maternity &amp; Newborn Care: </strong>21-month offering (9 mo pregnancy, 12 mo postpartum); end-to-end program supporting expecting mothers and fathers during pregnancy and through the underserved postpartum and return-to-work periods, driving outcomes for families and employers.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-family: 'Proxima Nova'; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Parenting &amp; Pediatrics: </strong>12-month renewable program; integrated coaching for parents and specialized pediatric support.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><strong style=\"font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; background: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\"><em>[NOTE: Lendlease employees who are medical plan eligible but have opted out of coverage are only eligible for Adoption and Surrogacy support tracks.]</em></span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; line-height: 115%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; background: #ffffff; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; line-height: 115%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What is Maven Wallet?<br><br></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; line-height: 115%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Maven Wallet enables easy reimbursement for employees without an infertility diagnosis who are pursuing fertility treatments (like IUI and IVF), fertility preservation (egg/sperm/embryo freezing), adoption, surrogacy. Using Maven Wallet, employees can easily upload receipts for eligible expenses and then be reimbursed by their employer. Your employer will reimburse you through payroll; for more information on your Maven Wallet program through Lendlease, please read the Program Overview which can be found in the Maven app within your company resources page. This overview will include specifics on Lendlease&rsquo;s Wallet offering and a list of eligible and ineligible expenses for each program.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; line-height: 115%; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: 107%; margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"line-height: sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Keeping you safe and well, both physically and mentally is important to us. So you can keep your mind on the job, we also recognise the importance of your financial wellbeing so offer a financial awareness program for our UK employees.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What does the program offer?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The program incorporates a set of educational seminars covering all aspects of financial planning, including:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Personal finance - understanding debt and tips on how to make your money go further;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Savings and tax;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Pension &ndash; saving for your retirement; and,&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Family financial wellbeing, including estate planning and family life.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We also offer a one day program aimed at employees over the age of 50 (and their partners) which covers:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Money and financial management in retirement;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; 12pt;\">Bank holidays are when banks and many other businesses are closed during the day. Public holidays are holidays which have been observed through custom and practice. Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"EUR","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/71c8ff4f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb51"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"5","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-02-29 Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Americas People &amp; Culture</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: 652px;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 306.736px; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: top; padding: 0pt 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Approver's name and title:</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Teena Hester</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Head of People &amp; Culture, Americas</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 305.625px; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: top; padding: 0pt 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Effective date:</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">August 2017</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 306.736px; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: top; padding: 0pt 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review date:</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">January 2020</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 305.625px; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: top; padding: 0pt 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Next review date:</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">January 2022</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Creating a better future for people is at the heart of our vision 'to create the best places'. That includes actively caring for our employees' physical and mental health, as well as their safety. To create a healthier culture, Lendlease recognizes the importance of leadership in ensuring that our people perform at their best, and are supported to feel healthy and well. This is why Lendlease offers Wellbeing Days to eligible employees, as one of the ways to encourage and inspire individual physical and mental wellbeing. This benefit is provided in addition to your Paid Time Off (PTO) program.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This policy outlines the conditions and guidelines for the Wellbeing Days.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active, salaried employees scheduled to work 30 or more hours per week are eligible. This policy does not apply to hourly employees.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Newly hired employees with start dates within a 4-month period (as referred to in the 'Benefits' section below) will be eligible for the Wellbeing Day at the start of the next&nbsp;period.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All eligible employees are entitled to&nbsp;one (1) paid Wellbeing Day every four (4) calendar months, subject to the conditions in this policy.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees are encouraged to use these days at regular intervals throughout the year for preventative physical and mental health services and positively impacting wellbeing activities. As such, Wellbeing Days do not carry over each period, may not be used in advance of the next period, nor are they paid out upon termination of employment.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong> Application Process<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees must apply for Wellbeing Days in advance. Employees are not required to disclose the reason for the leave application; however, manager approval is required for the timing of the leave. It is expected that leave days will be taken at a time when business is not unduly impacted, and if necessary, alternative timing can be agreed between the employee and their manager.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease fundamentally believes in the importance of having regular, short breaks for maintaining our health and wellbeing. As such, Lendlease actively encourages employees to take Wellbeing Days at consistent intervals throughout the year.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing Days can only be taken as a full or half day, per leave application. A maximum of one (1) day Wellbeing Day can be taken in each specified 4-month period, as follows:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">January 1 through April 30</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">May 1 through August 31</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">September 1 through December 31</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At the start of each of the periods above, eligible employees will be entitled to a Wellbeing Day for that period. Wellbeing Days are&nbsp;not accrued and do not carry over from one period to the next. Any Wellbeing Day not taken during a specified 4-month period will lapse.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Newly hired employees with start dates within a 4-month period&nbsp;will be eligible for the Wellbeing Day at the start of the next period.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Wellbeing Day Intent and Coverage<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing Days are intended to be used for activities where there is a perceived health benefit or to proactively address illness. Employees are entrusted to use the Wellbeing Days as they deem appropriate for their own health and wellbeing.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Some examples of activities for which Wellbeing Day may be used for, are shown below:&nbsp;</span><br /><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=cffa5dbb1b7ba010ef4543b4bd4bcbb5\" alt=\"\" width=\"601px\" height=\"104px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please note: This menu is provided as a guide only and not intended to be prescriptive nor exhaustive.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Examples of what Wellbeing Days are not intended to be used for:</span><br /></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unexpected and sudden illness - refer to the Paid Time Off (PTO) Policy</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Looking after a sick dependent &ndash; refer to the Paid Time Off (PTO) Policy</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">General holiday pursuits - refer to the Public Holiday Policy</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unanticipated emergencies &ndash; refer to the Paid Time Off (PTO) Policy</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If an employee is unsure as to which Leave Policy is most appropriate in a given situation, they could speak with their Manager or ask People Connect&nbsp; by calling 1866 848 1200 and selecting option 2.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Tracking and Reporting<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Usage of Wellbeing Days will be tracked with the aim of ensuring it is successful in usage, and to understand if it has had a positive impact on employees who take it, including impact, if any, on PTO leave. We want to understand how Wellbeing Days&nbsp;are used, but we recognize that reasons may often be confidential. In line with this, we intend to periodically survey Wellbeing Day applicants for anonymous feedback. While we respect our employees&rsquo; privacy, we encourage disclosure of information regarding the purpose and usage of Wellbeing Days on a voluntary basis, as well as the personal impact of taking the leave.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PROCESS<br /></strong> </span><br /><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Step 1:</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read the Wellbeing Days Policy to ensure you are eligible and discuss your intention to take the leave with your manager. Employees must apply for Wellbeing Days in advance.</span><br /><br /><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Step 2:</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Request your Wellbeing Day via Workday Absence&nbsp;\"Request Absence\". The request will be automatically approved.</span><br /><br /><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Step 3:</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If your manager has approved the request (outside of Workday) you may submit the Wellbeing Day, within time entry (pay type 47 - Wellbeing Day) in E1 Self-Service, for the date taken.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please note: It is expected that leave days will be taken at a time when business is not unduly impacted.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Review and Other Considerations<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The policy will be reviewed from time to time, to ensure its ongoing relevance. Lendlease reserves the right to change or cancel the policy and/or entitlement at any time.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Should you have any questions regarding this policy, please contact People Connect by calling 1 866 848 1200 and selecting option 2.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Access more information on the processes and procedures for&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019110\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"Wellbeing Days\">Wellbeing Days</a></span></p>","sys_created_by":"hinw325","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can choose to take an Unpaid Short Term Personal Leave of Absence (USTPLOA) due to personal reasons for a maximum of 30 days with no impact to benefits.</span><br /></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active, salaried employees scheduled to work 30 or more hours per week.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees must use all accrued Paid Time Off (PTO) prior to the start of the unpaid leave of absence.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, Carers leave and rebates are a few of the many benefits you can receive as a Lendlease employee.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will reimburse a portion of the net costs incurred in the provision of approved or registered care to a maximum of $60 per child per week. background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(92, 88, 88); height: 77.8px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your next standard payroll pay date</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">All permanent and fixed-term employees are eligible for this benefit, subject to policy conditions. </span><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">Individuals employed under the terms and conditions of an operative enterprise agreement with a Lendlease group company, should refer to the relevant enterprise agreement to determine if this policy applies to you.</span>&nbsp;</span><br><br></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To be eligible for this benefit, the following conditions must be met:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">Childcare must be an arrangement to enable parent(s) to work or study and must be through an approved or registered carer. Before and after school care and vacation care for school-aged children are not included.</span></span></span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">The child that this relates to must be between the age of 0 and 5 (pre-school age) and not at school.</span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">Employee must be responsible for paying the childcare fees that this benefit relates to.</span> </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The employee&rsquo;s partner must not be salary sacrificing childcare fees through their employer.&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><br><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\">Please note</span>:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Only one claim can be made per child. Where both parents are employees of Lendlease, only one parent can make a claim for the rebate.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">if you are on parental leave (paid or unpaid) or prolonged illness and continue to meet the above conditions, you are still eligible to apply for the Lendlease Childcare Rebate.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Cash Childcare Rebates are required to be analysed for Fringe Benefits Tax (FBT) purposes. Acceptance of a Cash Childcare Rebate may result in a Reportable Fringe Benefits Tax Amount being included in your income statement in your ATO online account or on your year-end payment summary. Please refer to Lendlease People Connect Knowledge Base and ATO website for further information on Reportable Fringe Benefit Amounts.</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br>How do I apply for the Lendlease cash childcare rebate?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; height: 550.011px;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 44.375px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 80.6094px; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 44.375px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 1133.38px; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 44.375px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the cash childcare rebate information provided on this page.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 154.41px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 80.6094px; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 154.41px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PREPARE&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 1133.38px; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 154.41px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">Obtain receipts from the registered childcare provider for the service provided.</span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><br><br></span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">If you receive the Government Childcare Subsidy (CCS) your childcare provider will deduct the CCS from the fees due. This CCS deduction will be itemised on the invoice.</span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><br></span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><br></span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">You are required to sign a Lendlease Child Care Statutory Declaration confirming that you meet Lendlease&rsquo;s eligibility requirements.&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 280.087px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 80.6094px; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 280.087px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ACT&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 1133.38px; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858; height: 280.087px;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">Complete and email the Lendlease Child Care Rebate Claim Form to the relevant payroll team below, attaching the necessary receipts and documents. If this is your first claim, you should complete and attach the Child Care Statutory Declaration.</span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><br><br></span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><a href=\"mailto:RLPayroll@lendlease.com\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%; color: rgb(66, 139, 202);\"><br></span></a></span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">All other Lendlease companies:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><a href=\"mailto:PayteamAU@lendlease.com\"><span style=\"line-height: 107%; color: rgb(66, 139, 202);\">PayteamAU@lendlease.com</span><span style=\"line-height: 107%; color: rgb(66, 139, 202);\"><br></span></a></span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\"><br></span><span style=\"line-height: 107%;\">Only original or copies of actual receipts or statements from registered child care can be accepted. Documents need to be submitted by the dates below pertaining to each quarter.&nbsp;</span></span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At Lendlease we&rsquo;re committed to supporting the ongoing education of our people. Education support is provided to eligible employees who wish to pursue further academic qualifications at their own initiative in the form of financial and/or time off work for study.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Investment in education ensures we can attract, retain and develop employees; continually build employee capability to execute our business strategy; and ensure the future leadership of the business.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you or your family members have student loan debt, you may be interested in lowering your rates.&nbsp; Please see the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018740\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"SoFi student loan refinancing&nbsp;page\">SoFi student loan refinancing&nbsp;page</a> on ServiceNow for further information.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">US based employees are eligible for this plan if they are an active full-time salaried employee scheduled to work 30 hours or more, with one year of continuous services prior to the start of the course for which reimbursement is to be provided.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The following criteria must be satisfied to qualify for consideration for education assistance:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The employee must have completed a minimum of 12 months continuous service prior to the start of the course for which reimbursement is to be provided. The length of continuous service shall be based on most recent hire date.&nbsp; For rehired employees, who are re-employed with Lendlease within one year, the 12 months of service will be based on the Service Recognition Date.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The proposed course/qualifications must be beneficial to the performance of the employee in their current role and be considered a sound investment for the business as a development requirement for the individual.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Attendance at the course and the required study commitment must not impact on the ability for the employees to fulfil the requirements of their role.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- The course must be deemed by Lendlease to be accredited from a reputable institution and lead to a recognized credential/qualification (e.g. diploma, degree, masters etc.).</span></p>\r\n<p><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Company may, upon approval, reimburse the following from a reputable, accredited institution:</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1. Up to $5,250 (pre-tax) for undergraduate degrees</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2. Up to $10,000 (amounts over $5,250 are taxable to the employee) for graduate degrees</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Above limits are per calendar year and are based on reimbursement check date.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The employee will pay for all fees up front and get reimbursed once the course and necessary documentation have been completed; and</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The employee will submit the tuition reimbursement form, along with any required supporting documentation, within six (6) months of completing the course(s).</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the <a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019094&amp;sys_kb_id=760a4a651b994d50d77c76e2cd4bcbd5\">Tuition Assistance Policy</a> &nbsp;and check if you meet the eligibility requirements.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Prior approval process required before beginning course(s). Therefore, speak to your manager about your intention to study or the studies you are undertaking.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read the Tuition/Education Assistance Instructions document located under Resources for easy step-by-step instructions to help you navigate through the application and approval process.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Complete the <a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Education%20Assistance%20Application%20Form.docx?d=w8ef00764d67d41598157e06497a7418f&amp;csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=eEg46Q\">Tuition (Education) Assistance Application</a> located under Resources of the Education Assistance section on the P&amp;C Microsite and save to your computer. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will need to download the application form as a WORD document and save to your desktop. More details are in the instructions document.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Apply in Workday and upload your application.&nbsp; Apply for each course separately in Workday, <strong><em>and not the full or entire program</em></strong>. However, if you are taking more than one course <strong><u>and</u></strong> they all have the same start and end dates, you can apply for up to four courses on one application.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will receive a notification from <a href=\"mailto:AMERBenefits@lendlease.com\">AMERBenefits@lendlease.com</a> confirming application approval and terms of sponsorship. </span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I receive reimbursement for my education costs?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read the Tuition/Education Assistance Instructions document located under Resources for easy step-by-step instructions to help you navigate through the reimbursement process.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Within six (6) months of the course(s) completion date, submit a completed/approved Tuition Reimbursement Form, grade(s), and tuition payment receipt(s) to <a href=\"mailto:AMERBenefits@lendlease.com\">AMERBenefits@lendlease.com</a>. A grade of \"C\" or higher, \"pass\" if not graded, or numerical grading equivalents are required for reimbursement of tuition, fees and books.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong>Who can I contact about the benefit?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">If you have any questions regarding Tuition Assistance, please contact People Connect at 866 848 1200, option 2, or email <a href=\"mailto:PeopleConnect@lendlease.com\">PeopleConnect@lendlease.com</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong>How do I approve Tuition Assistance? (People Managers only)</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">To view the criteria and entitlement relating to education assistance, please access the relevant policy located in the Resources section below. It is the responsibility of the employee, not the people manager to initiate a discussion about education assistance. Once you have had this conversation with your employee, schedule a follow-up meeting to check if all eligibility criteria are met.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Education Assistance requires two levels of approval. Have a discussion with your own manager to obtain their approval in principle before an application is made through the tuition process.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Confirm the decision with your employee and guide them to the Tuition Assistance section on the P&amp;C Microsite.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Review and confirm the Tuition Assistance request via Workday.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">As the manager of a department and/or local office it is your responsibility to budget for education assistance.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong><u>Note</u></strong>: Since Education Assistance is locally budgeted by each office, each Senior Office Leader has the discretion to cap or limit the total reimbursement for their office within a fiscal year. Prior to pre-approval, People &amp; Culture will verify each employee has not exceeded the USD $5,250 or $10,000 calendar year limit, as stated in the eligibility requirements section.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; Education support is","kb_knowledge_base":{"display_value":"People Connect Knowledge Americas","u_last_review_date":"2024-09-24","x_caukp_ebonding_provider_id":"","roles":"","direct":"false","description":"","disable_suggesting":"false","sn_grc_target_table":"","sys_class_name":"Knowledge","article_id":"172710fe1b7f20106d4e986cbc4bcbdb","sys_id":"d1680b4a1bf056104d4c0fa2cd4bcbba","use_count":"0","flagged":"false","disable_commenting":"false","valid_to":"2025-09-24","retired":"","u_add_to_homepage":"false","u_video_url":"","display_attachments":"false","latest":"true","summary":{"display_value":"KB0019094","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_summary/932710fe1b7f20106d4e986cbc4bcbdd"},"sys_view_count":"5","revised_by":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"5","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"AMER","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/89c8b38f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb85"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"5","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-11-14 03:51:17","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0019077","sys_updated_by":"kohj323","sys_created_on":"2024-11-14 03:07:41","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Our people and their development are fundamental to our ability to succeed as an organisation. So, it is important that we understand our people's aspirations and potential as well as the types of roles we need in order to help them and the organisation plan for the future. Our talent review process combined with succession planning is one of the ways we do that.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"color: black;\">FY25 Talent Review training sessions for People Managers</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you&rsquo;re a People Manager completing the FY25 talent review for your team, you can watch the recording of the <a href=\"https://lendlease-my.sharepoint.com/:v:/p/christian_frederiksen/EdEymUf0fcNBmUlNucnwO8IBlB-LFS_NbEk2SeiwtDPSXg?e=wbxs0S\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">training session</a> about the process and what you need to do.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Talent Review</span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Talent review at Lendlease enables us as a business to provide greater career progression and development opportunities for our people. In a talent review, we ask people managers to assess each of their team members in three ways &ndash; potential, performance over time, and aspiration.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Potential, performance over time, and an individual&rsquo;s career aspirations provides Lendlease increased transparency of our talent &ndash; ensuring we have the right people ready for business-critical roles &ndash; while also providing greater career progression and development opportunities for our people.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Measuring potential is based on the five dimensions of Learning Agility: mental agility, people agility, change agility, results agility, and self-awareness. You can read more about each learning agility in <em>How to Complete Talent Assessment </em>guide for People Managers (in the resources section below). </span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">This year we&rsquo;re also asking People Managers to indicate a <em>Target Next Role </em>for each of their team members during talent review, along with a judgment about their <em>Readiness</em> for that target role. This information will help leadership teams to consider a broader pool of potential successors for critical roles that is also aligned to our peoples&rsquo; aspirations.&nbsp; </span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Talent review is conducted on a global basis annually, between September and December. Talent conversations amongst leadership teams take place both during the talent review period and throughout the year &ndash; generally on a quarterly or as needs basis. &nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Succession Planning</span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">People managers regularly review and develop succession plans for roles within their team, identifying people who have both the potential and the aspiration to do a certain role. This is often conducted in conjunction with talent review but is an activity that can take place at any time during the year.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">The data collected through talent reviews, performance reviews, career conversations or an employee&rsquo;s Workday career profile, is used to:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin-bottom: 0cm; margin-top: 0px; list-style-position: inside;\" type=\"disc\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">identify potential successors,</li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">determine their level of readiness,</li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;\">and to create tailored development plans.</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #313231;\">Our aim is to have a broad and diverse pool of people who are ready to step into key positions within the organisation.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Employee Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=11c53a6adbf9da10ee773313e296195c\" alt=\"Quick Facts\" width=\"48px\" height=\"50px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; border-right: 1.5pt solid #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=11c53a6adbf9da10ee773313e296195c\" alt=\"Quick Facts\" width=\"48px\" height=\"50px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 502.75px; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #ffffff; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/How%20to%20complete%20a%20talent%20assessment.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"How to Complete a Talent Assessment: Guide for People Managers\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Next review date:</span></strong></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">August 2019</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Allows employees to take a maximum of 30 days unpaid leave with no impact to Benefits.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All Lendlease Employees in US.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Unpaid Short Term Personal Leave of Absence (USTPLOA) must be approved by your manager and the duration is for one month or less.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The employee is required to remit any employee paid premiums normally deducted from their paycheck to the Lendlease Benefits Department in Charlotte, NC.&nbsp; Lendlease Benefits Department will send an Insurance Statement to employee with appropriate amounts and due dates.&nbsp; The benefits are not terminated and remain intact for a maximum of one month from the first day of leave until the last day of leave.&nbsp; If an employee does not return to work after one month, then benefits are terminated.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All benefits end the last day of the month that the leave ends.</span><br /><br /><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Example of an USTPLOA:</span></strong><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">From 5/2/16 through 5/31/16</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Last Day Worked is 4/29/16</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Effective first day of Leave is 5/2/16</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All benefits end 5/31/16 if employee doesn't return to work as scheduled.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This is a stand-alone leave and not to be used in conjunction with any other leave of absences.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">* Last day of PTO in the event you are exhausting your PTO in order to take an Unpaid Short Term Personal Leave.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Holidays are not paid during an Unpaid Short Term Personal Leave of Absence.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>REFERENCE</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: Personal&nbsp;Leave of Absence Procedure\">Unpaid Short Term Personal&nbsp;Leave of Absence Procedure<br /></a></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Relocation benefits are applicable if you are requested to permanently relocate for work purposes. Relocations consider employee assignments, client and business needs, length of assignment, proximity to your home and various other factors.&nbsp; All reimbursements are made and reported in accordance with the prevailing income tax laws.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All employees asked by our business to permanently relocate themselves, spouse/domestic partner or their family due to an assignment in a new city may be eligible for relocation benefits.&nbsp; Under special circumstances only, newly hired employees will also be eligible for relocation benefits as part of a new hire package.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Standard items require normal approvals and the Non-Standard items require additional, higher level approvals. All approvals for relocation are granted as part of the Workday process.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; font-size: 12pt;\">Review the eligibility requirements. &nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the domestic relocation plan policy.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; Americas","u_last_review_date":"2024-12-19","x_caukp_ebonding_provider_id":"","roles":"","direct":"false","description":"","disable_suggesting":"false","sn_grc_target_table":"","sys_class_name":"Knowledge","article_id":"4377f330db236c50ee773313e29619ad","sys_id":"d4496b711b2656503569b91f034bcbb8","use_count":"0","flagged":"false","disable_commenting":"false","valid_to":"2025-12-19","retired":"","u_add_to_homepage":"false","u_video_url":"","display_attachments":"false","latest":"true","summary":{"display_value":"KB0018737","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_summary/a644d15e1bbf6010ef4543b4bd4bcb5d"},"sys_view_count":"0","revised_by":{"display_value":"Norhaniza Binti Mohd Razali","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/b8d1a1cc47716510fa3d6da7a46d436d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"AMER","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/89c8b38f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb85"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2025-04-29 18:12:10","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0019115","sys_updated_by":"hinw325","sys_created_on":"2025-04-21 21:28:48","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our people are at the heart of everything we do, so your health and wellbeing is important to us. Keeping you safe and well, both physically and mentally is the aim of Wellbeing leave. This enables eligible employees with the opportunity to proactively focus on their mental and physical wellbeing so they are able to return to work feeling refreshed, more positive, engaged and able to perform at their best.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A suite of mental health programs are also now offered to employees and their families, covering mind health, active intervention and recovery support.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The guidelines below will be reviewed occasionally, to ensure their ongoing relevance. Lendlease reserves the right to change or cancel this leave benefit at any time.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing leave is available to all employees who have successfully completed their probationary period. It is a discretionary benefit that does not form part of an employee&rsquo;s contract of employment. This benefit does not apply to agency workers or self-employed contractors.</span><br><br></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The expectation is that each eligible employee will take one day in every fourth month period to focus on their wellbeing </span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PLAN</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing leave is intended to be used for activities where there is a perceived health benefit, to proactively prevent illness and positively impact wellbeing. Employees are entrusted to use their judgement to utilise these days as they deem appropriate for their own health and wellbeing.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees can take Wellbeing leave as a half or full day on separate dates. Booking on consecutive days is not permitted. We trust you to use Wellbeing leave reasonably and appropriately and encourage the leave to be taken at consistent intervals throughout the year.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is expected that Wellbeing leave days will only be requested at a time when the business is not unduly impacted, and if necessary, alternative timing may be agreed between you and your manager.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must apply for Wellbeing leave in advance.&nbsp;Think about what time and the type of activity you would like to undertake. Examples of programs include:&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 3.0pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Addiction Help Program&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 3.0pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing education / Health coaching&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 3.0pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Counselling&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 3.0pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">One day Yoga / meditation course&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 3.0pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellness Check&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border: 3.0pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Carers Respite&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please note: the examples above are for guidance purposes only and is not intended to be an exhaustive list.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing leave cannot be:</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Used to extend an annual leave period;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Carried over from year to year;&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Paid out when you leave Lendlease;&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- On consecutive days.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>ACT</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You must apply for Wellbeing leave in advance via Workday.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing leave can be taken as a half day or more.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are not required to disclose the reason for the leave application.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your Wellbeing leave will be automatically approved in Workday.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FINALISE</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If necessary, create or revise your department calendars to reflect your time away from the office and/or out of office automatic replies within MSOffice Outlook.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How does it differ from other leave offerings?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wellbeing leave&nbsp;is treated as the&nbsp;preventative&nbsp;portion of sick leave allowing employees to take a pre-booked half or full day off work to engage in an activity that benefits their health and wellbeing. Wellbeing leave is not a form of flexible working. Flexible working is an alternative working practice, rather than a form of leave.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sick leave&nbsp;is for&nbsp;recovery&nbsp;and is intended to ensure employees take the appropriate time to recover and rehabilitate from an illness or injury.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Annual leave&nbsp;is paid time off work granted to employees to be used for whatever the employee wishes.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How is the offering monitored and reported?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The usage of the Wellbeing leave benefit will be monitored to see how successful the uptake is and to understand the impact on employees and also on sick leave, if any. We would like to learn more about how Wellbeing leave is used and may periodically survey applicants for anonymous feedback. However, we do acknowledge that employees might choose not to participate for the purposes of confidentiality.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The allocation of Wellbeing leave is discretionary but will be monitored alongside the sick leave allocation.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Who can I contact regarding the benefit?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For any questions regarding this benefit, please speak to your manager or contact People Connect on (0)20 8271 8444 or ask People Connect online using the button on the top right hand corner of this page.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center;
