You can extend your employee&rsquo;s fixed term contract in this section</span></p>\r\n<p class=\"list_Paragraph\" style=\"margin-left: 36.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b. Click <img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=763352ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb01\" alt=\"\" width=\"85px\" height=\"29px\" />to send for approvals</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 255.15pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=f63352ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb03\" alt=\"\" width=\"144px\" height=\"378px\" /></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=7a3352ec1b4cf010b03a9829bc4bcb05\" alt=\"\" width=\"109px\" height=\"123px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 28.4pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\"><br /></td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 481.7pt; vertical-align: top; padding-top: 9.9pt; padding-bottom: 9.9pt; border: 1.0pt solid #A6A6A6;\" colspan=\"2\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Once approved, the Job Change wil take place on the nominated effective date. If you need to check where an approval process is up to, Ask People Connect on 1800 554 044.</strong></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p class=\"footer\" style=\"margin-right: 0.0pt;\"><br /></p>","sys_created_by":"hinw325","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"x_caukp_ebonding_integration_mode":null,"can_read_user_criteria":"","active":"true","cannot_read_user_criteria":"","published":"2021-05-07","helpful_count":"0","sys_domain_path":"/","u_view_count_all":"195","version":{"display_value":"2.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_version/71f316201b8cf010b03a9829bc4bcbea"},"x_caukp_ebonding_requester_id":"","meta_description":"A new position is NOT required when you are changing minor details of an employee’s role. style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><strong><span style=\"color: #008080;\">Managing Performance</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1.5pt solid #DDDDDD;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">&nbsp;</span><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=3f8cd5061b3bc2904d4c0fa2cd4bcb4c\" alt=\"\" width=\"300px\" height=\"169px\" /></span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 15.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #191631; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">&ldquo;If you&rsquo;re trying to achieve, there will be roadblocks.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #191631; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"> I&rsquo;ve had them; everybody has had them.</span><br /><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #191631; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"> But obstacles don't have to stop you.</span><br /><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #191631; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"> Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.&rdquo;&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #191631; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"> Michael Jordan, Basketball player, cultural icon.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">Key to a People Manager&rsquo;s role is creating an engaged work culture and exhibiting behaviours that are in line with Lendlease&rsquo;s core values and key principles.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 15.0pt;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> The&nbsp;</span><u><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/The%20Leadership%20Calendar%20of%20People%20Processes.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Leadership calendar of people processes</span></a></u><span style=\"color: #222222;\">&nbsp;can help you identify what your team needs throughout the year.&nbsp; To manage performance in the best possible way, these people processes need to be supplemented with continuous conversations, and open and transparent communication.</span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\">Leaders have to Lead</span></strong></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Have regular one on one&rsquo;s with everyone in your team. Be consistent and make these a priority.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Set goals and be clear on objectives and expectations. Walk the talk and set the example for your team.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Give feedback. See something great? Acknowledge it and be specific about why it was valuable. See something you don&rsquo;t like? Have a conversation about it quickly.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Know your team. Understand what makes them feel value, </span><span style=\"color: #222222;\">engaged</span><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> and supported. Diversity of thought, backgrounds and experience all bring rich value to a team&rsquo;s success so ensure everyone has a chance to contribute and be heard.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Communicate key messages. Ensure you share important organisational messages with your team so that they know what it means for them and the work they are undertaking.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Measure outcomes and behaviours. With teams working all over the globe, you may be responsible for individuals who you can&rsquo;t see day to day. Set clear expectations on what they need to deliver and by when. Measure their output and their engagement. Assume the best </span><span style=\"color: #222222;\">of your</span><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> people.</span></span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: #008080;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br />Managing Poor Performance</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 15.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Underperformance or poor performance can include not performing duties, or not performing them to the required standard; displaying negative or disruptive behaviour in the workplace and or failing to comply with workplace policies, </span><span style=\"color: #222222;\">rules</span><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> or procedures. Underperformance doesn&rsquo;t just affect the output of an individual employee &ndash; it can also impact co-workers, </span><span style=\"color: #222222;\">customers</span><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> and business productivity.</span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 15.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">There are many reasons why an employee might perform poorly. An employee might not know what&rsquo;s expected of them because goals and standards are </span><span style=\"color: #222222;\">unclear</span><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> or they may not have the knowledge or skills to do the job.</span></span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/Microsite-People-Culture/SitePages/Employee-essentials.aspx#employee-conduct\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Employee Conduct\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Employee Conduct</span></a></u></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/learning/course/dc17df3cf98d01b303d90d15590e542d?type=9882927d138b100019b928e75843018d&amp;record=a90d51535aab01a3c90e0010e90120eb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Managing Poor Performance </span></a></u><span style=\"color: #000000;\">(digital)</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/learning/course/dc17df3cf98d01a7a5358af5580ee92c?type=9882927d138b100019b928e75843018d&amp;record=1b8daef824d4014f4cb1e670dc3b5d4e\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">The Art of Feedback </span></a></u><span style=\"color: #000000;\">(digital)</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FPeople%5FCulture%2FShared%20Documents%2FManagingPoorPerformanceToolkit%2Epdf&amp;parent=%2Fsites%2FPeople%5FCulture%2FShared%20Documents\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Managing Poor Performance Toolkit</span></a></u></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/People_Culture/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7B86AA7791-D0C0-46BB-9486-5059F07E2E77%7D&amp;file=AppendixC%20-%20Performance%20Improvement%20Plan%20Template.docx&amp;action=default&amp;mobileredirect=true\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Performance Improvement Plan Template</span></a></u></span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: #008080;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br />Managing High Performance</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 15.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">When you acknowledge high performance, it not only builds team morale, but also validates the individual&rsquo;s or team&rsquo;s effort to achieve their goals.</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 15.0pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">High performers represent an enormous asset to your </span><span style=\"color: #222222;\">team, but</span><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> leading them can require you to think a little differently.&nbsp; Consider how you will continue to develop, engage, </span><span style=\"color: #222222;\">support</span><span style=\"color: #222222;\"> and retain these individuals. Continuous conversations with high performers are essential.&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Set </span><u><span style=\"color: #000000;\">Stretch Targets&nbsp;</span></u><span style=\"color: #000000;\">and keep them challenged.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Sponsor them for projects that will build their development while leveraging their skills and capabilities.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Give them autonomy to get the job done.&nbsp; Tell them what to do, but not how to do it. </span><u><span style=\"color: #000000;\">Situational Leadership</span></u><span style=\"color: #000000;\">&nbsp;can help with this.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #222222;\">Make sure they are rewarded and recognised in whatever manner is appropriate.</span></span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin-bottom: 0.0pt;\"><span style=\"color: #008080;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br />Resources</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/sites/Microsite-People-Culture/SitePages/Employee-essentials.aspx#employee-conduct\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Employee Conduct</span></a></u></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019133\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Setting Stretch Goals and Targets</span></a></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019101\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Performance and Career</span></a></u></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://myapps.microsoft.com/signin/OC%20Tanner%20-%20AppreciateHub/17acbc6a-1cd3-496b-bfd2-35d7ad5bcf45?tenantId=bc0c325b-6efc-4ca8-9e46-11b50fe2aab5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Stellar</span></a></u></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><u><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0019077\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><span style=\"color: #4d85c5;\">Talent and Succession Planning</span></a></u></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your health and safety is valued at Lendlease, which is why we provide a range of insurance benefits for our Asia employees.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent full-time, fixed term contract full-time and part-time employees who are employed on local terms are eligible for insurance benefits.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br><span style=\"color: #008080;\"><strong>What are the insurance benefits available for Malaysia employees?</strong></span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Group Personal Accident<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This plan provides 24-hour worldwide coverage for employees in case of death, total or permanent disablement due to an accident.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Group Term Life</strong>&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This plan provides 24-hour worldwide coverage for employees in case of death, total or permanent disablement or terminal illness.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Group Hospital and Surgical<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This plan provides employees and their eligible dependents with 24-hour worldwide coverage for daily room and board, hospital services, surgery, pre and post-hospitalisation specialist consultation, diagnostic x-ray and lab tests, emergency outpatient treatment (for accidents only) and others, subject to the &lsquo;Schedule of Benefits&rsquo;.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Employment Injury Scheme (SOCSO)<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This plan covers employees for injuries from accidents sustained out of and in the course of employment, in accordance with SOCSO&rsquo;s Employment Injury Scheme.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Group Travel Insurance<br><br></strong> All employees of Lendlease engaged in business related travel are covered by our travel insurance policy.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Details of the coverage will be made available to employees separately by their department administrators together with the flight booking.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is Lendlease policy to support new parents by granting shared parental leave to eligible employees.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees who are eligible for maternity, adoption or partner leave are eligible for shared parental leave.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees may receive payments during this period, providing they meet further eligibility criteria outlined in the policy.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Family Leave Policy.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PREPARE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Discuss with your manager your intention to take shared parental leave.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ACT</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Inform your manager in writing, of your intention to take shared parental leave. This should include:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A \"maternity/adoption leave curtailment notice\" from the birth parent or primary carer setting out when they propose to end maternity/adoption leave (unless they have already returned to work);</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A \"notice of entitlement and intention\" giving an initial, non-binding indication of each period of shared parental leave that you are requesting; and</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A \"period of leave notice\" setting out the start and end dates of each period of shared parental leave that you are requesting.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter your leave request in Workday.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will respond in writing within 28 days of receiving your notice of the date in which you intend to begin your shared parental leave.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Can I change my shared parental leave dates?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You may vary or cancel your shared parental leave dates by providing your manager with eight weeks' notice and amending your leave request in Workday.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Am I entitled to time off for antenatal appointments?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees have the right to take time off to accompany their pregnant partner to up to two antenatal appointments made on the advice of a doctor, midwife or health visitor. This time off will be unpaid.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees should provide as much notice as possible for any appointments.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease encourages flexibility because everyone leads different lives and has different needs.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We understand that your passions outside of work, your family situations and even your daily commute are important parts of your life.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">So if you need some flexibility to allow you to be you, let&rsquo;s explore the options.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through our Flexible Working Policy for more information on working flexibly at Lendlease Asia.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Explore the Options</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There are many reasons why someone might want to work flexibly and there are many ways of working flexibly. Some are as simple as leaving early one day a week for an outside interest and making up hours another day, to working more hours over fewer days.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The more common ways of working flexibly include working part-time or job sharing, different start and finish times or working from home. But it can be more than that.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Workplace Flexibility Policy to find out more about the criteria for and different options of flexible working.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br />Discuss your needs</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Flexible work enables change to when and where you work. Successful flexible working arrangements are mutually beneficial to you, your manager and your team and drive great outcomes.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When discussing working flexibly, please consider:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Having an open conversation with your manager about your needs</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Thinking about the role and any modifications that might need to be made</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Agreeing upfront on how communication will be maintained and enhanced</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Communicating with the team about the flexible work arrangement</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Respect and trust for the agreed way of working</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Guide to Flexible Working under the Resources section for more information.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br />Embracing Technology</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Technology is the key enabler to helping you work flexibly at Lendlease. Our ICT team have a suite of tools and resources to assist you and your team. From laptops and soft phones to video conferencing and more.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Technology for Flexible Work Guide under the Resources section for more information.</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Safety in the Workplace</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Wherever you are working, we need to ensure you are safe and looking after your wellbeing. Some of the things to consider for your workspace outside of the office include:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Ergonomic setup of your workstation</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Adequate lighting and ventilation</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Trip hazards</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Smoke detectors fitted</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Read through the Working From Home Checklist under the Resources section for more information</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><br /><span style=\"color: #008080;\">Resources</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=a38f125f1b3360106d4e986cbc4bcb35\" alt=\"Quick Facts\" width=\"48px\" height=\"50px\" /></span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Flexible%20Working%20Conversation%20Guide%20v4.pdf?csf=1&amp;web=1&amp;e=ufpbM6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"Flexible Working Conversation Guide\">Flexible Working Conversation Guide</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br /></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 60.0pt; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unpaid Standby Leave of Absence (USLOA) allows you to take an unpaid leave during a 12 month period with no impact to your benefits. &nbsp;This leave is designed to be taken between projects.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">USLOA can be taken at a minimum of one-week increments and must be approved by your one up manager or PIC.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><br /></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All active, salaried employees scheduled to work 30 or more hours per week.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees must use all accrued paid time off (PTO) prior to the start of the unpaid leave of absence.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I apply?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN&nbsp;</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; and benefits summary.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"5","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"AMER","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/e5e7b30f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcbf4"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2025-04-29 20:27:20","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At Lendlease, your career journey can take many paths, providing you with a variety of learning opportunities. We encourage you to take responsibility for your own career development by using the career and job framework (CJF) and development tools available to determine you career path.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What is the Career and Job Framework (CJF)?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All roles at Lendlease are grouped according to our career and job framework (CJF). Our CJF provides a common language for us to understand and manage the capability of our workforce.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our CJF is used across all People &amp; Culture activities including compensation, learning, strategic workforce planning, talent acquisition and career development. It is also utilised through the financial processes in both invoicing and forecasting.&nbsp;The frameworks also changes and adapts as our business evolves.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Our framework makes no reference to organisational structure or hierarchy, and is focused purely on the capability required for a role. This helps you identify where your skills and capabilities can be used throughout the business, rather than limiting your career path to your current business unit. The CJF is more than just categorising the roles &ndash; it gives you the opportunity to reach your potential and go places with us.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can use the&nbsp;CJF library tool to explore the various job categories, job levels and broad position descriptions available within&nbsp;each job family. &nbsp;This will help you understand the capability required for different roles and enable you to focus on developing any gaps for your preferred career path.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I use the CJF library?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The CJF library provides you with visibility of all the roles available within Lendlease according to our CJF.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">By searching on 'job family', you will be shown the various roles that exist across job categories and job levels. &nbsp;Then by clicking on a role, you will be able to view a broad job description.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>There are 3 job types:<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">-&nbsp;Individual contributor&nbsp;roles do not have people leader responsibilities</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">-&nbsp;People leader&nbsp;roles have line manager responsibilities for Lendlease employees. &nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">-&nbsp;Executive&nbsp;roles are the most senior roles in the organisation identified by group management.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Select from the drop-down fields to display information according to a particular job family or category. &nbsp;You can return to the complete listing of our job families at any time if you would like to explore alternative career paths in different job families within Lendlease.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The CJF library can be accessed via&nbsp;<a href=\"https://wd3.myworkday.com/lendlease/d/task/1422$134.htmld\">Workday</a>.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I plan my development?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you have identified your ideal career path, we encourage you to take ownership of your development by proactively using the 70:20:10 learning approach, where:&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">-&nbsp;70% of your learning should come from experiences, projects and working through tasks.</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">-&nbsp;20% of your learning should come from relationships like manager interactions, mentoring and networking.&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">-&nbsp;10% of your learning should come from traditional development activities like training, seminars, conferences and courses.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How do I locate current vacancies?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are ready to make your next career move and want to keep informed about internal opportunities, you view this information via the Career Worklet on Workday. It is important to note that while our CJF uses broad global job titles, the current job opportunities on the careers page refers to local business titles.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Visit the internal recruitment page on Pulse for more information on the internal recruitment and selection process.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Resources</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">In Australia, our pay is described as total package value (TPV) which is made up of your total remuneration and company contributions to your superannuation.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Details of your TPV are provided in your letter of offer and updates are provided annually in your compensation statement.</span>&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">For salaried employees, your total remuneration will be paid monthly, less applicable taxation and salary-packaged components you have elected.  Additionally, eligible employees (noted in your letter of offer) may elect to sacrifice for fixed benefit allocations and variable packaged items.</span></span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"color: #169179;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">When will I be paid?</span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">All salaried employees are paid into their specified bank account </span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\">no later than </span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">the 15th of each month, unless the 15th falls on a weekend or public holiday, in which case it will be paid the prior working day.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #169179;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What do I need to know if I am a casual or retail employee?</span> </strong></span>&nbsp;<br><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Casual or retail employees can find information&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0020221\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><strong><span style=\"color: rgb(35, 111, 161);\">here</span></strong></span> </a>on how to enter worked hours and when they will be paid.</span></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"color: #169179;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What is the payroll cut-off date?</span>&nbsp;</span></strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">In order for Australian payroll teams to process pay runs in time to meet scheduled payment dates, employees must submit changes and have them approved in Workday by the below cut off dates.</span></span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Monthly pay cycle: 5th of the month.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Weekly pay cycle: Friday, close of business.</span></span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">This includes payment election changes and updating of personal details.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Changes made after payroll cut off will be processed in the following pay cycle.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Salary sacrifice elections need to be completed in Workday by last working day of the month to be effective from following month Any salary sacrifice elections made from the 1</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">st</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> of the month onwards will only be considered in the next month.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"color: #169179;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Managing my details</span>&nbsp;</span></strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">View and manage your personal information in Workday.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Click <span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><strong><span style=\"color: #236fa1; text-decoration: underline;\"><a style=\"color: #236fa1; text-decoration: underline;\">here</a></span></strong></span> for more information.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"color: #169179;\"><strong><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How can I obtain my Payment Summary (Income Statement)?</span>&nbsp;</span></strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Lendlease uses Single Touch Payroll, which means payment summaries (group certificates) will not be mailed to employees or stored in Workday. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">You can access your Income Statement online via your <span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"color: #236fa1; text-decoration: underline;\"><a href=\"https://my.gov.au\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"color: #236fa1; text-decoration: underline;\">myGov</a></span></span> account provided you have linked your Australian Tax Office (ATO) account to it.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">If you do not have access to a myGov account, please contact the ATO to access your Income Statement.</span></span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"color: #169179;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Superannuation</span>&nbsp;</span></strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: underline;\"><span style=\"color: #236fa1; text-decoration: underline;\"><strong><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018776\" sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: #169179;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Resources</span></strong></span></span></p>\r\n<ul>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #236fa1; text-decoration: underline;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" Global  (Not required for US Employees)","u_last_review_date":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider_id":"","roles":"","direct":"false","description":"","disable_suggesting":"false","sn_grc_target_table":"","sys_class_name":"Knowledge","article_id":"531447f41bbfa4106d4e986cbc4bcbe7","sys_id":"f6d0cfa31b7be0106d4e986cbc4bcbe8","use_count":"0","flagged":"false","disable_commenting":"false","valid_to":"2100-01-01","retired":"","u_add_to_homepage":"false","u_video_url":"","display_attachments":"false","latest":"true","summary":{"display_value":"KB0018976","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_knowledge_summary/4b44d15e1bbf6010ef4543b4bd4bcbfc"},"sys_view_count":"2","revised_by":{"display_value":"Wendy Hinks","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/6a5918de13801a00d774fc04e144b08d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"6","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"Global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/f348bf0f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcb11"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2025-04-29 17:53:41","x_caukp_ebonding_sdc":"","number":"KB0018776","sys_updated_by":"hinw325","sys_created_on":"2025-04-28 23:32:13","sys_domain":{"display_value":"global","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user_group/global"},"x_caukp_ebonding_no_return":"false","u_select_portal":{"display_value":"IT Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Superannuation is about planning and providing for your financial future. Lendlease makes contributions on behalf of each employee every month (referred to as Superannuation Guarantee Contributions - SGC) in line with government legislation.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Where an employee does not make an election (choice of fund) in respect of a specific superannuation fund, Lendlease must seek instructions from the ATO regarding the employees Stapled superannuation fund and deposit&nbsp; their employment SGC to that fund.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Permanent Australian based employees are eligible to join the Lendlease Superannuation Plan as provided by Mercer.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If an employee chooses to use a Self Managed Super Fund (SMSF) and at any time, ceases to be compliant, the contributions for that employee will be directed to the employees Stapled superannuation fund. Contributions will continue to be directed here until the employee is able to verify that the SMSF compliance has been reinstated.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Lendlease superannuation plans with Mercer and Hesta include a level of insurance for death, total and permanent disability, and for permanent employees in Mercer, income protection insurance. Employees are encouraged to refer to the product disclosure statements of the fund applicable to their employment type for further information.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees are encouraged to familiarise themselves with the annual contributions caps and be reminded that any insurance premiums paid by Lendlease will count towards that cap.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please also be aware of all conditions relating to salary sacrifice for superannuation as addressed in the questions and answers below. It is strongly advised that employee&rsquo;s seek financial advice before making any elections with respect to salary sacrifice benefits including superannuation.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>How do I change superannuation funds?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To change to your superannuation fund after you have commenced employment, please complete the&nbsp;Superannuation Standard Choice form and send it to the relevant payroll email address below. &nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\">To change to Mercer add the following details to the Standard Choice form</span></span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Super fund name:&nbsp;Mercer Super Trust - Lendlease Superannuation Plan (ABN 19 905 422 981)</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unique superannuation identifier (USI):&nbsp;19905422981184</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Phone:&nbsp;1800 682 525</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Super fund website address:&nbsp;mercersupertrust.com</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To change to Equip add the following details to the Standard Choice form</span></span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Super fund name:&nbsp;Equipsuper Superannuation Fund (ABN 33 813 823 017)</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unique superannuation identifier (USI):&nbsp;33 813 823 017 000</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Phone:&nbsp;1800 682 626</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Super fund website address:&nbsp;www.equipsuper.com.au</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"mailto:RLPayroll@lendlease.com\" rel=\"nofollow\"><br></a> All other Lendlease Companies:&nbsp;<a href=\"mailto:PayteamAU@lendlease.com\" rel=\"nofollow\">PayteamAU@lendlease.com</a></span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong>Can I allocate additional funds to my superannuation account?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Yes, you can allocate part of your salary as additional contributions via salary sacrifice or co-contribution to your superannuation fund. To do this, make this election using the benefits worklet in Workday.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Please be aware of the concessional contribution cap that applies to you. Please visit the ATO website for further details.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All additional contributions will be forwarded to your superannuation fund in the month following processing.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can only allocate superannuation contributions to one fund.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Additional Conditions</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Salary Sacrifice contributions are subject to a 15% deduction for government tax (and may be subject to an additional 15% tax for 'high income earners', as defined by the ATO):</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As part of my concessional contributions and I am solely responsible for:</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Monitoring whether the concessional contributions made by, or for, me to any superannuation fund exceed my concessional contributions cap: and</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">-&nbsp;Any&nbsp;additional tax&nbsp;on superannuation contributions that exceed that cap.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Are subject to awards/agreements and must be made prior to the commencement of the relevant pay period; and</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">- Are subject to preservation under superannuation legislation.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #008080;\"><strong><br>How do I access my superannuation account?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Most funds have online facilities for accessing your account details. Please contact your fund to obtain your login information.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"border-collapse: collapse; width: auto; height: 166.562px; background-color: #c2e0f4;\" cellpadding=\"6.75pt 7.5pt\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 33.3906px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Position management helps an organisation clearly define and arrange its structure to better meet operational requirements, now and in the future. Under a Position Management approach, firstly the team structure is determined based on the resource requirements and all positions and levels are identified. People are then assigned to positions within that structure.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Position Management allows managers to have visibility of all roles (in real time) including vacant positions, so they can make decisions around backfilling or closing a vacant position. This will also assist with headcount planning, budgeting and reporting as well as other people management activities (e.g. separations, job sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your manager will review the application and you will be notified via Workday of the outcome.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"width: 60.0pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; border-right: 1.5pt solid #FFFFFF; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=78e03b941b44f010ef4543b4bd4bcbb6\" alt=\"Stationery_Paper_BLK_PNG png\" width=\"48px\" height=\"59px\" /></span><br style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018927\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Unpaid Infant Care Leave Policy\">Unpaid Infant Care Leave Policy</a>&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Binti Mohd Razali","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/b8d1a1cc47716510fa3d6da7a46d436d"},"article_type":"HTML","u_needs_review":"false","sys_mod_count":"5","sn_grc_source":"","sys_tags":"","replacement_article":"","x_caukp_ebonding_provider":"","taxonomy_topic":"","view_as_allowed":"true","x_caukp_ebonding_requester":"","ownership_group":"","category":null,"kb_category":{"display_value":"ASIA","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_category/6768bb4f1b2bac102cbba8a8b04bcbd1"}},{"u_reminder_send_date":"","wiki":"","rating":"","source":"","sys_updated_on":"2024-02-29 Portal","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sp_portal/22553273132a8490dffa30ded144b0f7"},"workflow_state":"Published","text":"<p><span style=\"color: #008080;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Group People &amp; Culture</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1.5pt solid #DDDDDD;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Approver's name and title &nbsp;</strong> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Board &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Effective Date&nbsp;</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">May 2015</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Review Date</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">February 2019</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;padding-top: 0.75pt; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt 6.75pt 7.5pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Next Review Date &nbsp;</strong> &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">February 2020</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Lendlease Group comprising Lendlease Corporation Limited and Lendlease Responsible Entity Limited as responsible entity of the Lendlease Trust (Lendlease) is committed to building a workplace in which all individuals are supported, respected and connected.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE&nbsp;<br /></strong> </span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease embraces all employee differences including age, gender, ethnicity, physical appearance, physical or mental disabilities, values, lifestyle, religion, sexual orientation and identity, nationality, education, family responsibilities and military or veteran status and recognises the benefits that diversity brings to maximise corporate goals.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br /></strong> Reasons for Diversity and Inclusion&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">To create the best places, we need a culture and an environment that embraces and respects difference. One where people can bring their &lsquo;whole self&rsquo; to work and feel safe, empowered and motivated to be the best they can be. Diversity and Inclusion is a key enabler to realising our vision to create the best places. Specifically:&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Innovation and productivity &ndash; to remain competitive and to differentiate in the market, innovation is critical. We know that our people will be more innovative, productive and engaged when they can bring their &lsquo;whole self&rsquo; to work.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Core values &ndash; Diversity and inclusion is key to bringing our desired culture and core values to life.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Employer of choice &ndash; Lendlease strives to be an employer of choice and an inclusive culture, embedded throughout the employee life cycle, is critical to this.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Global market forces &ndash; Lendlease is a global company made up of people with diverse ideas, experiences and backgrounds. We need to harness this to realise greater productivity and success.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;It&rsquo;s the right thing to do &ndash; whilst we aspire beyond compliance to market best practice in Diversity and Inclusion, we can&rsquo;t ignore the important compliance elements to ensuring that our workforce is inclusive and free of any harassment or discrimination.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>The Board&rsquo;s Commitment</strong>&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Lendlease Board fully supports Diversity and Inclusion, and is instrumental in driving Lendlease&rsquo;s Diversity and Inclusion agenda.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">As part of its wider process of increasing diversity and inclusion across the Group, Lendlease is focused on:&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;realising gender equality throughout all key employee experiences, including recruitment, performance and remuneration reviews and development opportunities;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;realising workplace flexibility for all employees across the Lendlease Group;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;creating accessible &lsquo;places&rsquo;, both for our employees in workplace design and our customers in construction design;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;driving an inclusion culture through communication and education campaigns;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;providing holistic support to our employees in their role as carers.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In relation to gender diversity, the Board has set targets in accordance with the ASX Corporate Governance Principles and Recommendations. The achievement of these goals will be supported by succession planning, career development programs, graduate programs, mentoring and recruiting activities. Objectives are reviewed by the Board on an annual basis.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Board Composition - Commitment</strong>&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When identifying candidates for vacancies on the Lendlease Board of Directors, the Nomination Committee:&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a)&nbsp;will commit to achieving a Board composition that reflects a diversity of backgrounds, knowledge, experience and abilities;&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">b)&nbsp;include at least one female as part of the interview and selection panel for Board appointments; and&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">c)&nbsp;for Board succession planning, identify and include female candidates with suitable skills and experience.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease will disclose annually, the proportion of women in senior executive positions against targets and the number of women on the Lendlease Board.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Diversity and Inclusion Goals of Lendlease</strong>&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Five key goals underpin Lendlease&rsquo;s approach to managing Diversity and Inclusion, and they are as follows:&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1.&nbsp;Become a&nbsp;leader&nbsp;in establishing and maintaining a diverse and inclusive workplace.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2.&nbsp;Include and embed diversity and inclusion principles in the Lendlease&nbsp;culture&nbsp;so that they are followed in the Lendlease community.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">3.&nbsp;Provide&nbsp;career development&nbsp;opportunities for all key talent in a fair and equitable way.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">4.&nbsp;Continually&nbsp;educate&nbsp;all employees about the importance of a diverse and inclusive workplace to business success.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">5.&nbsp;Ensure&nbsp;fairness and parity&nbsp;in creating and maintaining a diverse and inclusive workplace.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Measuring Diversity and Inclusion</strong>&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease is committed to becoming a leader in establishing and maintaining a Diverse and Inclusive workplace. A number of methods are used to assess Lendlease&rsquo;s performance in terms of achieving its diversity goals. These include:&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Employee perceptions which are measured quantitatively and qualitatively. Periodic global employee engagement surveys will assess sentiment on a quantitative basis, and employee focus groups and feedback forums, will capture sentiment on a qualitative basis. These will identify issues, collect ideas, test solutions and track and measure sentiment regarding a range of diversity topics including cultural diversity, workplace flexibility and gender equity. All results drive diversity priorities.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Employee Resource Groups governed by Regional Diversity Councils, continually track issues and identify opportunities to further progress the Groups Diversity and Inclusion agenda and performance.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;Employee data such as workforce diversity by itself as well as across employee learning and development, succession planning and recruitment, are tracked and used to further refine diversity and inclusion strategies, initiatives and processes. For example in relation to gender equity, key data is tracked including gender splits by region, business, role and level, retention development programs and the recruitment process.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;External benchmarking is undertaken on a regular basis. We compare ourselves to other organisations, both within industry and more broadly on a number of key Diversity and Inclusion criteria.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Managing Diversity and Inclusion Day to Day</strong>&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The following committees and councils oversee Lendlease&rsquo;s Diversity and inclusion strategies:&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;The People and Culture (P&amp;C) Committee is a committee of the Lendlease Board to which the Board has delegated the responsibility to review the effectiveness of policies on workplace diversity and equal opportunity. Diversity and Inclusion issues are considered during discussion at every P&amp;C Committee meeting and recommendations are made to the Board as appropriate. The P&amp;C Committee will establish with management and the Board a process that will also measure the extent to which the Board and senior executives adhere to the measurable objectives.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;The Nomination Committee is responsible for reviewing the performance of existing Lendlease Board members and identifying potential board candidates. The Nomination Committee provides advice and support to the Board so that the Board is comprised of individuals who in combination bring a mix of expertise, skills, experience and perspectives and who will enhance the Board&rsquo;s strength and range of insight.&nbsp;</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&bull;&nbsp;The Global Head of Diversity and Inclusion works with the Global and Regional Leadership teams to determine priorities and drive implementation of the global Diversity and Inclusion programs which are reflective of Board recommendations and consistent global priorities.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Disclosure&nbsp;<br /></strong> Information regarding Lendlease&rsquo;s Diversity and Inclusion policy, strategies and performance is included in the Group&rsquo;s Annual Report.</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A copy of this policy is available on the Lendlease website at&nbsp;<a href=\"http://www.lendlease.com/\" rel=\"nofollow\">www.lendlease.com</a>&nbsp;in the &lsquo;Corporate Governance&rsquo; section.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Endorsed by the Board on 21 February 2019.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Download&nbsp;<a href=\"https://pulse.lendlease.com/-/media/intranet/pulse/documents/aboutus/policies/1-people/group-policy-diversity--inclusion-2019-pdf.pdf?la=en&amp;hash=A5062E107A892F69E71C056FE535B784D5EC26F5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"Diversity and Inclusion Policy\">Diversity and Inclusion Policy<br /></a> For more information visit the&nbsp;<a href=\"http://pulse.lendlease.com/sites/diversityandinclusion\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\">Diversity and Inclusion Microsite</a></span></p>","sys_created_by":"hinw325","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy Wong","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_user/3ff81f981ba0e110ef4543b4bd4bcb57"},"x_caukp_ebonding_integration_mode":null,"can_read_user_criteria":"","active":"true","cannot_read_user_criteria":"","published":"2021-05-07","helpful_count":"0","sys_domain_path":"/","u_view_count_all":"97","version":{"display_value":"2.0","link":"https://lendlease.service-now.com/api/now/table/kb_version/9e012e1c1b48b010ef4543b4bd4bcb04"},"x_caukp_ebonding_requester_id":"","meta_description":"Group People & Culture Approver's name and title Board Effective Date May 2015 Review Date February 2019","kb_knowledge_base":{"display_value":"People Connect Knowledge
