font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>When do Performance conversations take place?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Goal setting takes place at the start of the financial year, usually in August.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">We recommend you schedule time to have your mid-year review conversation in January or February.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Year-end conversations take place in June and July each year.&nbsp; Because year-end reviews are captured in Workday, each June we communicate a detailed timeline that highlights specific due dates.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>How should I prepare for my performance review conversations?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Performance review conversations are an opportunity to reflect and reset. Think about your achievements and what has gone well, but also what hasn&rsquo;t gone as planned and the lessons you have learned along the way.&nbsp; It is also helpful to reflect not only on WHAT you achieved, but also HOW you achieved it.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">While performance is a key conversation during these meetings, we also suggest you take the opportunity to discuss other important topics like flexibility, wellbeing and personal development.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There are also great resources on Workday Learning to help you in developing your skills in giving and receiving feedback, development planning, and setting effective sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lendlease is focused on creating an environment that helps employees stay healthy and productive. Healthcare is a shared responsibility between employees and the Company. At Lendlease, we provide a comprehensive suite of healthcare benefits and coverage to provide support to our employees and their dependants in their health &amp; wellbeing journey.</span></p>\r\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>What are the eligibility requirements?</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">All permanent and fixed-term contract employees who are employed on local terms are eligible for healthcare benefits.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Additionally, dependants (spouse and children) are eligible for healthcare benefits if they meet the required conditions outlined in the Outpatient Healthcare Policy.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>For Singapore employees: What steps do I need to take?</strong></span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: auto;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">PLAN</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Employees will receive emails from Fullerton with instructions to download the mobile app and login details to the web portal and mobile app.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Panel clinic visits:&nbsp;Present your Fullerton e-healthcard (accessible via the mobile app) and identification card during registration at the panel clinics to enjoy cashless visits. You will not be required to submit a claim for panel visits. However, should the visits involve co-payment(s) or expense(s) that fall under the exclusions list, you or your dependants will be required to pay these amounts upfront.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Non-panel clinic visits:&nbsp;Pay all expenses upfront and request for the receipt. Within two months of incurring the expense or receipt of the bills, submit your claims via the Fullerton web portal or mobile app and attach the receipt(s) and any supporting documents. The date of invoice from the service provider will determine the calendar year which the expense can be claimed in.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Expenses will be reimbursed within one month of receipt of complete documents based on the Outpatient Healthcare Policy and Finance Expenses Procedures and Guidelines.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Panel GP clinic visits:&nbsp;Present your IHP e-healthcard (accessible via the mobile app) and identification card during registration at the panel clinics to enjoy cashless visits. You will not be required to submit a claim for panel visits. However, should the visits involve co-payment(s) or expense(s) that fall under the exclusions list, you or your dependants will be required to pay these amounts upfront.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Panel Specialist clinic visits:&nbsp;Complete the outpatient Guarantee Letter (GL) request form and email the completed form to IHP 3-5 days prior to visit date. The GL request form is also available for download on IHP's web portal.&nbsp;</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">IHP will email the Outpatient GL to you to present to the Specialist Panel Clinic, together with your IHP E-healthcard and identification card, before medical service can be rendered. No payment or submission of receipts will be required, except for any expenses that fall under the exclusions list or exceed the annual limit.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Non-panel clinic visits:&nbsp;Pay all expenses upfront and request for the receipt. Within two months of incurring the expense or receipt of the bills, submit your claims via the IHP web portal or mobile app and attach the receipt(s) and any supporting documents. The date of invoice from the service provider will determine the calendar year which the expense can be claimed in.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">FINALISE</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: auto; background-color: #ffffff; border-right: 1.5pt solid #5c5858; padding: 6.75pt 7.5pt; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; border-left-style: solid; border-top-color: #5c5858; border-bottom-color: #5c5858; border-left-color: #5c5858;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Expenses will be reimbursed within one month of receipt of complete documents based on the Outpatient Healthcare Policy and Finance Expenses Procedures and Guidelines.</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Next review date:</span></strong><br /><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">January 2019</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The Hourly Paid Time-Off Policy provides flexibility to help meet the personal needs of our hourly employees and offer an opportunity for rest and relaxation.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This policy applies to all active, hourly, full time and part time, non-union employees who have worked more than 90 days with the company with no break in service. This policy applies to employees based in North America.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY</strong></span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This plan is designed to provide all full-time and part-time, non-union hourly employees working more than 90 consecutive days, with the flexibility to meet their personal needs during the work week.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Eligible employees will accrue Paid Time-Off (PTO) hours, calculated based on time worked, at a rate of .0385 hours per hour of work, including PTO hours, and capped at 40 hours per week. PTO will be calculated at the start of employment and hours will be deemed accrued and may be used 90 days from the employment start date. Employees may accumulate a maximum limit of 160 hours.</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Maximum PTO accrued in any one week is 1.54 hours (.0385 x 40 hours = 1.54)</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Maximum PTO accrued in any one year is 80 hours (1.54 x 52 weeks = 80)</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PTO Hours</strong>:&nbsp;PTO hours may be used as a benefit outside of normal wage, for regularly scheduled work hours on which an employee does not work. In addition to regularly scheduled hours, PTO hours can be substituted for unpaid holidays, if requested. PTO hours may be taken in increments of not less than one (1) hour. PTO hours will not be considered hours worked towards overtime pay in a pay cycle and may not be used after the last day of work upon separation from the company. PTO hours must be fully accrued to be used.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PTO Pay Procedure</strong>:&nbsp;When coding PTO hours on the electronic time sheet, a weekly paid employee will enter \"Pay Type\" 36; enter \"Pay Type\" 86 if paid bi-weekly. If you record your hours on a written timesheet you should write \"PTO\" on the days in which you take PTO hours.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Scheduling PTO</strong>:&nbsp;If the need for PTO hours is foreseeable (when an employee can predict or know in advance they will need to use PTO hours, such as a doctor&rsquo;s visit, planned personal time or vacation), then employees must provide their supervisor with advanced notice 7 days prior to the date on which such PTO is to begin, or as early as possible. If the need for PTO hours is unforeseeable (when an employee is not able to know in advance or predict he or she will need to use PTO hours, such as a medical emergency or sudden illness), then employees must provide their supervisor with notice as soon as practicable. Failure to provide reasonable notice may result in disciplinary action. Employees may take a maximum of 80 hours per year. Any additional PTO requested would need the approval of the BU leader. PTO hours may not be scheduled or taken after an employee&rsquo;s physical last day worked with the company.</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PTO Benefits at Termination:</strong>&nbsp;Upon separation from employment, accrued but unused PTO hours will be paid out upon termination of employment. &nbsp;An employee's last day of employment is their last day physically worked. PTO may not be used to extend last day worked.&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Access more information on the processes and procedures for the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018993\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"Hourly Paid Time-Off Plan\">Hourly Paid Time-Off Plan</a></span></p>","sys_created_by":"hinw325","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>PURPOSE<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For the purpose of providing for employees that are unable to work due to short-term disability.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>SCOPE<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">For the purpose of providing for employees that are unable to work due to short-term disability.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>POLICY<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In the event that you become medically disabled while employed with US Lendlease and are certified disabled for at least eight (8) consecutive calendar days, the company will pay you disability benefits according to the following benefit plan.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The purpose of the US Lendlease Short-Term Disability Benefit Plan is to assist you in meeting your reasonable income needs in the event you suffer a short-term disability and are unable to work.&nbsp; You are eligible for short-term disability if you are a full-time, salaried US Lendlease employee who is scheduled to work 30 or more hours per week at a Lendlease location in the United States or its territories, or if you are a US expatriate who is on the Lendlease US payroll.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your weekly benefit will be determined based on the following table.&nbsp; The maximum period during which you may receive Plan benefits for a covered disability is 26 weeks.&nbsp; Your length of service means the amount of time you worked for US Lendlease prior to the start of your disability.&nbsp; Service Recognition Date is used in determining length of service.</span></p>\r\n<table style=\"width: 402.3pt; border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 1.0pt; border: 2.0pt solid #000000;\">\r\n<tbody>\r\n<tr style=\"height: 19px;\">\r\n<td style=\"width: 134.1pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;border-top: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-left: 2.0pt solid 2.0pt solid #000000; border-left: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-right: 2.0pt solid #000000; padding: 0.0pt 5.4pt 0.0pt 5.4pt;\">&nbsp;</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n<tr solid #000000; border-right: 2.0pt solid #000000; padding: 0.0pt 5.4pt 0.0pt 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Less than 5 years</span></strong></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 134.1pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;border-top: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-left: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-right: 2.0pt solid #000000; padding: 0.0pt 5.4pt 0.0pt 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">----</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n<td style=\"width: 134.1pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: center; ;border-top: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-left: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 2.0pt solid #000000; border-right: 2.0pt solid #000000; padding: 0.0pt 5.4pt 0.0pt 5.4pt;\">\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">up to 26 weeks</span></p>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>FILING A CLAIM<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">View the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/Short%20Term%20Disability%20FAQs.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Frequently Asked Questions\">Frequently Asked Questions</a>&nbsp;about Disability Benefits</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Short-Term Disability leaves must be reported to The Hartford by calling&nbsp;888.301.5615&nbsp;or by going online at&nbsp;<a href=\"https://account.thehartford.com/customer/#/login?appid=EE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"The Hartford\">The Hartford</a>. The Hartford will forward you a Leave of Absence packet, including information about your benefit coverage, your role in the leave process, and a medical release for your signature.&nbsp; The Hartford will also contact your physician on your behalf to expedite the receipt of medical certification.&nbsp; To avoid a delay in your Short-Term Disability benefit payments, you should contact The Hartford as soon as you know your disability will last at least 8 consecutive calendar days.&nbsp; You must contact The Hartford by the 14th day following the start of your disability or benefits will be denied until the date your claim is reported to The Hartford.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Medical certification, including specific information regarding your disabling condition and the expected duration of your leave, must be received from your doctor within 45 days of your leave start date or benefits may be denied.&nbsp; Notify your Manager/Strategic Business Partner so that they can immediately notify&nbsp;the Lendlease Benefits Department-Charlotte.&nbsp; Once you have called in your disability claim to The Hartford or filed online, your disability claim will be handled by an assigned analyst.&nbsp; It is your responsibility to follow up with The Hartford regarding the status of your claim.&nbsp; Approximately one week after filing a short-term disability claim, you should contact The Hartford @&nbsp;888.301.5615. Some important information to ask is:</span></p>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Have you received the medical certification form from my doctor?</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What dates has the doctor disabled me?</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What date has the doctor released me for work?</span></li>\r\n<li><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What do I need to do if I need an extension for my disability?</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are eligible for&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/FMLA%20Procedure%20Document.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"FMLA\">FMLA</a>&nbsp;when you go out on short-term disability, then you will receive an FMLA packet from The Hartford who administers Federal and State FMLA for Lendlease.&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/Pulse_People_Culture/Shared%20Documents/FMLA%20Procedure%20Document.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"FMLA\">FMLA</a> runs concurrently with short-term disability.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>HOW BENEFITS ARE AFFECTED DURING SHORT-TERM DISABILITY<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You remain on Lendlease's payroll while on approved short-term disability leave of absence.&nbsp; You will be paid STD benefits for as long as you are approved by The Hartford, up to the maximum 26 weeks.&nbsp; All of your benefits remain intact while on an approved short-term disability leave of absence.&nbsp; If you are released to return to work, and you do not, then your STD benefits will be suspended and all of your benefits will end.&nbsp; You may be eligible for COBRA continuation of health benefits and life insurance conversion.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">However, if you have not exhausted FMLA and you are eligible for FMLA, then you can continue on unpaid FMLA until you have exhausted your FMLA.&nbsp; Medical, dental, life and disability benefits will remain intact during your unpaid FMLA, as long as you pay the premiums.&nbsp; The Lendlease Benefits Department will bill you for all insurance premiums, Medical Reimbursement-FSA, 401k loans, etc. that you are enrolled in.</span><br><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>REFERENCE<br></strong> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://account.thehartford.com/customer/#/login?appid=EE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"The Hartford\">The Hartford<br></a> </span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Access more information on the processes and procedures for&nbsp;<a href=\"https://lendlease.service-now.com/lendlease?id=kb_article_view&amp;sysparm_article=KB0018739\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" title=\"Short-Term Disability\">Short-Term Disability</a></span></p>","sys_created_by":"wonl340","scheduled_publish_date":"","image":"","u_kbi_uniqueid":"","cmdb_ci":"","author":{"display_value":"Lizzy font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><img src=\"/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=ff655fbe1b442a103569b91f034bcb5a\" alt=\"\" width=\"900\" height=\"150\"></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0cm; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</p>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What is Unmind?</span></strong></span></span><em><strong>&nbsp;</strong></em></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind is an online wellbeing platform, accessible via mobile app, desktop via your web browser and MS Teams. It&rsquo;s designed by psychologists to help you understand and improve your mental health and wellbeing. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">All Lendlease employees have access to the Unmind platform. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What&rsquo;s included on the Unmind platform?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Within the Unmind platform, you will have access to </span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"><strong>Unmind Elevate</strong> </span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">and</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> <strong>Unmind Talk</strong>.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What is Unmind Elevate?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind Elevate is the part of the platform that houses the features and content for you to measure and manage your mental health and wellbeing. The content is rooted in well-established approaches such as cognitive behavioural therapy, mindfulness, and positive psychology. You can access content covering all sorts of areas, from managing stress, to sleeping better, to improving your focus.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What is Unmind Talk?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind Talk gives you access to one-to-one sessions with an expert therapist or coach (see below for more information). There are hundreds of therapists and coaches to choose from, with a diverse range of backgrounds and therapeutic approaches, so you can choose someone who fits your goals and values. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><strong><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"color: #000000; text-decoration: underline;\" xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How do I access Unmind?</span></span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">The Unmind platform is accessible via mobile app, desktop via your web browser and MS Teams. The content is the same across all devices giving you the option to choose the mode that works best for you.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">There are three ways to register for Unmind:</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Desktop Browser</span></strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ol style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Navigate to the Lendlease Unmind platform using this URL - <a href=\"http://update.unmind.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">lendlease.unmind.com</span></a> </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Click on &ldquo;Continue with Single Sign On (SSO)&rdquo; </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Select your work department and location </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will then be able to access the Unmind platform using SSO&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Mobile App</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ol style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Go to the app store on your mobile device and download the Unmind app. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once you&rsquo;ve downloaded the app, enter Lendlease as your &ldquo;Company Name&rdquo; </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Click on &ldquo;Continue with SSO&rdquo; </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Select your work department and location. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will then be able to access the Unmind platform using SSO&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Microsoft Teams App</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ol style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Go to your MS Teams app and select &ldquo;Apps&rdquo; in the left-hand panel </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Search for Unmind in the app store and click &ldquo;Add&rdquo;. This will add Unmind to the left-hand side panel of your Teams app. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once the Unmind app is installed within MS Teams, enter Lendlease as your &ldquo;Company Name&rdquo; </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Click on &ldquo;Continue with SSO&rdquo;. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Select your work department and location. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You will then be able to access the Unmind platform using SSO (Single Sign On)&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559685&quot;:0,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><strong>Note</strong></span>: You will need to complete this process on both your desktop and mobile Teams apps. If you don&rsquo;t see the Unmind app first time, sign out and log in again and it should appear.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How do I make an appointment with a therapist or coach?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">You can book an Unmind Talk session at any time in the Unmind app, without the need to contact your manager or HR team. This is completely confidential and secure. </span><a href=\"https://help.unmind.com/hc/en-gb/articles/14516101213329-How-do-I-book-a-session-\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Follow this link to find out more information on how.</span></a>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">I feel that a colleague needs support. How can I help them?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">If you are concerned about a colleague&rsquo;s mental health, take time to talk to them, practise active listening and explore together how you can best support them.&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">You can also signpost them to Unmind by clicking on &ldquo;Send an invite&rdquo;</span> <span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">from the Settings menu (hamburger menu in the top right corner of the app). You will then be provided with a link to share with your colleague inviting them to sign up so that they can access the Unmind content or book a session with a therapist.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">You might also choose to signpost them to local emergency services, their family doctor, or their manager depending on their needs.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">It is important to look after yourself when supporting others, so ensure you practise your own self-care too. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Additional Unmind Information</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Who is Unmind Talk for? </span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind Talk could be helpful for you if:</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You want to talk to someone about how you&rsquo;re feeling or about difficult things going on in your personal or work life </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You want to develop a greater self-awareness, see different perspectives or develop personally and/or professionally  </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are experiencing mental health difficulties such as low mood, depression, anxiety, stress, panic attacks, sleep problems, and low self-esteem</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You have recently experienced a significant life event or transition such a relationship breakup, bereavement, relocation, or received a physical health diagnosis</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You want to improve your relationships, at work or at home</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You are struggling at work with stress, burnout, working relationships, or giving presentations</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You want to find balance in your life</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You want some time to focus on you&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">It&rsquo;s a common misconception that therapy is only for people with a serious &lsquo;problem&rsquo;. Many people can benefit from therapy and coaching. The ideas above are just a starting point, and there may be other reasons why you could benefit from talking to a therapist or coach. If you are unsure if therapy or coaching is for you, why not give it a try and discuss this with the practitioner. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"><span style=\"color: #e03e2d;\">Important note</span>: </span></strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind Talk isn&rsquo;t a crisis service. If you&rsquo;re feeling suicidal or having thoughts of harming yourself or others, or at risk from someone else, please contact your local emergency service. You can find more information on coping in a crisis in the Mental Health Resources section of the Unmind platform. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">The Unmind platform is 100% confidential</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind and Lendlease both understand that your privacy is very important.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind will not share any details about individual usage of the platform with Lendlease. That information is private and confidential to you.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind shares anonymised and aggregated high level data with Lendlease that includes details of how many people are signed up, what parts of the platform are being used and how many therapy and coaching sessions are happening each month.&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind will never share any information about your individual usage with Lendlease.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How is Unmind different from a traditional EAP?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unmind is a confidential online platform for mental health and wellbeing. No one else ever knows if you are using it.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Unmind provides you with the tools to understand your mental health, and digital content to help nurture it.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You can select an experienced therapist or coach, from a range of backgrounds, to speak to within days.</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">There are no limits to the number of sessions you can have with a therapist or coach.&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Sometimes, we may feel out of sorts, but it&rsquo;s hard to put your finger on why you feel a certain way, or how to get past that feeling. Unmind is taking away the unknowns and giving you the control.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Can my family use Unmind too?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Yes. You can add two family members to your Unmind account and they will have the same access as you. They must be over the age of 18.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">You can invite your family member to set up a new account following these instructions:</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Go to the Unmind <strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">mobile app</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">:</span></strong></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Go to Settings (hamburger menu) in the top right corner of your screen.  </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">From the Settings menu, click &ldquo;Send an Invite&rdquo; </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Then click &ldquo;Invite a loved one&rdquo;  </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">You&rsquo;ll then be able to share an invite link via email, WhatsApp or any other channel </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Your loved one will then receive an email inviting them to sign up to Unmind. &nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Employees can update their family member access at any time. There is a</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> <strong>30-day grace period to all users</strong></span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> whose access is removed from Unmind. That said, once the new family member is added, the</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> existing</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> family member will continue to have access to the platform for 30 days prior to the new family member being added. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What happens to Unmind access for myself and any family members if I resign from Lendlease?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">For employees who resign from Lendlease, access to Unmind will cease when you leave as it is linked to the Lendlease single sign on process. For family members it will be the same as their access will no longer work when you leave. This relates to both the Unmind digital platform for self-directed learning and all therapists or coaches.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">For all therapy and coaching we encourage you to ascertain any aspects to cover off with your practitioner before access ceases. If you have a good connection with them, you could ask if they take on private clients of which any costs would need to be covered by the individual.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">About Unmind Therapists and Coaches</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What is therapy?</span></strong>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Therapy is a talking-based approach typically for people struggling with mental health difficulties, but it is also useful for exploring what&rsquo;s going on in your life and how you are managing day to day.  </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What is coaching?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Coaching is also talk-based, but it is designed to support you to achieve future goals, make life changes and unlock your potential. Coaches will use a variety of techniques to motivate you, provide clarity and give you a deeper sense of self-awareness. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Are Unmind&rsquo;s therapists and coaches good quality?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind follows a thorough vetting process for both therapists and coaches to ensure they are experienced and accredited/licensed in line with the relevant professional bodies and country and state regulations. Therapists and coaches must have professional indemnity insurance to practice. Unmind collects regular feedback about therapists and coaches from employees using the Unmind Talk service to ensure high quality and continuous improvement. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What if I feel like my therapist or coach isn&rsquo;t a good fit?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">It is important that you feel comfortable with your therapist or coach and that it feels like a natural fit. Sometimes you know instantly, and sometimes it takes a few sessions. If you decide that your therapist or coach is not a good fit (sometimes this happens, and it&rsquo;s ok), you can book with another therapist or coach at any stage. We ask that you let your current therapist or coach know that you don't wish to continue with them where possible. This can be done via email. It may be that they can help advise you on whether a different approach might be more helpful to you. If you are feeling a little unsure about what to do, feel free to contact Unmind and they will work through it with you: </span><a href=\"mailto:support@unmind.com\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">support@unmind.com</span></a>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What can I expect during my first therapy session?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Typically, sessions will be 50-60 minutes in length. Therapists and coaches will start with an introduction and review of expectations and confidentiality to make sure that you feel comfortable with them and the process. They will then ask you a series of questions to get a better understanding of your background and reasons for booking for the session. They will then ask you about your goals and what you want to achieve to identify whether and how they can best help you. You can discuss together whether the approach they offer is going to be most helpful to you. They may give you some follow up action items that you can take away and practice or apply to your life.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How should I prepare for my first session?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Before your first session, we encourage you to ask yourself a few questions which can guide your initial conversations with your coach or therapist.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559685&quot;:720,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What&rsquo;s led you to booking the session?</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What do you want to talk about?</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Do you know what your goals are, or do you need help figuring that out?</li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">What do you want to get out of therapy/coaching?</span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">What do you want your therapist/coach to be like? Do you want someone who holds you accountable, who is a cheerleader, who challenges you?</li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">How do you want your life to look when you are done?&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How often should I see my therapist or coach?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">This will vary depending on your individual situation. You and your therapist or coach will come to this decision together. Whatever decision you and your therapist or coach come to can change over time. Most people have weekly or fortnightly sessions. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How long will I have to wait for my first session?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Most therapists and coaches have appointments within a few days, some even the next day! You can book an appointment directly or message the therapist/coach to agree a time. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">What is the cancellation policy for sessions?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">We understand that unplanned events happen and sometimes you may need to cancel a session. Please remember that therapists and coaches put a lot of time into preparing for each session and they protect time in their diary for you. If you have to cancel, please make sure to give your therapist or coach at least one business days&rsquo; notice. </span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">If you cancel a scheduled session with a therapist or coach within one business day of the scheduled start time of the session, </span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind will process the full fee associated with the session and</span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> <strong>Lendlease will be liable for this fee.&nbsp;</strong></span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Please prioritise attending your Unmind session to ensure you receive maximum benefit from the service. </span><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Each session comes to you at considerable cost to Lendlease.</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind User Support</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How to contact Unmind&rsquo;s customer support team</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ol style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><strong>For mobile users</strong></span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">, go to the Settings menu (hamburger menu in the top right-hand corner) and scroll down to &ldquo;Technical support&rdquo;, then click &ldquo;Get in touch&rdquo;. You can submit a request from here.</span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><strong>For desktop users</strong></span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">, start a start a live chat via the Unmind Chat function, the symbol in the bottom right-hand corner of the app.</span> </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><strong>For MS Teams users</strong></span><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">, go to the Settings menu (hamburger menu in the top right-hand corner) and select &ldquo;Product help&rdquo;, this will take you to the Unmind support page and you can submit a request from here. </span></span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\">We recommend you use one of the options above if you have a question or issue that needs resolving quickly.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you have a query that isn't urgent, or you need to send attachments with your message, send Unmind an email. Email Unmind at <a href=\"mailto:support@unmind.com\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">support@unmind.com</span></a><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">.</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">If you would like to speak to someone from Lendlease, please raise a P&amp;C enquiry with the People Connect team via ServiceNow.</span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">I&rsquo;m having difficulties joining the Unmind session call</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">If you&rsquo;re experiencing issues during your Unmind call, here are a couple of suggestions that should help:</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ul style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Perform a \"hard refresh\" of your browser. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Check if your browser needs to be updated. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Check your video/audio settings on your computer. You'll need to allow Unmind access to your microphone and camera before you start the call. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If you are using an external microphone/headphones, check these are working properly. </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If the issue continues, email support@unmind.com with details of your device and browser, and they will provide more specific advice.&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335557856&quot;:16777215,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:240}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #e03e2d; text-decoration: underline;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind for Australian Construction Workers</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\">The CWLENDLEASE Unmind platform has been created </span><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\">specifically for Australian Construction Workers</span></strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\"><strong> </strong>who don&rsquo;t use their Lendlease email addresses and therefore can&rsquo;t access single sign on (SSO).</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">How do I sign up to Unmind if I am an Australia Construction Worker?</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">There are two ways to access Unmind for Construction Workers:</span>&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ol style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Download the Unmind app; or </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If using the desktop version &ndash; type in the URL <strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">cwlendlease.unmind.com</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Then:</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<ol style=\"list-style-position: inside;\">\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Click on the yellow &ldquo;create an account&rdquo; button </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In the &ldquo;Company Name&rdquo; field type in CWLENDLEASE and click &ldquo;Connect&rdquo; </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong>Enter your Employee ID</strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\"> &ndash; this is the 6-digit Lendlease ID number located at the top of your payslip</span> </span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Enter your preferred email address and password&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\">Important note:&nbsp;</span> </strong></span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\">When logging back into Unmind after some time away, you will be prompted to enter the &ldquo;Company Name&rdquo; before you enter your email and password.&nbsp; Ensure you use </span><strong style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\">CWLENDLEASE</span></strong><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"auto\"> and not just Lendlease (the Lendlease platform requires a Lendlease email address to be used for single sign-on.)&nbsp; The CWLENDLEASE platform has been created specifically for Lendlease Construction Workers who don&rsquo;t use their Lendlease email addresses.</span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\" data-ccp-props=\"{&quot;201341983&quot;:0,&quot;335551550&quot;:6,&quot;335551620&quot;:6,&quot;335559739&quot;:120,&quot;335559740&quot;:259}\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">Unmind Technical Support for Australian Construction Workers</span>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; You can submit a request from here. </span></span></li>\r\n<li style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"text-decoration: underline;\"><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;\"><strong><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">For desktop users</span></strong></span></span><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n</div>\r\n<div>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span xml:lang=\"EN-AU\" data-contrast=\"none\">We recommend you use one of the above options if you have a question or issue that needs resolving quickly.&nbsp;</span> </span></p>\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;
